— Ever miss out on capturing an amazing experience or end a great conversation because your battery ran out?
— Has your phone ever gotten into a fight with the ground and lost, and come back up with a cracked screen?
column2: >We’ve been there. That’s what we made Protean.
column4: >We’ve teamed up with the world’s most skilled engineers and designers to create a stylish, all-purpose iPhone case with functionality, ease of use, and minimalism in mind. Our flagship case features a built-in turbocharge battery, and our proprietary MagTec accessory swapping capability.
column10: >Effortless Versatility

column2:
>With Protean, you can unlock your iPhone’s true potential:
• Capture every perfect moment in professional quality.
• Avoid $400 tickets and stay legal with sleek car mounting.
• Save your screen from drops… forever.
• Protect your identity with a slim carbon fiber wallet.
column6: >What People Are Saying
column13: >We built Protean to improve on basic iPhone case design. Protective cases with built-in batteries are an industry standard — we’ve taken these features, improved upon them, and placed them in a modular design to unlock your iPhone’s full potential.
column19: >Our 2400mAh TurboCharged battery will double the charge on your phone. That’s another 12 hours of talking, texting, gaming, Netflixing, and browsing.
column25: >We developed MagTec to push forward the look and functionality of the iPhone. With MagTec, you can attach any of our paired accessories, or even create your own magnetic accessories to add on to your phone!
column30:
>Get The Perfect Shot

Turn your photos and videos up a notch. Our low profile magnetic mount allows you to attach high resolution fisheye and macro lenses to your camera. Each acorn-sized lens is made with durable scratch-resistant glass and custom TPU.
column31: >As with all of our accessories, the mount and lenses are designed with the highest quality compact materials.
column39: >Our Anywhere Mount is under 2 mm thin, and holds up to 8 times the weight of the iPhone 7. It is composed of rare earth metal magnets and is holstered inside a casing with 3M industrial strength adhesives that leave no residue.
column48: >Our wallet wastes no space. Hold card, cash, and ID close at hand while shielding them from RFID, NFC, and magnetic forces.
column55: >Have you ever dropped your phone? On the ground, your face, or perhaps your significant other? With our ergonomic magnetic LoopStand, you’ll never drop your phone on its face (or yours) again.
column60: >Stop Phone-to-Face Collisions
column65: '/>

column6: >Our engineers have designed proprietary shock resistance capability embedded within the layers of the case. This minimizes the internal damage which occurs from the impact of dropping your phone. Our raised lip design will keep your screen safe in the rare instances that you drop your phone (pro tip: use our LoopStand and say goodbye to dropping your phone altogether).
column12: >Protean comes in two models: Battery and Slim. Battery is our flagship all-in-one case that is perfect for the days when long phone calls, video streaming, and Instagramming leave you with 2% battery when it’s only 5pm. Slim is a sleek, elegant case that’s best for keeping things light on a night out or for those who prefer to maintain the iPhone’s minimalist aesthetic while getting top-grade protection. We’re sure you’ll be thrilled with either.
column41:

From now until the end of Protean’s campaign, you can refer your friends to get accessories and products. You share, they buy, you win!

Join Protean and get your hands on our products before anyone else. We’ll work with you to test items, poll new features, and ensure only the best accessories are created.

Who can join?
You must be a Protean backer on Indiegogo to qualify. Each backer has a unique Indiegogo ID and unique referral URL.

How do I join?
Log into Indiegogo. Then visit our campaign page on the site and look to the right of the main video to share using Indiegogo’s share tools.
column3: >How do I track my referrals?

column1: <li>Click on your user name beside the search box at the top right of the page
<li>Click on the tab that says “Referrals” for the latest totals of referrals and contributions
<li>See the number of funders and your total referred contribution amount
• We’ll send you free merchandise based on the total points earned!

column7:
/>

Protean has been designed, engineered, tooled, molded, and all features have been quality checked. We travelled to China to partner with one of the most advanced manufacturing companies in Shenzhen. They’re standing by and are ready to fulfill as many orders as we can receive, but we need your help to meet minimum order quantities.

If we didn’t have Indiegogo, we would otherwise need to be funded by venture capital. This would ultimately raise our bottom line. Since we wanted to get these innovative products to the Indiegogo community at the highest quality and lowest price possible, we needed to partner with a big time factory that has big time expectations. We’ve created a product that fixes problems and works flawlessly. We just need your help to get over the last hurdle.
column12:
/>

We’re a mixed bag of young energized innovators and seasoned veterans. It’s one of our core values to launch high quality products that push the envelope while maintaining core characteristics of minimalism, incredible functionality, and ease of use.

column3: >Protean cases are ultra-thin modular iPhone cases that offer excellent protection. Protean cases allow you to adapt to any situation. We’ve done this by developing a proprietary magnetic technology called MagTec. While all Protean products have MagTec and excellent protective capabilities, there is variation in the features offered by the Slim and Battery models.
>We're a team of 6 who come from a variety of backgrounds. We’re engineers, designers, sourcers and manufacturing experts.

>If you're someone who wants all the benefits of a protective case while keeping your iPhone slim and stylish and adaptable to every scenario, you’ll definitely want this. In our research, cases were either slim and stylish or protective and bulky. Protean is the perfect balance of minimalism, ease of use, and functionality

column1: ","— Ever miss out on capturing an amazing experience or end a great conversation because your battery ran out?— Has your phone ever gotten into a fight with the ground and lost, and come back up with a cracked screen?We’ve been there. That’s what we made Protean.We’ve teamed up with the world’s most skilled engineers and designers to create a stylish, all-purpose iPhone case with functionality, ease of use, and minimalism in mind. Our flagship case features a built-in turbocharge battery, and our proprietary MagTec accessory swapping capability.      *Delivery guaranteed by ProteanEffortless Versatility

With Protean, you can unlock your iPhone’s true potential:• Capture every perfect moment in professional quality.• Avoid $400 tickets and stay legal with sleek car mounting.• Save your screen from drops… forever.• Protect your identity with a slim carbon fiber wallet.What People Are Saying Protean FeaturesWe built Protean to improve on basic iPhone case design. Protective cases with built-in batteries are an industry standard — we’ve taken these features, improved upon them, and placed them in a modular design to unlock your iPhone’s full potential.Built-In BatteryOur 2400mAh TurboCharged battery will double the charge on your phone. That’s another 12 hours of talking, texting, gaming, Netflixing, and browsing.Accessorization Made EasyWe developed MagTec to push forward the look and functionality of the iPhone. With MagTec, you can attach any of our paired accessories, or even create your own magnetic accessories to add on to your phone!Get The Perfect ShotTurn your photos and videos up a notch. Our low profile magnetic mount allows you to attach high resolution fisheye and macro lenses to your camera. Each acorn-sized lens is made with durable scratch-resistant glass and custom TPU.As with all of our accessories, the mount and lenses are designed with the highest quality compact materials.  Phone Mounting AnywhereOur Anywhere Mount is under 2 mm thin, and holds up to 8 times the weight of the iPhone 7. It is composed of rare earth metal magnets and is holstered inside a casing with 3M industrial strength adhesives that leave no residue.   Dynamic Identity ProtectionOur wallet wastes no space. Hold card, cash, and ID close at hand while shielding them from RFID, NFC, and magnetic forces. Save Your ScreenHave you ever dropped your phone? On the ground, your face, or perhaps your significant other? With our ergonomic magnetic LoopStand, you’ll never drop your phone on its face (or yours) again. Stop Phone-to-Face Collisions

Industry Leading ProtectionOur engineers have designed proprietary shock resistance capability embedded within the layers of the case. This minimizes the internal damage which occurs from the impact of dropping your phone. Our raised lip design will keep your screen safe in the rare instances that you drop your phone (pro tip: use our LoopStand and say goodbye to dropping your phone altogether). ModelsProtean comes in two models: Battery and Slim. Battery is our flagship all-in-one case that is perfect for the days when long phone calls, video streaming, and Instagramming leave you with 2% battery when it’s only 5pm. Slim is a sleek, elegant case that’s best for keeping things light on a night out or for those who prefer to maintain the iPhone’s minimalist aesthetic while getting top-grade protection. We’re sure you’ll be thrilled with either. Reward Tiers     Packs     Bundles Referral ProgramFrom now until the end of Protean’s campaign, you can refer your friends to get accessories and products. Protean cases are ultra-thin modular iPhone cases that offer excellent protection. Protean cases allow you to adapt to any situation. We’ve done this by developing a proprietary magnetic technology called MagTec. While all Protean products have MagTec and excellent protective capabilities, there is variation in the features offered by the Slim and Battery models.
We're a team of 6 who come from a variety of backgrounds. We’re engineers, designers, sourcers and manufacturing experts.

If you're someone who wants all the benefits of a protective case while keeping your iPhone slim and stylish and adaptable to every scenario, you’ll definitely want this. In our research, cases were either slim and stylish or protective and bulky. Protean is the perfect balance of minimalism, ease of use, and functionality
Right here on Indiegogo! Pre-order yours today and be one of the lucky first to get your hands on the world’s best iPhone case before we source it to the general public.

We love crowdfunding! For our small business, it’s an amazing platform for allowing us to meet minimum order quantities from our manufacturer, while also making sure that we’re making a product people love through the close connection we have with our backers.
Our early backers can get a Slim case and headphone adapter for as low as $30, 60% off the retail price of $75.
Which phones does it work with?
Our base Battery and Slim cases fit for the iPhone 6s and 7. We’re gauging interest in creating a second line that fits the 7 plus.
We’re currently offering the case in jet black, though we’re planning on expanding colors.

That depends on the day. If you listen to a lot of music or regularly use your phone throughout the day, our Battery case is the best option. If you care more about a minimalist aesthetic and are only using your phone occasionally, our Slim case is the clear choice.
How does the case protect my phone?
Each case has built-in shock absorption, powerful raised lip screen protection, and top-of-the-line drop protection.
Does this case add a lot of bulk to my phone?
Not at all! Our cases are made with incredible protective technology that only adds ~3 mm to your iPhone.
We have gone through multiple refining processes to ensure that our cases are smooth and have sufficient grip on the sides.

Each case has small rare earth magnetic plates inside, allowing you to add on our various accessories, including the Anywhere Mount, Photography Kit, Carbon Fiber Wallet, and LoopStand. We'll be unveiling more accessories later in our journey!
The functionality of the case is enabled through the small rare earth metal plates inside of all our cases. Our accessories magnetize to these plates, forming a secure connection.
Will there be updates to the product in the future?
We're continuing to expand the line of cases to other phone models and we'll be launching additional accessories next year.
Can I still access my charging port?
Yes. We took that into account during design. Like everything else with Protean, plugging in your chargers will be easy.
Protean is water resistant, but not waterproof.
Shenzhen, China. We have a professional control agency to insure the highest product quality.

The magnets in our range of accessories provide the optimal balance between strength and attraction. Protean accessories have embedded industrial-strength rare earth magnets that provide a strong, secure fit to the case without causing damage to phones or credit cards.
Will the magnets mess with my phone or credit cards?
The magnets we use in our accessories have been through intensive testing and will not affect your phone, cellular data, credit cards, Wi-Fi, Bluetooth, GPS, Apple Pay or compass.
Shipping for all outstanding cases is on track to commence August 2017.
When can I expect it to reach our doorstep?
All orders are expected to be delivered by October 2017.
We’ll be shipping our iPhone cases worldwide. Shipping rates vary depending on your country. Shipping within the United States is FREE.
Please see reward details for all locations and shipping rates. Local taxes not included. Shipping within the United States is FREE.
What if I'm interested in a partnership?
Please contact sales@protean.store and include in your email the regions you would like to distribute to.
Do I have to pay VAT or GST?
If you are living outside of the United States, you may have to pay VAT or GST.
What are the risks and challenges of getting the device today?

There’s always a risk with production and manufacturing of any product. However, we’ve got experts in every field checking everything we do in triplicate. Our considerable fanbase and press beforehand has kept us accountable at every step of this process, and we’re happy to say that we’ve succeeded at every step. Our product has been tooled and molded, and we’re just waiting on the support from you and other lovely backers to afford the minimum order quantity from our manufacturer. If there’s anything you need updated, or feel as though there’s something we should change, please let us know!

All of our cases come with a 1-Year Warranty that covers manufacturing defects in the case. This does not cover gradual wear and tear throughout it's lifetime, or any type of user damage. We cannot guarantee the protection of your iPhone despite this case, as no case is fully indestructible!
How do I order an extra case?
We have great deals on combo packs and you can alternatively pre-order again for another case. Please contact us if you need any assistance with this. We are guaranteed to reply within 24 hours.
What is your refund policy during the Indiegogo campaign?
See detailed guide here. During the Indiegogo campaign, you can process the refund by contacting support@indiegogo.com or searching the help center. Refunds are processed on a case-by-case basis
column2: at some point we will need to lock refunds in order to go into production and shipment. We will not be able to refund orders once they have shipped.

column1: What is your return and exchange policy?

If you received your product and you aren't completely satisfied, you may exchange it for a new one within 30 days. Indiegogo does process refunds during the campaign. If you would like a refund, see the detailed guide here.
How do I choose more than one reward?
To get more than one perk, all you have to do is make a new contribution for each perk!
How can I check the status of my pre-order?
By pre-ordering through Indiegogo, you’ll automatically have an account created. Log back into Indiegogo using the email you pre-ordered, to verify your information
If I have other questions, who should I contact?
We guarantee reply within 24 hours.Press & Investment — alex@protean.storeSupport — this form",44.0,0,"1 Campaign
Place the wireless motion sensor under the door.

column4: >Jerk Alert immediately sends a signal AS SOON AS an intrusive presence crosses your “designated” threshold.

column1:
With those extra seconds, you can quickly stop—and eliminate the panic and embarrassment of being walked in on!

Take Back Your Privacy The Easy Way!

 

 

 

The wireless motion sensor fits under your door and can pivot 45 degrees towards the direction the intruder will be coming from. 

Turn on both the Wireless Motion Sensor and the Small Square Receiver. You can choose to place the small receiver in the wristband and wear it, or in your pocket or on a table nearby.

When an intruder crosses the designated thresh-hold you have set, the Wireless Motion Sensor will send a signal to your Receiver in which it will vibrate or beep (depending on your setting).  

 

 

Motion sensors you're familiar with are connected to expensive Security Systems or WiFi Hubs. Even if you receive an alert notification to your Mobile App that a motion has been triggered, it is usually 20-30 seconds after the person has crossed paths with that motion sensor. By then it's already too late.

Jerk Alert Wireless Motion Sensor comes paired with a Receiver which you can place with the wristband or simply on a table nearby. 

No need to plug into existing security hubs or WiFi routers.

Simply turn on both the Sensor &
column2: Receiver, set the Sensor, wear the Receiver and enjoy some PRIVATE TIME!
column3:
>



 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

EACH JERK ALERT SET INCLUDES

column1: • Metal Plate with 3M Adhesive to Stick on Door (for main sensor device to easily stick to bottom of your door through use of magnets)

column2:
>





            

            

Resellers who purchase 24 or more Jerk Alerts during our IndieGoGo Campaign will receive a lifetime discount ranging from 5-10% off the wholesale prices listed above. Just a way to give back to resellers who helped believe in us in the early run. Save more, make more!

 

Main Device

column1: • RF Wireless Signal 433 Mhz (up to 100 meters / 300 feet)
• Magnets Placed Strategically for Door Connectivity (using provided steel plate)
• Micro USB In 5 volts for Charging Battery
• Custom Directional Cap for Directing Sensor Capture
• Magnets used to connect to Main Device
• Pogo Pins for Power and Data Transfer
• RF Wireless Signal 433 Mhz (up to 100 meters / 300 feet)
• Switch to select ""Vibrate"" or ""Beep"" or ""Both, Vibrate and Beep""
• Micro USB In 5 volts for Charging Battery

We already have a working prototype as well as manufacturing and logistics sorted out. The tooling has already been paid for out of pocket ($11,280) although we need $23,000 to begin mass production.

In exchange for your support, you'll be one of the first people in the world to experience the revolutionary Jerk Alert and enjoy its amazing sensor abilities and advance notifications.

Our vision is to make Jerk Alert help save thousands from the embarrassment of someone walking in your room unexpectedly. As an early adopter, we are excited and eternally grateful that you want to join us on this exciting journey towards less embarrassing moments in our life.

 

 

We use a shipping partner from Hong Kong called FloShip.

Shipping from Hong Kong Air Mail is fast and affordable. The parcels include a tracking number and usually arrive to USA / CANADA / AUSTRALIA / UK within 8-12 days. Most other countries are on average 10-16 days.

If you wish to have faster shipping, there will be an option for you to upgrade later for a small fee. We will notify you by email to verify your address and ask whether you wish to upgrade shipping to something quicker.

Will I get this before Christmas?
If our campaign finishes early November successfully, most definitely. Otherwise we may need to extend the date which will delay production until we have enough money to move forward in production.

Why does it have 2 sensors?
When the ""Arm"" is connected, it disables the other sensor. When the Arm is disconnected, it enables the main sensor. We designed Jerk Alert to be universal for all situations. Whether you prefer to use under the door or outside your bedroom or other situations.

If it does not fit under my door, then what?
You simply detach the ""Arm"" part which is connected by using strong magnets. The Sensor gadget

Why does it rotate in 45 degree angles left and right?
Generally most bedroom doors look towards a wall. Therefore we made the ""Arm"" rotate-able so that given the direction most intrusive people will be coming from, can be pivoted towards that direction.

What's the max distance the Wireless Motion Sensor and Wristband can go?
Up to 100 meters / 300 feet during open line of sight. When walls and other barriers get in the way, it is reduced a little.

Can I upgrade my shipping to something faster?
Absolutely. We will email you weeks before shipping to verify your address and ask whether you wish to upgrade shipping speed.
","Place the wireless motion sensor under the door.
Jerk Alert immediately sends a signal AS SOON AS an intrusive presence crosses your “designated” threshold.

With those extra seconds, you can quickly stop—and eliminate the panic and embarrassment of being walked in on!Take Back Your Privacy The Easy Way!   The wireless motion sensor fits under your door and can pivot 45 degrees towards the direction the intruder will be coming from. Turn on both the Wireless Motion Sensor and the Small Square Receiver. You can choose to place the small receiver in the wristband and wear it, or in your pocket or on a table nearby.When an intruder crosses the designated thresh-hold you have set, the Wireless Motion Sensor will send a signal to your Receiver in which it will vibrate or beep (depending on your setting).    Motion sensors you're familiar with are connected to expensive Security Systems or WiFi Hubs. Even if you receive an alert notification to your Mobile App that a motion has been triggered, it is usually 20-30 seconds after the person has crossed paths with that motion sensor. By then it's already too late.Jerk Alert Wireless Motion Sensor comes paired with a Receiver which you can place with the wristband or simply on a table nearby. No need to plug into existing security hubs or WiFi routers.Simply turn on both the Sensor & Receiver, set the Sensor, wear the Receiver and enjoy some PRIVATE TIME!            EACH JERK ALERT SET INCLUDES
Metal Plate with 3M Adhesive to Stick on Door (for main sensor device to easily stick to bottom of your door through use of magnets)

Resellers who purchase 24 or more Jerk Alerts during our IndieGoGo Campaign will receive a lifetime discount ranging from 5-10% off the wholesale prices listed above. Just a way to give back to resellers who helped believe in us in the early run. Save more, make more! Main Device
RF Wireless Signal 433 Mhz (up to 100 meters / 300 feet)
Magnets Placed Strategically for Door Connectivity (using provided steel plate)
Micro USB In 5 volts for Charging Battery
Custom Directional Cap for Directing Sensor Capture
Magnets used to connect to Main Device
Pogo Pins for Power and Data Transfer
RF Wireless Signal 433 Mhz (up to 100 meters / 300 feet)
Switch to select ""Vibrate"" or ""Beep"" or ""Both, Vibrate and Beep""
Micro USB In 5 volts for Charging Battery

We already have a working prototype as well as manufacturing and logistics sorted out. The tooling has already been paid for out of pocket ($11,280) although we need $23,000 to begin mass production.In exchange for your support, you'll be one of the first people in the world to experience the revolutionary Jerk Alert and enjoy its amazing sensor abilities and advance notifications.Our vision is to make Jerk Alert help save thousands from the embarrassment of someone walking in your room unexpectedly. As an early adopter, we are excited and eternally grateful that you want to join us on this exciting journey towards less embarrassing moments in our life.  We use a shipping partner from Hong Kong called FloShip.Shipping from Hong Kong Air Mail is fast and affordable. The parcels include a tracking number and usually arrive to USA / CANADA / AUSTRALIA / UK within 8-12 days. Most other countries are on average 10-16 days.If you wish to have faster shipping, there will be an option for you to upgrade later for a small fee. We will notify you by email to verify your address and ask whether you wish to upgrade shipping to something quicker.

Will I get this before Christmas?If our campaign finishes early November successfully, most definitely. Otherwise we may need to extend the date which will delay production until we have enough money to move forward in production.

Why does it have 2 sensors?When the ""Arm"" is connected, it disables the other sensor. When the Arm is disconnected, it enables the main sensor. We designed Jerk Alert to be universal for all situations. Whether you prefer to use under the door or outside your bedroom or other situations.
If it does not fit under my door, then what?You simply detach the ""Arm"" part which is connected by using strong magnets. The Sensor gadget

Why does it rotate in 45 degree angles left and right?Generally most bedroom doors look towards a wall. Therefore we made the ""Arm"" rotate-able so that given the direction most intrusive people will be coming from, can be pivoted towards that direction.
What's the max distance the Wireless Motion Sensor and Wristband can go?Up to 100 meters / 300 feet during open line of sight. When walls and other barriers get in the way, it is reduced a little.
Can I upgrade my shipping to something faster?Absolutely. We will email you weeks before shipping to verify your address and ask whether you wish to upgrade shipping speed.",41.0,0,"1 Campaign
French version of the Ergofip website
A 100% customizable split international keyboard with mechanical keys and RGB lighting.
Click on the pictures to see the models:

column2: >
>

column1: What makes the Ergofip unique and amazing
• Each key has its own light: for pure fun but also in order to identify the keyboard configuration (working, gaming etc.)
• Thanks to the configurator, you can define the colors individually for each key.
• Choose for the colors to light up:
Whether the keys are held down...  ...or not
• Special lighting effects: we've already included some nice effects: rainbow, raindrops, and so on.
• On traditional keyboards, thumbs are only used for the space bar. Here you have a lot more!
• Eight keys are dedicated to each thumb!
• Choose what you want to print on the keys: the light will shine through!
• Here are just a few examples of what you can do:
A jack socket has been added so you can keep the lead from your headphones in the middle at all times: no more discomfort! No more leads coming out, loose connections or tangled leads.

column2: >

column1: Macros! What is a macro? You associate a sequence of characters to a key - thanks to the configurator this is a child's play. Then you will be able to send this sequence with a single keystroke!

• French. Yes. The French touch is there for all to see: Damien, an electronics engineer specializing in the industrialization process, has already been involved in the mass-production of many products, and with Damien, top quality is guaranteed: as many experts will tell you, try it and you'll love it

Good news! This unique keyboard will also help certain disabled people with their daily tasks. Thanks to the simplified configurator, they will be able to forget their difficulties, and using the computer will become a second nature.
Ergofip was made with and for you: gamers, developers, geeks, writers, typewriters and so on: basically anybody wanting to keep up with state-of-the-art technology.
Such a keyboard will meet all of your expectations:
• You will be able to play faster: you'll win every game from now on!
• You will be able to develop even faster and your customers will be the first to be rewarded
• Your fully personalized keyboard will make you unique and the envy of your community
• Your publications and other articles will be ready in no time
• You used to be fast: well this keyboard will bring you to the next level!
What does mechanical keyboard mean? The best explanation can be found here.
What is relevant though is the color of the mechanical key switches which is a synonym of ""what typing experience you want to have"". They will always be nice to touch and press
column2: a feeling you'll never have with the squishy rubber membrane you find on most keyboards.

column1: Depending on the color of the switches, you'll experience differents sensations: sometimes they'll click (you feel a slight ""bump"" when you push the key) and sometimes they won't
column2: sometimes you'll have press them softly sometimes hardly (this is called ""actuation force"" and its measure is in gf).

column1: There's also the ""travel"" your finger undergo when you push a key, before the information is sent. This is called ""pre-travel"" and it's measured in millimeters.
• For most gamers, for example, you'll want something linear that is very easy to push so you'll get a very short response time. Those are red switches.
• For peole who like to type ""hard"", you may want the black (yellow are the same, just not the same manufacturer) switches: like red but you have to push a bit harder.

• For people who like the ""bump"" when they push the key, you'll want the blue switches. They give you a really nice ""bump"" sensation, but be careful: they'll click! If you a sensitive to noise this may be a problem.

• ...For those sensitive to noise who still want the ""bump"" sensation, you have the brown switches: they are a compromise between red and black (linear = no bump but silent) and blue (bump but clicks).
The switches are a matter of taste. Because we love games, we've made our two prototypes with red switches.
You have the choice! Here's a recap:
Tactile key, nice sensation. Makes clicking noise.
Small bump, tactile, and quiet enough for office use.
Most gamer's choice. Fast response time, no bump.
Like Red, but if you like to type hard!

You can ask us for Purple Zealio Switches (they are tactile, 65g actuation), which are brand new switches: if we get enough orders you'll be one of the first in the work with those switches!

During the mass-production, the switches will be supplied by Gateron, Outemu, Khail or Cherry. They all produce incredible, quality switches.

Special kickstart edition!

For those happy to show that they've been the first to get such an amazing keyboard, we've made this gold-effect, engraved ""Kickstart edition"" text!

If you prefer to have it engraved on the back, just email us:

Ergofip key chain

If you believe in our project, and are willing to participate, invest in something that will be with you every day: this 3D keychain, Ergofip's brand, will be yours!

Click on the picture to see the 3D model:

Project schedule and timeline

Second quarter, 2016

Olivier Pons designs the whole Ergofip configurator. Done.

Third quarter, 2016

Spicetronic makes the first working prototype of the Ergofip. Done.

Fourth quarter, 2016

Spicetronic makes two working prototypes of the Ergofip. The second has more keys for the thumbs (you only have pictures of the second one, because it's awesome!). Done.

First quarter, 2017

The making of the molds takes around two months. There is a very short turnaround for this thanks to Damien who has already done this many times.

Adding traditional, international layouts - online configurator. Even though there's already a QWERTY and an AZERTY layout, we plan to add traditional keyboard layouts for more than 20 countries.

Implementation of a new feature: password (lock your keyboard!) (keyboard firmware + online configurator).

Second quarter, 2017

Carry out more testing of the end product and apply finishing touches. Obtain CE and FCC certification for the Ergofip.

June-August, 2017

Mass production: thanks to Spicetronic, who have already produced many electronic components successfully, this milestone will be reached on time.

November, 2017

We welcome and will listen to all of your suggestions, and the Ergofip of the future will be inspired by your feedback. The first suggestion to be applied will be the addition of new customized colors for the Ergofip case.

FAQ

Pictures of the Ergofip's perks

Here's the Ergofip:

- with custom keycaps on the left (€ 349)

- with blank keycaps on the right (€ 299)

Who created your awesome video?

We're glad you asked! The video was shot by Jean-Romain from Bonjour Studios.

Who got the idea?

Olivier Pons has been eating, sleeping and drinking IT since the age of 8, where he discovered a passion which knows no bounds. One day, he discovered a great keyboard by the name of Ergodox: open source, ergonomic, configurable and mechanical. Everything he was looking for. Well... almost!

He then began dreaming up the perfect keyboard and the result is finally here!

HI, to everyone. Oftentimes I had brilliant ideas on how to make different products that may help our day to day life. Today I want to introduce you a real mobile computer that can be converted in a TV , Laptop or a simple display. Thanks to new technologies, PAPYRUS  incorporates a foldable touch-screen type  display and a  foldable luminescent keyboard.

PAPYRUS can be used as a laptop or a PC monitor. The magnetic wireless charger gives you the opportunity to use the cylinder both vertical or horizontal. The PAPYRUS box will contain the cylinder, the magnetic wireless charger, and a portable PC monitor stand.
In the coming years the mobile device market will be flooded with gadgets that contain flexible screens, so it is time for this product to be feasible.
I am looking to gain the amount of money that is needed to complete a prototype for PAPYRUS. At the same time I am looking to create a team that can deliver this product .
I will split the funding for PAPYRUS in two phases:
Phase 1: Raising Money for The concept campaign :

An amount of 6000 GBP is needed in order to be able to deliver a professional video promoting the PAPYRUS product together with a 3D realistic model of the baton display. This money will cover a prototype computer that can demonstrate the mechanical roll-out of the flexible display and expenses for further research.
Phase 2: Raising Money for the Prototype and business model set up:

The amount of money needed to build a fully functional prototype with the computing power of a smartphone is estimated at 7000 GBP. I aim to mass-produce the PAPYRUS display at an initial market price of 400 GBP.

PAPYRUS will revolutionize the mobile PC market by making available a product that is mobile at a very low cost. The folding screen technology is already making a huge difference in the mobile phone market and is now the time to shift to laptops and wearables technology.

PAPYRUS is a cylinder containing a computer and two rolling out film, both of them being touch screen type folding displays. The first is at a dimension of 330 mm/220 mm and is used for the display role.  The second screen will roll out of the cylinder in case you need a keyboard.  All of this is happening by vocal command or by touching the cylinder twice with the finger.

The PAPYRUS display will be a 4K  Full HD display at a refresh rate of 144 Hz, perfectly adaptable for cloud gaming through the latest wi-fi chip module.  The product includes a SIM card adaptor for 5G networks as well.

Investing in PAPYRUS is a way to make future like technologies available to everyone. PAPYRUS is committed to be an eco-friendly company, delivering a product that is mostly recyclable. PAPYRUS is going to be a modular product and will respect THE RIGHT TO REPAIR from the first day.  Every time that a new, more advanced folding display is available, the costumer will be able to replace the old one with it without throwing away the entire product. This is what I consider to be our duty for the environment and the generation to come.
PAPYRUS will  demonstrate that a simple product can overcome the necessity of space, travel , speed and durability at the same time.

On the road to make PAPYRUS available into a physical product, we need to overcome many challenges. Amid to COVID 19 crisis, finance, delivery times and reservation had been all altered.  In response to all of these problems, I do believe that a product like PAPYRUS is more than welcome. More and more people need access to technology and to cheap , good quality computers. The folding screen producers are ready to deliver high-quality displays as soon as the market will offer a product for their use.
Any volunteer work is welcome. Advice and mentoring are welcome as well. Please share and make PAPYRUS be known. Hope to see all of you on Phase 2 of the campaign.

Exahome is the world’s first intelligent and efficient smart home system. It makes controlling your home a breeze by introducing the highest degree of automation imaginable. Exahome also saves energy by managing all available resources in the most efficient way. Setting up Exahome is easily done from our intuitive smart phone app and allows you to tailor its functionality exactly to your needs.
And if your habits change, Exahome changes!

The center of your home is constantly kept at the ideal temperature. The blinds open and close as needed to support your heating system and keep energy costs low. As the sun sets, the indoor lights gradually turn brighter to keep the light levels constant without blinding you. The ventilation is controlled automatically to provide the optimum room climate.

Geofencing allows Exahome to prepare your home for your return. As you arrive, the outdoor lights turn on and the garage door opens to let you park your car. The front door unlocks with a green glow of light to let you know everything is all right, and the alarm functions are disabled.

A swimming pool can be a lot of work - but not with Exahome. It can automatically measure the water quality and dispense chlorine as needed. A pool heater can also be controlled by Exahome, keeping the water temperature at comfortable levels. The pump is activated as necessary, and the pool is automatically refilled when the water level drops below a preset value.

Photovoltaics are a great way to harvest solar energy. The generated power is constantly monitored, and power-hungry appliances are turned on when the photovoltaic panels produce the highest output. You can keep track of your energy savings and system health using the Exahome app on your smart phone or laptop.

Installing Exahome is easy: The tiny modules are wired to the appliances they control and then hidden discreetly in wall boxes. The decentralized setup keeps the installation tidy and invisible. A single CAT5 cable connects all modules to the Brain, providing them with power and data connection. Using only one cable allows Exahome to be retrofitted into existing installations without much effort. Its extremely low power consumption allows Exahome to be powered by a single cell phone charger.

Scanning the QR code of a module with the Exahome app establishes its communication to the Brain. The app then allows you to directly input the module settings through an interactive assistant. After setting up the communication of all modules, the app automatically suggests intelligent functions which you can instantly apply. You can program your home without any special knowledge and without ever seeing a single line of code.
For perks which include only a Brain, you can use our configurator to add modules to your perk. There you can calculate the amount to add to your contribution.
The Brain perks each include one (1) Exahome Brain to control up to 500 modules. To purchase modules, use our configurator to calculate the amount to add to your contribution.
The Reseller Packages each include five (5), ten (10), or fifteen (15) Exahome Brains. To purchase modules, use our configurator to calculate the amount to add to your contribution.

The Collector's Edition is the first-ever, handmade Exahome Brain with the signatures of the founders on its front. This one will ship before all the other perks. To purchase modules, use our configurator to calculate the amount to add to your contribution.

In June 2014 we started developing Exahome out of frustration with existing home automation solutions. Two Exahome systems have been running since November 2014 / May 2015 without any critical errors. We are now focused on finalizing and testing our module designs and improving the user experience of the mobile app. The next steps are FCC/CE certification and preparing our designs for production. We expect to ship the first Exahome units to our backers in June 2016, after which we will continue improving and extending our hardware and provide software updates for already installed systems.

Martin is the main developer for every bit of software that you can see. He discovered his love for coding while building a remote sensing network and has developed many web applications since. His experience in developing connected applications allows him to create a very unique, yet intuitive, user experience.

Christoph is responsible for anything you can hold in your hand. He has been designing electrical circuits for almost ten years and has done lots of research on intelligent motion sensors, ventilation controlling, and renewable energy. His duties include creating and testing all the hardware designs and writing lots of assembly code.
I can’t / don’t want to back you financially. Can I still help making Exahome a success?
Of course, every bit of help is greatly appreciated. Spread the word about Exahome, like our social pages and share them with your friends! Every like and share counts!
What will my money be used for?
About one third of all funds raised will be used for producing and shipping Exahome to our backers. The rest goes into full time development, tooling, testing, and FCC/CE certification.
Why are you going with fixed funding?

We want to keep the risk low for you and for ourselves. We know we can bring Exahome to you if this campaign is successfully funded. If the campaign doesn’t succeed, we most likely won’t be able to cover the costs for certification and production. In that case, you get your money back, so your financial risk is low.
Will there be an app for my smart phone/tablet?
Currently we are developing native apps for Android and iOS. Any other smartphone/tablet/laptop can run our mobile optimized web app.

Exahome is designed to be the most reliable Smart Home ever. That implies that all critical communication runs over cables, which makes Exahome most suitable for new buildings. However, in many existing buildings there is enough space to install the single CAT5 cable, which allows you to retrofit Exahome into your home.

If you are skilled in electrical installation you can probably install it yourself. Keep in mind that in some countries electrical installation work may only be carried out by professional electricians. If you’re not feeling entirely confident about what you’re doing you should hire a professional electrician to install the hardware for you. Programming Exahome can easily be done by anyone, so you can save money there.
Can Exahome be used with my country’s electric system?
Yes. Our system is designed to work with a wide range of mains voltages (100-240 V) and frequencies (50-60 Hz). Alternatively, you can use almost any 5 VDC power supply.

","Exahome is the world’s first intelligent and efficient smart home system. It makes controlling your home a breeze by introducing the highest degree of automation imaginable. Exahome also saves energy by managing all available resources in the most efficient way. Setting up Exahome is easily done from our intuitive smart phone app and allows you to tailor its functionality exactly to your needs.
And if your habits change, Exahome changes!

The center of your home is constantly kept at the ideal temperature. The blinds open and close as needed to support your heating system and keep energy costs low. As the sun sets, the indoor lights gradually turn brighter to keep the light levels constant without blinding you. The ventilation is controlled automatically to provide the optimum room climate.

Geofencing allows Exahome to prepare your home for your return. As you arrive, the outdoor lights turn on and the garage door opens to let you park your car. The front door unlocks with a green glow of light to let you know everything is all right, and the alarm functions are disabled.

A swimming pool can be a lot of work - but not with Exahome. It can automatically measure the water quality and dispense chlorine as needed. A pool heater can also be controlled by Exahome, keeping the water temperature at comfortable levels. The pump is activated as necessary, and the pool is automatically refilled when the water level drops below a preset value.

Photovoltaics are a great way to harvest solar energy. The generated power is constantly monitored, and power-hungry appliances are turned on when the photovoltaic panels produce the highest output. You can keep track of your energy savings and system health using the Exahome app on your smart phone or laptop.

Installing Exahome is easy: The tiny modules are wired to the appliances they control and then hidden discreetly in wall boxes. The decentralized setup keeps the installation tidy and invisible. A single CAT5 cable connects all modules to the Brain, providing them with power and data connection. Using only one cable allows Exahome to be retrofitted into existing installations without much effort. Its extremely low power consumption allows Exahome to be powered by a single cell phone charger.

Scanning the QR code of a module with the Exahome app establishes its communication to the Brain. The app then allows you to directly input the module settings through an interactive assistant. After setting up the communication of all modules, the app automatically suggests intelligent functions which you can instantly apply. You can program your home without any special knowledge and without ever seeing a single line of code.
For perks which include only a Brain, you can use our configurator to add modules to your perk. There you can calculate the amount to add to your contribution.
The Brain perks each include one (1) Exahome Brain to control up to 500 modules. To purchase modules, use our configurator to calculate the amount to add to your contribution.
The Reseller Packages each include five (5), ten (10), or fifteen (15) Exahome Brains. To purchase modules, use our configurator to calculate the amount to add to your contribution.

The Collector's Edition is the first-ever, handmade Exahome Brain with the signatures of the founders on its front. This one will ship before all the other perks. To purchase modules, use our configurator to calculate the amount to add to your contribution.

In June 2014 we started developing Exahome out of frustration with existing home automation solutions. Two Exahome systems have been running since November 2014 / May 2015 without any critical errors. We are now focused on finalizing and testing our module designs and improving the user experience of the mobile app. The next steps are FCC/CE certification and preparing our designs for production. We expect to ship the first Exahome units to our backers in June 2016, after which we will continue improving and extending our hardware and provide software updates for already installed systems.

Martin is the main developer for every bit of software that you can see. He discovered his love for coding while building a remote sensing network and has developed many web applications since. His experience in developing connected applications allows him to create a very unique, yet intuitive, user experience.

Christoph is responsible for anything you can hold in your hand. He has been designing electrical circuits for almost ten years and has done lots of research on intelligent motion sensors, ventilation controlling, and renewable energy. His duties include creating and testing all the hardware designs and writing lots of assembly code.
I can’t / don’t want to back you financially. Can I still help making Exahome a success?
Of course, every bit of help is greatly appreciated. Spread the word about Exahome, like our social pages and share them with your friends! Every like and share counts!
What will my money be used for?
About one third of all funds raised will be used for producing and shipping Exahome to our backers. The rest goes into full time development, tooling, testing, and FCC/CE certification.
Why are you going with fixed funding?

We want to keep the risk low for you and for ourselves. We know we can bring Exahome to you if this campaign is successfully funded. If the campaign doesn’t succeed, we most likely won’t be able to cover the costs for certification and production. In that case, you get your money back, so your financial risk is low.
Will there be an app for my smart phone/tablet?
Currently we are developing native apps for Android and iOS. Any other smartphone/tablet/laptop can run our mobile optimized web app.

Exahome is designed to be the most reliable Smart Home ever. That implies that all critical communication runs over cables, which makes Exahome most suitable for new buildings. However, in many existing buildings there is enough space to install the single CAT5 cable, which allows you to retrofit Exahome into your home.

If you are skilled in electrical installation you can probably install it yourself. Keep in mind that in some countries electrical installation work may only be carried out by professional electricians. If you’re not feeling entirely confident about what you’re doing you should hire a professional electrician to install the hardware for you. Programming Exahome can easily be done by anyone, so you can save money there.
Can Exahome be used with my country’s electric system?
Yes. Our system is designed to work with a wide range of mains voltages (100-240 V) and frequencies (50-60 Hz). Alternatively, you can use almost any 5 VDC power supply.",28.0,0,"1 Campaign

Short Summary

After having to problem with charging cables for mobile phones are broken during normal usage so often, we set out to work on a solution to fix this once and for all.  Our objective is to:
• Remove the need to replace broken cables
• Create a beautiful home for your phone to rest on while charging without have to keep plugging in and out which could damage the life of your phone
After a  year of researching, designing, prototyping and fine-tuning, we are happy to announce Qidock, our solution to mobile charging.
• Danguard Company's goal is to deliver the next popular technology to everyone at superb quality and down-to-earth price.
• Qidock has been on our primary focus in Jan 2014.  It takes longer than we anticipated because we want to delivery a best design at highest quality and affordable cost.
• Qidock is produced in Vietnam and goes through rigorous quality control process.
• This is our first project on Indiegogo, help us continue publishing more quality products by Contributing Now.
Why wait? Untangled yourself of cables, save money.

column2:
What You Get

We need $10,000.00 for initial expense with molding and tooling.  Contribute now and help us get this project off the ground.

column1: Save Money:  No more new cables every few months, save hundred of dollars off the cost of replacing broken cables.
Be Organized: No more accidentally yanking your phone off while charging.  No more stumbling through cables trying to answer a call or message.
Give Your Device a Home:  By giving your device an attractive home, you won’t have to worry about finding where you put your device again.
Perfect Viewing Angle:  A perfect viewing angle for video calls, reading messages/notifications, watching movies, and more without running out of battery.
More than a dock: You'll fall in-love with the product the moment you set your eyes on it
column2: so will everyone else.  It's a perfect conversation starter in an office!

column3:
Challenges

We have all process and technical risks resolved.  Our only concern risk now is delivery schedule as it is #1 realized risk for all projects.   To offset this risk, we plan to proceed with our tooling ordering as soon as our Early Bird Special Perk is sold out to get a head start on our schedule.

column1: We used 3d printer to print our prototypes for quick validation.  Production units are produced with high tech molding machinery for precision and quality.
Qidock within reach and no cable to deal with, a perfect home for your  phone.
• If you have any questions, please feel free to ask questions in the comment tab.

• SHARE this project with your friends so they can opt-in this amazing product at great price as well.

<div>The kit is designed to go beyond how traditional magnetic mounts work. The BadgerSkin Kit allows users to no longer utilize an unwanted case which hides the magnetic metal plate or to have an unwanted metal plate on the outside of a case. Now with BadgerPlate
column2: users can have a metal plate that is specifically designed to mimic the colors of the phones' metal and/or plastic finish or choose any of the bright and vibrant colors that are offered. The plate can then be hidden behind any of our beautiful vinyl skins. This allows anyone to customize the look of their phone with awesome patterns and colors.

column1: The BadgerPlate is a thin sheet of ferrous metal with rounded edges. The plate is is adhered to the rear of a phone with the ability to be concealed under a vinyl skin. For phones with Logos such as ""Nexus"" or ""HTC"" the plates have a cut out as an option for users who want to still see the phones awesome branding. For those of us that want magnetic shielding, it is available as well.

The BadgerSkin is a thin piece of high-quality vinyl manufactured from some of the top brands such as 3M. This can be used to conceal the BadgerPlate under the skin to make for a very sleek, cool, and minimalist design. The skins come in all colors, check our gallery!

The BadgerMount is a high-quality phone and tablet mount designed with the strongest neodymium magnets available. The magnets allow an attraction to the BadgerPlate on the phone making it mountable just about anywhere the BadgerMount is. The mounts are available in 3 different types: The Sticky Silicon Cup, CD Tray, and Vent Mount.
Our skins are designed using high-quality photo imaging and 3D scan technology to ensure a 100% accurate fit with dimensions that were measured hundreds of times for our supported devices.
So there, you have it. You've seen the ways of the Badger. Now it's up to you, do you want to join the Badger Empire?

As a backer you can choose to receive any of our brand new products which will be available within three months of our campaign completion. Shipping within the US is free, international shipping will be calculated based on country, at the completion of our campaign. All ""paid for"" shipping will be sold at cost.

What is needed:

The success of our campaign rides on completing our $20,000 goal. This will go towards the following:

2. Materials and products from sourced vendors. We are working hard to finalize the true expenses of these materials which also correlates into quantities ordered. This will be based on surveys during mid-campaign
to better focus on what people want for colors and products.

This will all be based on the perks ordered. during mid-campaign we will send out a survey with finalized color samples to choose from. This will include vinyls BadgerPlates, and BadgerMounts. The mid-campaign survey will be used to field test what everyone wants in order to better finalize how much of what materials need to be ordered for campaign completion. This will be used to estimate costs from vendors.

At the end of our campaign, we will send voucher codes  to each backer for all orders to be finalized on our website, where everyone can choose skins, mounts and plates correlating to each package. For international users, this is where you can choose your shipping options. The pricing of international shipments will be from $2-30 depending on your perk ordered.

column2:
Challenges

We are working closely with both USA and Chinese sources for our mounts, metal plates and vinyls. We already received many samples of the products and have some still on the way.

  • We need to finalize definitive vendors for the mounts and work with them locally to make sure everything goes smoothly.
  • Space is one of our greatest hurdles, if we can rent a small warehouse space with 100% funding we can both have a shipping center and manufacturing center for the vinyls among other products.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't contribute to our campaign all we ask of you is to share our awesome BadgerSwag around to your friends and family. It is greatly appreciated and every dollar counts!

column1: If there is a device which is not listed, please message us! If there is enough demand for the device, it will be added!

column2: >As USB is well known, its new version USB 3.1 has been created introducing a faster transfer mode called “SuperSpeed USB 10 Gbit/s”. USB 3.1 is downward compatible with USB 3.0 and USB 2.0. As one specification of USB 3.1, USB Type-C defines a new small reversible-plug connector for USB devices. The Type-C plug connects to both hosts and devices, replacing various Type-B and Type-A connectors and cables.

>USB Type-C plug is much smaller than the current standard (just 8.3 x 2.5 mm), it is  reversible so users will no longer worry about the  plug-in orientation while connecting USB cable with devices. Meanwhile, USB Type-C allows data transmission, charging, media play etc. No doubt it Will be the Next Technology Revolution.

The Type-C plug connects to both hosts and devices, replacing various Type-B and Type-A connectors and cables.

Tidy It: once you roll it up, it stays that way.
column2:
/>


Save It: using the thick power cable is the intrinsic solution to save your charger.

column3: >: easy-to-unroll solution for a constant traveler.

column2: >Take the Magroll out. As you might guess—your earphones or cables are not dangling out with it.

column9: >Deploy your charger in seconds—just pull the cord. Hold Magroll on your hand, pull the cord, it unwinds like magic.

column8: >Unwind just enough of the Mac-side of the charger for it to reach your MacBook. That cable won’t unwind: the rubber inserts keep it in its place. Hear the satisfactory click.

column1: When done, wind up the thin power cable
column2: click it in the rubber inserts. Slide in the head to the hole at the top

column3: the cable winds up in 6-7 turns. Throw it in your bag, and you are ready to go.

column1: The thick part of the cable never breaks—it’s the thin part that’s the problem, especially the part that connects to the power brick. Using this keeps the connection sturdy, thus it will be harder to break that link. No statistics—yet simple common sense.
This keeps your power brick off the ground: better ventilation, better cooling. Now instead of burning hot, your charger will be just hot.
I have made 10+ prototypes on CAD, and printed dozens on my 3D printer.

Currently, I made a final mock-up, carved using a 5-axis CNC mill, which nearly perfectly mimic its quality and look if Magroll was to be mass-produced through plastic extrusion. The team tested the product for weeks by personal use, and I am now ready for production.
As you know, I want to be uncompromising in quality for this product
column2: Apple designs products for artists, I wanted its peripherals to be just as good. Plastic was my solution. Plastic is strong yet light
column3: perhaps a reason why Apple uses them for the MagSafe chargers in the first place. It has low heat conduction: a good choice for enclosing a power brick that radiates heat.

column1: Plastic extrusion currently provides the best quality and also has the best characteristics for mass-production, yet it is unmatched in the start-up costs. Molds for extrusion are expensive, and I need to make eight for this product—four for the case, four for the rubber inserts. As a student, I am unable to afford the huge lump-sum costs
column2: I am turning to Indiegogo to make this dream become reality.

column1: Variation—last count, I know of 30+ variations of MagSafe chargers: different heads, different cables, different sizes. Some wires are thicker than others
column2: some heads look different. Making this case to be one-size-fits-all was very difficult: it took up most of the design time and concerns.

column1: Mold Costs—Molds are expensive! One wrong data, and BOOM! you have to make them all again. To minimize errors in the molding process, I will be making mockups before production—larger investment, but better quality.

International Shipping—Yes, you might be worried. This is why in case of the US, I will personally travel to the US to ship them from the US. Less danger of overseas shipping. Other countries: your international shipping will be used to protect your product.

Time—I am a high school senior, and I am stuck at school for the next few months. Yet, our school finishes in January, and from then, I am an unemployed high school graduate: Magroll will be my #1 priority since then. That is why manufacturing begins on February: so that I can assure every step is correct.

I have partnered with a company with experience getting hundreds of previous inventors’ dreams come true, and I am very confident I can deliver. I am painstakingly observing every detail related to this project to make sure nothing goes wrong.

Please understand that you are investing in an unfinished product. Some design changes may be made before production—please understand they are all for your benefits. If in a case of failure to deliver the product, you will be entitled to full refunds, yet not for other reasons.
Does it work for all MagSafe chargers?

Yes! It works with MagSafe 1 / 2 chargers, with all power cable configurations. It fits 85W bricks perfectly. However, while it also works with 60W and 45W bricks, it may wobble.  Use on a 45W brick is not recommended.
When shipping, I will be sending a 3D-printable part file via email for using with 60W chargers to stop wobbling.
Four pieces of plastic for main case assembly, four rubber inserts, three M3 hex head bolts and one M3 hex wrench. Digital user manuals and some printable CAD files will also be sent.
Free shipping is included to all orders to US and South Korea. We kindly ask you to add International Shipping for any other locations
And as a person who used it for around a month—it's not that big of a difference.
Why should I use it? It’s too big.
Well, I hope this picture explains it. It seems big until..you know.
You don’t need to buy to help. Share this project online: send it to your Mac friends. It will help them, I promise.
","Tidy It: once you roll it up, it stays that way.Save It: using the thick power cable is the intrinsic solution to save your charger.
Roll It: easy-to-unroll solution for a constant traveler.
Take the Magroll out. As you might guess—your earphones or cables are not dangling out with it.
Deploy your charger in seconds—just pull the cord. Hold Magroll on your hand, pull the cord, it unwinds like magic.
Unwind just enough of the Mac-side of the charger for it to reach your MacBook. That cable won’t unwind: the rubber inserts keep it in its place. Hear the satisfactory click.
When done, wind up the thin power cable
column2: click it in the rubber inserts. Slide in the head to the hole at the top
the cable winds up in 6-7 turns. Throw it in your bag, and you are ready to go.

column1: The thick part of the cable never breaks—it’s the thin part that’s the problem, especially the part that connects to the power brick. Using this keeps the connection sturdy, thus it will be harder to break that link. No statistics—yet simple common sense.
This keeps your power brick off the ground: better ventilation, better cooling. Now instead of burning hot, your charger will be just hot.
I have made 10+ prototypes on CAD, and printed dozens on my 3D printer.

Currently, I made a final mock-up, carved using a 5-axis CNC mill, which nearly perfectly mimic its quality and look if Magroll was to be mass-produced through plastic extrusion. The team tested the product for weeks by personal use, and I am now ready for production.
As you know, I want to be uncompromising in quality for this product
column2: Apple designs products for artists, I wanted its peripherals to be just as good. Plastic was my solution. Plastic is strong yet light
column3: perhaps a reason why Apple uses them for the MagSafe chargers in the first place. It has low heat conduction: a good choice for enclosing a power brick that radiates heat.

column1: Plastic extrusion currently provides the best quality and also has the best characteristics for mass-production, yet it is unmatched in the start-up costs. Molds for extrusion are expensive, and I need to make eight for this product—four for the case, four for the rubber inserts. As a student, I am unable to afford the huge lump-sum costs
column2: I am turning to Indiegogo to make this dream become reality.

column1: Variation—last count, I know of 30+ variations of MagSafe chargers: different heads, different cables, different sizes. Some wires are thicker than others
column2: some heads look different. Making this case to be one-size-fits-all was very difficult: it took up most of the design time and concerns.

column1: Mold Costs—Molds are expensive! One wrong data, and BOOM! you have to make them all again. To minimize errors in the molding process, I will be making mockups before production—larger investment, but better quality.

International Shipping—Yes, you might be worried. This is why in case of the US, I will personally travel to the US to ship them from the US. Less danger of overseas shipping. Other countries: your international shipping will be used to protect your product.

Time—I am a high school senior, and I am stuck at school for the next few months. Yet, our school finishes in January, and from then, I am an unemployed high school graduate: Magroll will be my #1 priority since then. That is why manufacturing begins on February: so that I can assure every step is correct.

I have partnered with a company with experience getting hundreds of previous inventors’ dreams come true, and I am very confident I can deliver. I am painstakingly observing every detail related to this project to make sure nothing goes wrong.

Please understand that you are investing in an unfinished product. Some design changes may be made before production—please understand they are all for your benefits. If in a case of failure to deliver the product, you will be entitled to full refunds, yet not for other reasons.

Yes! It works with MagSafe 1 / 2 chargers, with all power cable configurations. It fits 85W bricks perfectly. However, while it also works with 60W and 45W bricks, it may wobble.  Use on a 45W brick is not recommended.
When shipping, I will be sending a 3D-printable part file via email for using with 60W chargers to stop wobbling.
Four pieces of plastic for main case assembly, four rubber inserts, three M3 hex head bolts and one M3 hex wrench. Digital user manuals and some printable CAD files will also be sent.

We were confused too when Apple got rid of the audio jack. 

Listening to music and charging your phone should never be mutually exclusive – right?

We looked at the market to try and find a solution. They existed, but were bulky, expensive, entangled with wires, and ultimately, never with us when we needed it most. 

So we designed one ourselves. 

...and then turned it into real life.

Meet AdaptKey. 

It comes in 3 colors: Black, Gold &
column2:
Silver.

You will not lose this one.

It's made with a keyring hole so that you can slip it in with your house keys. Take it with you on the go and never lose it in the caves of your backpack.

It's smaller than your thumb. 

And there really is no competitor out there that compares...

These are expensive, heavy and full of wires...

Who are we?

We are Misfit Hacks.


 

Normal people with the same everyday frustrations you have. We like choices -- as you do -- and we get frustrated when companies make decisions for us.
column3: >So frustrated we built a company around it.
column5: >We're a group of designers based out of Los Angeles, California with manufacturing experience out of Asia. We like creating handy products for people to integrate into their everyday lives. Our goal is to create a space that brings together the best of technology, design and the little things that ""change the game"" to help you hack your life.
column7:
>AdaptKey, and this Indiegogo, is the first step to that goal.

Why support us?

This is not about one product. It's about your ability to have choices.

You love your new iPhone, but don't believe in the limits it places on you. Your headphones were working great until you were forced to throw them out and buy more expensive wireless ones (with horrible battery life) for ~$200. We believe in arming you with options to simplify your life, not complicate it.

That's why we designed AdaptKey to be mobile and on you wherever you go.

There's no point having a phone adapter, only to lose it in the depths of your handbag or backpack. You never know when you need these things. Whether you are at home, work, the gym or a coffee shop, chances are you will need to charge your phone and listen to music at the same time. We are putting that choice back in your life.

How you can help?

Purchase an AdaptKey! Your money will go directly into making this product real life. 

Additionally, if you like what we're about, support Misfit Hacks and sign up on http://www.misfithacks.com

We are working as we speak to design more items to help you hack your life. By supporting us now, you are empowering us to do more. 

If you like what we're about but don't want the AdaptKey specifically, that's fine too! Still sign up on http://www.misfithacks.com and we promise to update you on what's next. We are planning to bring more items in all categories to market, not just iPhone related.

What exactly do we need?

Due to manufacturing constraints, we can't place an order to produce the AdaptKey unless it is in bulk (i.e. minimum order quantity). We need your help to crowdfund enough money to place that order and make AdaptKey a reality. 

We are raising $15,000, which will go to the order deposit, fulfillment logistics, insurance, quality control, import taxes (~3% of the total value of goods) and other unexpected costs that arise. Of course, the sky is the limit. The more we raise, the more AdaptKey's we can produce and get into the market. There is only a minimum order quantity, but no maximum! 

We have already done the research &
column9:
development, and have already visited the factory in China to see prototypes. Everything is all set. Now we just need to place an order!

It works! Here's proof:
column11:
showinfo=0"">

Take a look at pictures from our factory visit below.

The chips behind AdaptKey:

The molding tool used to make each AdaptKey:

Risks &
column12:
Challenges

We want to get this funded and in your hands as soon as possible. As soon as we get funded we will place the (already drafted) order with the factory. From there it will be quick to produce and ship out. The production lead time is less than 15 days and we have paired with a logistics company out of Los Angeles, CA to expedite the shipments. Assuming our campaign closes mid-February, we can get AdaptKey into your hands by March.

Please see our timeline below:

--

Why stop here? Buy a Combo Pack and get a iPhone / Android DualCharge cable on top! 

Misfit Hack #2: Use one cable for all your devices. Cut the excess.

The DualCharge cable is revolutionary. It's one cable and one plug that fits into both iPhone and Android. For a few additional dollars, get this with your AdaptKey! Check it out below:

 

--

Please see our perks summary below:

And our social media pages too:

Website: https://www.misfithacks.com

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/misfit.hacks/

Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCvfvQJ3VZ2Wc3v...

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/misfit.hacks/

Lastly, thank you! Whether you purchased AdaptKey, the DualCharge Cable or neither, we appreciate your time and thought.

 ""Enjoy hands-free use of your smartphone anywhere you go with the A-iEasy Lightweight Smartphone Stand. As the lightest and thinnest on the market, this system attaches to the back of your device, so it’s always ready to go."" 

- The Gadget Flow

 

                                                              VISUALLY APPEALING.

Were you aware A-iEasy™?

A-iEasy™ is the world's lightest and thinnest foldable smartphone stand holder that barely needs room. Wholy integrated. Extremmely light, hardly 6g. So thin, just 2,4mm. Designed for people whose priority is to have free hands when using smartphones. Most ergonomic.

Are you one of those who has had to support your mobile against a glass, against books, against the wall... to free your hands?

There are too many drawbacks to do so:
• You spoil the look and feel of your smart.
• It is impossible to place it in the mode and position you need.
• The profile of your smart worns out.
• You have to abandon your task to fetch your smart.
• Your smart will not keep in its initial position very long.
• The risk that your smart slips over the surface and brakes is worth to consider.

We provide you a stylish and intelligent solution to these problems.

 

Makes no difference to keep it everywhere. 

 

You can utilize it easily and safely in both modes in a breeze. 

 

BEFORE/AFTER A-iEasy™:

With A-iEasy™ the child focuses his attention and there is no risk of damage to the smart.

 

                              With A-iEasy™ you use body language as you please.

 

               With A-iEasy™ stress release. Standing up is an option. Quality of life.

 

                                  With A-iEasy™ you can get rid of so much turmoil.

 

With A-iEasy™ there is no hassle or damage of any kind to your devices. Comfy to work &
column2:
style to your life.

 

What are the key features of A-iEasy™?

Millions of people use smartphones nowadays!

Smartphones are constantly used by everyone. Our daily life strongly depends upon the use of smartphones. this is why we have developed a close relationship with them. To improve the quality of this relationship we have created A-iEasy™. The universal and ergonomic gadget that makes it possible to do many things at a time while using the smart.

column1: • It is perfect to provide stability, security to your smart and freedom of movement to yourself.
• You can place it in portrait and landscape modes.
• It is designed to suit all smarts in the world.

LIGHT: Extremmely light, hardly 6 grams.

                                                            A-iEasy™ is the lightest.

 

SLIM: So thin, just 2,4 millimeters.

                                                           A-iEasy™ is the slimmest.

 

ADJUSTABLE: Not surprisingly you can place it in 21 possible positions placed in their different ways.

                                                   A-iEasy™ is the most adjustable.

 

STRONG: So flexible. Successfully tested over 1 million times.

                                                            A-iEasy™ is the strongest.

 

ECO-FRIENDLY: It's made up of non-toxic material and takes care of the environment.

                                    A-iEasy™ is the first eco-friendly in the market.

 

UNIVERSAL: It's suitable to all sort of smartphones available in the market. 

                               Universal A-iEasy™ to suit iPhone, Samsung, Sony...

 

What are the dimensions and views?

A-iEasy™ is just a Must!!!

""as thin as a rack""

You'll surrender before A-iEasy™ at once. 

 

 

 

Why is A-iEasy™ better than others?

A-iEasy™ is the very oustanding piece amongst other similar devices that guarantees security and stability. It's the lightest and thinnest of all.

Universal A-iEasy™ is just more!!!

A-iEasy™ aims to bring you to a closer relationship with your smartphone. It'll broaden your view about technology as you use it.

How does A-iEasy™ work?

A-iEasy™ is designed to be used by everyone. Just four steps: ""Pull, Lock, Twist and Click"" and you are there.

                              A-iEasy™ is the easiest, ""Pull, Lock, Twist and Click""

 

Technology

Our patent pending a sophisticated slim design was engineered to support smarts worldwide. The product comprises of a 3-linkage design, snap lock design and a strongly attached system. The product  contains a sticker and it is made of plastic material. It is compact and environmentaly friendly.
• Designed to fit and give style to your device.
No traces left on your device after removing the sticker.

column3:
showinfo=0"">

Care-free and quality of life you deserve.

column1: • Allows to do different tasks at a time.
• More attention improves the quality of the tasks.
• It makes you realize the power of technology.

A-iEasy™ is adaptable in LANDSCAPE and PORTRAIT modes.

LANDSCAPE mode:

column3:
showinfo=0"">

 

Moreover!!!...ejercise your imagination and creativity and you'll discover a wide range of facilities attached to your A-iEasy™.

A-iEasy™ has been wonderfully designed to be the lightest and the thinnest. Highly stylish indeed.

 

HOW TO INSTALL A-iEasy™?

column1: • Get your smart and clean the surface.
• Find the middle point from down to top of your smart and A-iEasy will be perfectly centred to give stability.
• Attach the gadget on the clean surface starting from down to top of your smart.
• Once your A-iEasy and your smart become one, give A-iEasy a smooth touch to warm it up.It will be fixed.
• If you decide to take it off you can unstick A-iEasy slowly.
• There is spare sticker included in the opp bag.

column3:
showinfo=0"">

 

HOW TO USE?

A-iEasy™ use it easy, follow four steps: pull, lock, twist and click!.

This video shows how to use it.
column5:
showinfo=0"">

 

STABILITY TEST

This video shows A-iEasy™ is completely stable.
column7:
