ADJUSTABLE TEST

This video shows you can place A-iEasy™ in different angles.
column9:
showinfo=0"">

 

POCKET TEST

This video shows A-iEasy™ fits every pocket. You won't notice it.
column11:
showinfo=0"">

 

DROP TEST

This video shows A-iEasy™ won't fall appart or open either. It have 3-linkage design strongly attached will prevent it.
column13:
showinfo=0"">

 

*** OUR CUSTOMIZED COLLECTIONS ***

Which A-iEasy™ is your favorite? Love it!

Don't miss them!

A-iEasy™ allows you to dress up smartphones in a totally different way. It's plain and stylish. A-iEasy™ is universal and you can have as many as you wish for each of the devices you hold. In this campaign we draw your attention to our 40 A-iEasy™ customized creation with updated designs of 4 different collections: COOL, NUDE, POPULAR and VINTAGE as well as the ten pre-existent colours, that include 2 A-iEasy™, white and black, for worldwide tablets and our first customized collection. Some of these colours are glowing in the dark. They'll certainly add up a distinctive touch to your life. It is a great experience.

                                                    A-iEasy™ COOL COLLECTION

                                                     A-iEasy™ NUDE COLLECTION

                                                     A-iEasy™ POPULAR COLLECTION

                                                     A-iEasy™ VINTAGE COLLECTION

 

OUR TEAM, PROJECT SCHEDULE, PATENTS &
column14:
CERTIFICATIONS AND CONTACT INFO:

 

 - IF YOU ARE INTERESTED IN WHOLESALES, THIS IS OUR CONTACT: 

...And remember...    

iEAsy, MakeEasy, LiveEasy and LOVE and Take A-iEasy = ). 

Don't miss it!!!

 

Risks and challenges

What could deter this project? Well...? that you missed the opportunity to get an A-iEasy™ straightaway and help to finance it. There are no worries otherwise. We're safe = )!!!

OK, no more joking.

After  two campaigns,  A-iEasy standard in Indiegogo  and  A-iEasy customized in Kickstarter, we are going to launch A-iEasy customized in Indiegogo.

In this third campaign we feel more confident and we are positive clients will rely on us because we have already been successful. The bulk of the work we did on the two prior campaigns has enriched our experience. 

Our team is something else. We have taken great pains to find the right people at the right time. We have thoroughly estudied each and every detail about this project. We're lucky to count with the support of the greatest technology, which meets up to our expectations in order to satisfy the needs of our costumers. Indeed, the clients are our sponsers and so we're to be efficient.

Our team is in daily contact and takes it seriously that clients are to be satisfied and not to regret their investment. We understand this is a successful project. We have a well-stablished logistic organization to deliver our product to clients by June  2017.

The company leading with the distribution of demands is well-stablished and has 50 years of experience. We are fortunate to get its full support.

We are of full service to you in any queries you may encounter and thank you all so much for being there.

You really make things happen!!!

From our team we send you all the LOVE in the world and all our LOVE. =D. 

Our signature

With the greatest LOVE in the world. =D.

 

FAQ'S

Do you deliver worldwide?

We're certainly aware of the importance to reach each and every corner of the planet.  We do indeed.

 

How much are the costs of the delivery?

Costs depend upon location. In Spain these costs are free. In other countries they'll be different for each level of perks.

 

When do you usually send the rewards?

If we finish our campaign successfully, rewards will be sent off before 31st June 2017.

 

How long do the rewards take to reach their destiny?

After we set up the rewards, they'll take between 6 or 8 days maximum to get to clients who live in countries other than Spain. It'll only take 48 hours if you live in Spain.

 

How and when do I choose my customized A-iEasy model?

Once you've checked the retribution payment and we hold all your contact details, you'll get an e-mail from love@aieasyspain.com. It'll show you every model and their references so that you can choose the ones you like.

 

Have you got any more models? Where can I find them?

In INDIEGOGO (the first campaign we launched) we developed standard A-iEasy as well as the 1st customizeded A-iEasy stand holder. If you're interested in any of them, please let us know via e-mail love@aieasyspain.com.

We're also working on further developments in the near future. Products and models are aimed to be exclusive collections. What's more, we're to create an e-commerce in which to  keep a record of the progress of our creations and advances that enables you to find, compare and contrast them all at easy.

 

Is A-iEasy suitable to all kinds of smartphones regardless of size?

A-iEasy is universal and so it's suitable to all models and sizes at once in the world market.

 

Is A-iEasy suitable to all kinds of tablets regardless of size?

A-iEasy is universal and so it's suitable to all models and sizes in the world market.

By the moment, for tablets we have available white and black colour about our last standar collection.

 

Where and how should I stick A-iEasy to my smartphone?

A-iEasy contains a sticker you must remove. Once you've removed the sticker, you can stick it down at the back of your smartphone.

There's an instruction leaflet included in the pack to make things easy for you. There's even a photo of How it works? From our history record.

 

Can I stick and remove A-iEasy as many times as I want to?  Are there any traces left on the smartphone after removing A-iEasy?

You can remove A-iEasy from your smartphone as often as you wish. The sticker is enviromentally friendly and there're no traces of any kind left on your smartphone afterwards.

In case the sticker gets dirty,  you can replace it for a second one we include in the pack.

 

Is A-iEasy strong and secure?  How long is it supposed to last?

A-iEasy is hard enough and secure. It's made up of hard plastic material and it has been designed with a robust 3-linkage structure aimed to hold all types of smartphones. Moreover, A-iEasy has been tested on flexibility over 1.000.000 times.

 

Is A-ieasy responsible for the environment?

It is indeed. A-iEasy takes care of the environment. This makes us feel really proud. It's made up of material free from chemicals of any sort that could be a thread to either the environment or to our health. The sticker is environmentally friendly too.

 

Could I get my own customized exclusive designs?

You certaily could, you may write to our e-mail love@aieasyspain.com so we could discuss and reach an agreement regarding the quantity that is required for this achievement. 

 

Where do I contact to enquire about wholesales ?

Our team is available  for these kind of enquiries via our e-mail love@aieasyspain.com.

 

Are you ready to share and support our campaign to make it sound everywhere so that we can meet our  target?

Share the campaign link to support us.

 

https://igg.me/at/ustomizedaieasy

 

Instagram: aieasy_spain

Facebook: A-iEasy Spain

Web: www.aieasyspain.com

Correo: love@aieasyspain.com

Moreover!!!...ejercise your imagination and creativity and you'll discover a wide range of facilities attached to your A-iEasy™.A-iEasy™ has been wonderfully designed to be the lightest and the thinnest. Highly stylish indeed. HOW TO INSTALL A-iEasy™?

HOW TO USE?A-iEasy™ use it easy, follow four steps: pull, lock, twist and click!.This video shows how to use it. STABILITY TESTThis video shows A-iEasy™ is completely stable. ADJUSTABLE TESTThis video shows you can place A-iEasy™ in different angles. POCKET TESTThis video shows A-iEasy™ fits every pocket. It have 3-linkage design strongly attached will prevent it. *** OUR CUSTOMIZED COLLECTIONS ***Which A-iEasy™ is your favorite? Love it!Don't miss them!A-iEasy™ allows you to dress up smartphones in a totally different way. It's plain and stylish. A-iEasy™ is universal and you can have as many as you wish for each of the devices you hold. In this campaign we draw your attention to our 40 A-iEasy™ customized creation with updated designs of 4 different collections: COOL, NUDE, POPULAR and VINTAGE as well as the ten pre-existent colours, that include 2 A-iEasy™, white and black, for worldwide tablets and our first customized collection. Some of these colours are glowing in the dark. They'll certainly add up a distinctive touch to your life. It is a great experience.                                                    A-iEasy™ COOL COLLECTION                                                     A-iEasy™ NUDE COLLECTION                                                     A-iEasy™ POPULAR COLLECTION                                                     A-iEasy™ VINTAGE COLLECTION OUR TEAM, PROJECT SCHEDULE, PATENTS & CERTIFICATIONS AND CONTACT INFO:  - IF YOU ARE INTERESTED IN WHOLESALES, THIS IS OUR CONTACT: ...And remember...    iEAsy, MakeEasy, LiveEasy and LOVE and Take A-iEasy = ). Don't miss it!!! Risks and challengesWhat could deter this project? Well...? that you missed the opportunity to get an A-iEasy™ straightaway and help to finance it. There are no worries otherwise. We're safe = )!!!OK, no more joking.After  two campaigns,  A-iEasy standard in Indiegogo  and  A-iEasy customized in Kickstarter, we are going to launch A-iEasy customized in Indiegogo.In this third campaign we feel more confident and we are positive clients will rely on us because we have already been successful. The bulk of the work we did on the two prior campaigns has enriched our experience. Our team is something else. We have taken great pains to find the right people at the right time. We have thoroughly estudied each and every detail about this project. We're lucky to count with the support of the greatest technology, which meets up to our expectations in order to satisfy the needs of our costumers. Indeed, the clients are our sponsers and so we're to be efficient.Our team is in daily contact and takes it seriously that clients are to be satisfied and not to regret their investment. We understand this is a successful project. We have a well-stablished logistic organization to deliver our product to clients by June  2017.The company leading with the distribution of demands is well-stablished and has 50 years of experience. We are fortunate to get its full support.We are of full service to you in any queries you may encounter and thank you all so much for being there.You really make things happen!!!From our team we send you all the LOVE in the world and all our LOVE. =D. Our signatureWith the greatest LOVE in the world. =D. FAQ'SDo you deliver worldwide?We're certainly aware of the importance to reach each and every corner of the planet.  We do indeed. How much are the costs of the delivery?Costs depend upon location. In Spain these costs are free. In other countries they'll be different for each level of perks. When do you usually send the rewards?If we finish our campaign successfully, rewards will be sent off before 31st June 2017. How long do the rewards take to reach their destiny?After we set up the rewards, they'll take between 6 or 8 days maximum to get to clients who live in countries other than Spain. It'll only take 48 hours if you live in Spain. How and when do I choose my customized A-iEasy model?Once you've checked the retribution payment and we hold all your contact details, you'll get an e-mail from love@aieasyspain.com. It'll show you every model and their references so that you can choose the ones you like. Have you got any more models? Where can I find them? In INDIEGOGO (the first campaign we launched) we developed standard A-iEasy as well as the 1st customizeded A-iEasy stand holder. If you're interested in any of them, please let us know via e-mail love@aieasyspain.com.We're also working on further developments in the near future. Products and models are aimed to be exclusive collections. What's more, we're to create an e-commerce in which to  keep a record of the progress of our creations and advances that enables you to find, compare and contrast them all at easy. Is A-iEasy suitable to all kinds of smartphones regardless of size?A-iEasy is universal and so it's suitable to all models and sizes at once in the world market. Is A-iEasy suitable to all kinds of tablets regardless of size?A-iEasy is universal and so it's suitable to all models and sizes in the world market.By the moment, for tablets we have available white and black colour about our last standar collection. Where and how should I stick A-iEasy to my smartphone?A-iEasy contains a sticker you must remove. Once you've removed the sticker, you can stick it down at the back of your smartphone.There's an instruction leaflet included in the pack to make things easy for you. There's even a photo of How it works? From our history record. Can I stick and remove A-iEasy as many times as I want to?  Are there any traces left on the smartphone after removing A-iEasy?You can remove A-iEasy from your smartphone as often as you wish. The sticker is enviromentally friendly and there're no traces of any kind left on your smartphone afterwards.In case the sticker gets dirty,  you can replace it for a second one we include in the pack. Is A-iEasy strong and secure?  How long is it supposed to last?A-iEasy is hard enough and secure. It's made up of hard plastic material and it has been designed with a robust 3-linkage structure aimed to hold all types of smartphones. Moreover, A-iEasy has been tested on flexibility over 1.000.000 times. Is A-ieasy responsible for the environment?It is indeed. A-iEasy takes care of the environment. This makes us feel really proud. It's made up of material free from chemicals of any sort that could be a thread to either the environment or to our health. The sticker is environmentally friendly too. Could I get my own customized exclusive designs?You certaily could, you may write to our e-mail love@aieasyspain.com so we could discuss and reach an agreement regarding the quantity that is required for this achievement.  Where do I contact to enquire about wholesales ?Our team is available  for these kind of enquiries via our e-mail love@aieasyspain.com. Are you ready to share and support our campaign to make it sound everywhere so that we can meet our  target?Share the campaign link to support us. https://igg.me/at/ustomizedaieasy Instagram: aieasy_spainFacebook: A-iEasy SpainWeb: www.aieasyspain.comCorreo: love@aieasyspain.com",31.0,9,"1 Campaign

Coexx Line 1 Timer USB Cable

The product idea is inspired by series of fire incidents because of charging unstable quality of cellphones, powerbank and other rechargeable devices.

Newspaper:

https://www.scmp.com/news/hong-kong/article/214...

It has timer ability which will turn off charging automatically to avoid overcharging your smartphone. How does Coexx Line 1 perform?

It uses attractive red colour round cable. Build quality is decent with sturdy plastic housing. Cable itself is solid as well. There is LED light to display countdown timer in hour. 

One Smart Button to simply press once to increase the timer and quick double click to reduce. You can set up to 9 hours max. It fits for most mobile devices' charging time.

Yes, support both iOS and Android devices’ quick charge as usual. 

As for data transfer, it is working as usual. No issue at all. Just plug and play will do.

Leave No Tracks and Avoid Attacks

Like our ancient ancestors, modern hunters are on the prowl, tracking us in cyberspace, searching for their prey of the day. We know what we're talking about. Our teams have built tech that powers the net. Today more than 300M people in 77 countries rely on our products. In fact, there's a very good chance that these bits are flowing through gateways we built for our beloved cable and wireless companies. These flows are being measured, cataloged and analyzed for a wide range of purposes (good and bad). 

Until now there's been two ways for you to hide from the bad guys:
<li>Disconnect yourself, go off the grid, and learn to love the post office

• Use the infamous (and slow) TOR browser, which is maintained by an organization whose CEO takes keen, personal interest in some of his employees - and was cracked last year by some really smart guys @ Carnegie Mellon funded by a government agency.

So, given these rather limited options, how can a guy or gal get some real privacy these days? Well, thanks to some really smart guys of our own, we've developed Cenotes - your Personal Privacy Appliance (PPA).

column2: >Cenotes is a small, low-cost, carrier-class Internet appliance that sits quietly between your home or office network and your ISP's gateway. Its purpose in life is to enable you to ""hide in plain sight"". Cenotes does this by encrypting and then ricocheting your information flows randomly through PPAs scattered about the globe before delivering them to their destinations. Thus making it virtually impossible for spies and other mischevious eyes to track you online.  It's a devilishly simple concept that is a bit tricky to put to practice.

column1: The good news is we aren't building custom hardware this time around - there's no need for it these days. Cenotes is built with carrier-class software, ported onto the infamous Raspberry Pi 3, which is then coupled to a scalable, redundant service controller. It's seamless, transparent and maintenance free. That said, for those with the need, we also provide a management portal where you can monitor and tweak your PPA to your heart's delight.
And just to be clear, thanks to our clever system design we will never see, hear, touch (or smell) your data traffic at any time (nor will anyone else).
Interested in joining our Cenotes Underground Movement? If so, read on!

column2: >We've been developing Cenotes for the better part of a year and are getting ready to launch our Beta program this October. To make this meaningful we are looking for at least 500 brave souls to sponsor this pioneering adventure.  As a one of our sponsors you can:

column1: • Receive one of the first Cenotes PPAs to hit the street
<li>Get a lifetime of service and software upgrades
• Bring dignity, privacy and security back into this crazy world we live in.

The Beta program is expected to last about 90 days. During this period we will be collecting performance data, your feedback and making tweaks to the plaform accordingly. Software updates will be made to PPAs on an ""as needed"" basis and only in the wee hours of the night.

At the conclusion of the Beta program we will begin making Cenotes available to the general public in the Jan'17 timeframe. We expect to ""sell"" the PPA for $65.00, which covers our loaded costs, and plan to offer the service to residences @ $10/yr and businesses @ $10/yr/employee. These fees will be used to maintain and enhance Cenote's service offerings. Enhancements in the works include Secure Remote Access, Ad Blocking, Tracking Cookie Blocking and some other very clever services.

column2: >We've designed Cenotes for people like us.  People that want to take back their privacy in a world where real-time surveallance, big data analytics and AI driven predictive modeling continue to erode our personal space. To foster this movement responsibly, we've drafted a few rules to muse:

column1: • Cenotes is designed for and intended to be used by people with the legitimate need and desire for enhanced privacy online.  Dark Web product/service providers and their customers need not apply

<li>We reserve the right to refuse to Cenotes to potential customers that have questionable backgrounds or motives.  We also reserve the right to terminate service to such individuals and organizations at anytime
<li>Under no circumstance do we accept responsibility for actions taken by or consquences resulting from people using Cenotes
<li>Cenotes is provided ""as is"" without any warranty, implied or otherwise.  You assume any and all risk and potential losses in its use
column2: • We want you to be active members of the Cenotes Underground Movement.  We welcome open and honest feedback and promise to use your feeback in making Cenotes better for all.

column1: • As Cenotes matures, we will be introducing a ""friends and family"" program to grow the underground movement far and wide, and compensate people in the process.
That's pretty much it.  So what are you waiting for?  Sign up and wait for a special package to arrive at your door!

Like our ancient ancestors, modern hunters are on the prowl, tracking us in cyberspace, searching for their prey of the day. We know what we're talking about. Our teams have built tech that powers the net. Today more than 300M people in 77 countries rely on our products. In fact, there's a very good chance that these bits are flowing through gateways we built for our beloved cable and wireless companies. These flows are being measured, cataloged and analyzed for a wide range of purposes (good and bad). Until now there's been two ways for you to hide from the bad guys:
Disconnect yourself, go off the grid, and learn to love the post office

Use the infamous (and slow) TOR browser, which is maintained by an organization whose CEO takes keen, personal interest in some of his employees - and was cracked last year by some really smart guys @ Carnegie Mellon funded by a government agency.

So, given these rather limited options, how can a guy or gal get some real privacy these days? Well, thanks to some really smart guys of our own, we've developed Cenotes - your Personal Privacy Appliance (PPA).

Cenotes is a small, low-cost, carrier-class Internet appliance that sits quietly between your home or office network and your ISP's gateway. Its purpose in life is to enable you to ""hide in plain sight"". Cenotes does this by encrypting and then ricocheting your information flows randomly through PPAs scattered about the globe before delivering them to their destinations. Thus making it virtually impossible for spies and other mischevious eyes to track you online.  It's a devilishly simple concept that is a bit tricky to put to practice.

The good news is we aren't building custom hardware this time around - there's no need for it these days. Enhancements in the works include Secure Remote Access, Ad Blocking, Tracking Cookie Blocking and some other very clever services.

column3: >The perfect  desktop solution for Apple users

column1: • 10 in 1 connection hub for all your accessories

column2:
>A beautiful clean solution for any desktop

 

XtremeMac

XtremeMac has been designing and producing the finest Apple accessories for almost 20 years. We are proud to launch our first crowd funded project. The SOLUZ is a wireless charging stand with a USB-C hub built into the base. The stand wirelessly charges iPhone and AirPods, while the hub allows for easy connection of your favorite accessories to your Mac or MacBook.

column1: • Qi Wireless Charger for iPhone, iPad and AirPods: 3 Qi-chargers for fast charging.
• Supports 5/7.5/10/15W power charging for iPhone, AirPods and Android.
<li>USB-C Hub: 4K HDMI, Gigabit Ethernet, 3 x USB-C100W USB-C Power Delivery, 2 x USB 3.1, SD &amp

XtremeMac (XM) has been the leader in Apple accessories for almost 20 years.

We are raising funds to bring this unique product to life. By fully funding our product, we will be starting our new line of thoughtfully designed, unique products that enhance the Apple experience, SOLUZions. We are passionate about Apple and the products that connect to the Apple ecosystem.

 

What We Need &
column2:
What You Get

Our goal is to raise $100,000 which will go towards the final engineering, production and packaging. Our global factory relationships allow us to build and deliver premium products to you quickly.

We are offering a great discount on the product for our XtremeMac fans. Best pricing is for the early birds and multipack (we all could use multiple units). 

Your support

Your contribution enables us to finalize the engineering and tool design, as well as start production of the charging stand/hub. Your support is greatly appreciated. We are passionate about bringing the greatest product to you.

SOLUZ is a beautiful, thoughtful device. It has everything you need on your desk, in a simple small package. No mess of hubs and chargers.  Soluz is a sleek, uniquely designed solution that cleans up your desk, while also serving as a complete solution for charging and connectivity.

This is our first crowd funded project, and we are excited to bring everyone into the process of building this great product. We have 20 years of experience in bringing state of the art Apple accessories to the global market.

A great simple design with real materials, designed by people who use and love Apple products everyday. We can’t wait to have you be part of the XM family.

Opportunities

We are excited to get started. Obviously, we are working to get the product completed as quickly as possible so we can get it into your hands. 

We have worked through most of the engineering challenges, and will have the product ready for production once we hit our goal. We actively will be updating our supports on every step of the process. 

 

Other Ways You Can Help

We really appreciate those who are financially supporting us with this project. We also want to thank those who are not ready to jump in but love what we are doing. Thank you all for the support!

Become a partner. Join in and get one of the coolest products around.

For everyone, please share our product. You can share in multiple ways including using the Indiegogo share tools!

 

Thank you again for your support.

The XtremeMac team

Our global factory relationships allow us to build and deliver premium products to you quickly.We are offering a great discount on the product for our XtremeMac fans. Best pricing is for the early birds and multipack (we all could use multiple units). Your supportYour contribution enables us to finalize the engineering and tool design, as well as start production of the charging stand/hub. Your support is greatly appreciated. We are passionate about bringing the greatest product to you.SOLUZ is a beautiful, thoughtful device. It has everything you need on your desk, in a simple small package. No mess of hubs and chargers.  Soluz is a sleek, uniquely designed solution that cleans up your desk, while also serving as a complete solution for charging and connectivity.This is our first crowd funded project, and we are excited to bring everyone into the process of building this great product. We have 20 years of experience in bringing state of the art Apple accessories to the global market.A great simple design with real materials, designed by people who use and love Apple products everyday. We can’t wait to have you be part of the XM family.OpportunitiesWe are excited to get started. Obviously, we are working to get the product completed as quickly as possible so we can get it into your hands. We have worked through most of the engineering challenges, and will have the product ready for production once we hit our goal. We actively will be updating our supports on every step of the process.  Other Ways You Can HelpWe really appreciate those who are financially supporting us with this project. We also want to thank those who are not ready to jump in but love what we are doing. Thank you all for the support!Become a partner. Join in and get one of the coolest products around.For everyone, please share our product. You can share in multiple ways including using the Indiegogo share tools! Thank you again for your support.The XtremeMac team",8.0,0,"1 Campaign

A. What is PAL?

PAL - the name by itself says everything, it is the best buddy that will follow you anywhere you go. It is the new generation's mobile ambient lighting gadget for any phone device, any time and anywhere. We are aiming to be the phone ambient lighting leader in the world with technologies directly integrated into the phone flashlight.

B. Who will be PAL's customers?

The potential user is everyone with a flashlight in a mobile that it can work immediately whenever you need.

C. How does PAL work?

Let PAL magically convert your location to a pretty ambient with no extra batteries needed
column2:
by one simple step:

 just slide a PAL gadget over your flashlight on your phone (whatever your phone's model is, it works in all platforms, with or without phone's cover).....and Voila!! PAL brings magic feeling to your eyes straight away.

D. Did you know?

1. PAL was named MAL at the beginning, that's why you will see in the video and somewhere it still mentions MAL, but the purpose of serving has remained the same, a very good supporter travelling with you day &
column3:
night.

2. PAL is made with 7 chakra colours based on our complete research. Those top colours create the most relaxing vibes for users.

3. PAL can go with you wherever your phone can, even under the shower where your body most relaxed.

4. PAL's surveys have shown that these ambient lights' transformation boost your brain to generate lots of calming flows throughout the neurons and from that your ideas and creativity are formed considerably.

5. PAL under Covid-19 pandemic has strongly confirmed its helpful existence more than ever.  Please have a look on the details below 

E. What has been the real impacts from PAL?

1. This product provides you with peace, love &
column4:
harmony. 9 out of 10 directly fall in love with PAL and would buy it instantly after seeing its transformation.

2. During the lockdown in my family daily life, where we spent lots of time living slowly bonding together, PAL has helped us enjoyed so many meaningful moments just at our own home such as:

- Sleeping: I have 2 babies, one was born in 2019 &
column5:
the other was born in 2020, as you may know, making them both sleep at nights is sometimes a hell of work!!! Luckily, when I tried to apply PAL function, I put all the phones we have, turn flashlights on, and slide PAL gadgets over with different colours...and IT WORKED!!! My babies are both quiet, slowly closing their eyes and fall asleep. I have been so much grateful for this technique.

- Meditation: during the lockdown time, my wife and I spent lots of time meditation to make our inner souls feel calmer, understand ourselves and the current situation happening across the world more, we do chakra meditation every night after the babies sleep. It helps so much with the ambient vibes that PAL provides us, for eg. Monday with Root chakra under red, Thursday with Heart chakra under green or Friday with Throat chakra under blue...The lights surrounded helps a lot for visulising the flowers inside of our bodies and our meditation has become much more quality for our body, soul &
column6:
mind union.

- Chill out: staying at home regulation has created certain pressures for parents to keep the children entertained indoors mostly, and in my case I play a little role like an magician, let my toddler select everyday different colour of PAL in his room, then I made it on, turn on some music and he was like: ""wowwww"", dancing and having fun for a while, the newborn baby was also happy to watch around with excited eyes. As a father, I am so happy with this small little trick.

- Creativity: one of my favorite hobbies is meditation under the cold shower, somehow the light in our bathroom is just too much brighter for a small areas, so what I do is I always keep the light off, I bring my mobile, make PAL on...and thank God, the whole vibe turns just so nice and gentle, I can shower for hours under this ambient as my mind has never been more relaxed and ideas flow was just coming all out efficiently under the water and PAL's atmosphere. I could not believe with small, cheap gadget can bring about so much funs and quality in life. 

And so on..., I hope to receive many feedbacks and stories from everyone in the future how PAL has assisted your life turn better. That would be the most rewarding gift to me and PAL team and the whole purpose of this project.

F. Background Overview

*The first part of my life - called Early Success:

Growing up in Germany with my family, I was fortunate enough when I reached my early 20s, I was successfully brought a household product into many big chains of supermarkets and helped many households to provide good care for their plants in the houses. The utmost satisfaction at that time was when I saw all my products being displayed on the shelves in stores and people bought them, the cashiers scanned their barcodes...And that was when I realized how much I love Product Development so much, not just any products, but those that must bring impact and helpfulness.

*The next part of my life - called Not Giving Up:

 After the early success, together with many events in life, I decided to move to the UK to start a new life in my late 20s. I have lived over 10 Years in the UK now, striving with lots of things and meanwhile building of my passion with the Product Development. With over 15 years of investing time and effort in what I love, it has provided my with huge experiences over many things with a Start-Up: from the Idea to the Prototype, from the industrialization to the Mass production and the market placement. 

With PAL project, I have followed and researched in a long way and already applied on myself. It has helped me a lot in many ways as I am a frequent light - user on many occassions: sleeping, reading, showering, meditating, playing with my children...The normal flashlight on our phone is just too much, if you agree with me, and with a small shift, a small gadget becomes the real game changer. PAL has taught me about patience, love and harmony to myself and my family, and under no circumstances, I will NOT GIVE UP my dream and passion somewhere in life. We have made it through the pandemic with love till now and we would live to spread it to anyone in need of it.

*The coming part of my life - called You Made It:

Of course, any Start-Up's journey is not easy, it has been going with many different experiements in the lab, to make sure about the quality of the product, and its versatile in any platforms. And it worths every single effort as I always believe that good things take times, and hard work pays off one day.

Finally I could fulfill my passion with something that I love by myself, and hopefully I can be able to return an added value to the society, rather than just taking, taking, and taking. 

We are ready to give up the big stake of our margin in order to make our dream come true. And definitely you are as single investors, will help this path become possible. We appreciate any of small support to complete the name You Made It in this chapter.

 

G. Risks &
column7:
Challenges

Any business always has its risk &
column8:
challenges, and we are not exceptional. However, as founder and invetors of PAL, we have done a thorough risk analysis to understand our proposition in the market and our core competences and well planned for it.

- We know that our technology is ahead of everyone else and this is just the beginning.

- We welcome every similar product on the market as proof that our concept is brilliant.

- We are working hard to provide high-end edge technologies to our customers and cannot wait to establish the trust of keeping our promise, by constantly improving and being up to date with the market demand.

Please rest assured that we have worked deeply to mitigate the risk at best and the result will make the noise for our beloved users.

     

     

    H. What We Need &
column9:
What You Get

Folks let's get on an enlightened journey together, you can follow and see by yourself how PAL transform a boring room to a  one with your selected colours without flashing directly in your eyes and disturbing the great atmosphere alone, with friends, family in style.

Your Mobile &
column10:
PAL is all you need, Mobile Ambient Light helps you to spend more quality time in any room. 

This Game Changer product starts with its first version, and will move to the next level wherever the universe respond to our efforts through our customers' support. Our plan of deployment in the forthcoming future:

column1: <li><i>Preparing the Product for industrial mass production &amp
• Mainstream Marketing with up to 10 million Impressions and engagements.

column2: development into integrated versions of the mobile device.

column1: • Be the global leader in mobile lighting technology
To break it down for you in more detail on how we are going to make it together with you:
• To scale the first version we need to secure production and be ready to deliver within the estimated time frame.
• We cannot wait to make this product available for the mass. Everyone will enjoy in their own way, satisfaction guaranteed.
• To value you and your trust we will keep you updated frequently with our newsletter via email and you will also receive the PAL product before everyone else does.
• On top of that with a trust discount of 70% to the RRP of 12£.
• Everything will be reinvested to develop PAL to the next level.

Do not miss out on the chance to participate in the game-changing movement. 

Looking for more information? Check the project FAQ

The First Robotics Competition

We are The Poros, a robotics team that competes throughout the FRC.
We are participating the FRC for the 2nd year now.
Our first year of competing awarded us within our country with awards such as third place of leading alliances, 'rookies highest seeds' and our most valuable award which was our country's 'rookies all star', which gave us the option to go and represent our country on the global FRC games in Saint Louis Missouri, and winning the global 'Rookies all star' award, meaning we were the best rookies to participate in the competition worldwide.

What Do We Need?

We, as a second year team, are limited with our supplies and money.
This is why we are in the need of your help.
Here are some subjects that we think should be cleared out before you contribute.

  • Your contribution is going directly to building and manufacturing the best robot that is possible to assemble with the money given to us.
    Nontheless in order to get as high as we can on the leaderboard, we need every cent you can donate and every single dollar is more appreciated then ever.
    Our team spends tremendous amount of money and time each year to even be able to participate FRC, spending almost 20000$ to get in the competition and manufarcturing our parts to the robot.
    Building the demo of the field also requires amount of money that we are in the lack of due to us being a second year team.
    Even though last year we had almost no money to spend on the robot, we made most of our parts using our creativity and assembling the parts out of recycled materials, which means that if you help and contribute and we will have money, our robot will win much more award and will function with more efficiency.
  • Your contribution will not go unnoticed!
    all of the donors will recieve a token of our appreciation that will be mentioned in the donating options in the page.
  • The funding we will gather will go directly to the manufacturing of our robot even if we dont reach our final goal, and thats because every donation is importent, appreciated and will be used.

Our Competition With A Bit More Details

The FRC throughout this year is all about the middle ages.
Two alliances go against each other with their fearsome robots.
The main goal of the games is to cross the enemy's traps, called outerworks and to supposedly break their defenses.
each time you pass a defense you are getting an amount of points.
there are boulders on the ground on the arena in specific area, and the goal is to score them into the opponent's castle, causing the tower to lose its point, leading to it's downfall.
all of those goals of the game awards you with diffrent points amount which causes your alliance either to win, lose or get to a draw situation with the enemy alliance.
alliances changing throughout the games and thats the reason why our robot has to operate with itself as good as its operating with the teams of the alliances.

  • The competition is made to encourage teenagers to participate and create robot out of scratch, causing the teams to gain experience how to work with teams, learning how to co-operate with teammates and most importently getting a sneak pick into the robotics world which we are living in today.
  • We have proven ourselves as a rookie team by winning the global best rookie team award and getting to the 'Rookies All Star', following another set of awards we got in our country.
  • We will be more than happy to get contribution and every contribution will be important, from 1$ up to 200$ or more we will be exited and greatful to anyone who donate us what he can.

The Big Challenge

Within the 6 weeks of building we are facing an tremendous amount of challenges, the mechanisms, the media works of the team, the sponsering that people give us and the one we are trying to get and many more.
But even though we are facing challenges we have proven before, while we were rookies that we can face challenges with astounding efficiency and creativity.
Your contribution will help us to get over those challenges and face them with more efficiency throughout the final weeks of building.

  • As mentioned we have already overcomed tremendous amount of challenges like our economic state of last year and even mechanism problems we had last year and are having right now. 
  • this challenges are being dealt with as you read this, we are working non-stop, day and night in our workshop to overcome those problems and issues so no worries, we are working!

Got No Way To Donate? You Can Still Help Us!

even if you cant really donate and dont meet the requirements to do so you can still help us!

  • Spread the rumor! 
    Go to your manager, boss, friends and family and tell them about this project!
    We would really appreciate even if you just tell people about the FRC project, this is a project with great cause of getting teenagers familiar to the robotics industry
  • Use Indiegogo share tools and you can make your own contribution causes!!!

Love is all around, but some cash will be nice too :)
Have a good day !

WIST is a revolutionary earphone case – never waste your time untangling your earphones again.

Benefits :

column3:
>WIST not only saves your time, it also protects your earphones from damaging. With WIST case, you will no longer need to find complicated ways of winding up your earphones to keep them from tangling chaotically. You will also avoid damaging the cable while trying to untangle it.

While designing the case, we didn’t think only about the practical use. We were striving to make our product not only a basic earphone case, but also a stylish accessory.

The case is suitable for all types of earphones with cable length up to 120 cm. Of course, we didn’t forget about the volume control – it can easily fit too. You can use our case even with headphones – they just need to have a thin cable typical for earphones.
column4:
>

 

Short infomation :

The first draft was made back in 2015. We had the idea, but also a lot of other responsibilities in work and school – so we didn’t have enough time for the required development. We got back to the idea last year and started making prototypes. Of course, we were encountering some hitches, like everybody designing a new product does. There was a couple of trials and errors, but at the beginning of 2017, we made our first functional case. However, we weren’t really satisfied and kept on improving the design. The goal was to unite the functionality and stylish look as neatly as possible. In May 2017, we were finally happy with the result. At that moment, we had to start worrying about the “mass” production and the best way to offer our product to public. We sorted both of these problems with croudfunding campaign that would help us with the initial costs. It seemed like the best way to introduce a new product to the market.
column5:
>

The first batch, manufactured specially for you – our supporters, will come in a number of colours: matte black, blue, green, violet, yellow and also a special “Indiegogo color” available only for the first 50 of you. Cases in this style will be manufactured just this time.

We plan to ship first cases in the first quarter of 2018, all supporters should receive their cases by the end of the first half of 2018. These plans may vary depending on the length of the campaign and our production abilities.

 

What We Need &
column6:
What You Get :

Currently, we have all the necessary 3D models and a functional prototype. These prototypes were created with 3D printing technology. This technique is however not suitable for a larger production, so we decided the best choice is to use technology of injection moulding – hot plastic material is injected into a mould and cooled down to harden. With this technology, we can achieve higher quality and durability. What we need now are the moulds for injecting, so we can start production on a larger scale and thus reduce the costs per case and cheaper prices.

Raised money will cover the costs of moulds used for the mass production of our cases. That’s the main point of this campaign and makes 80 % of the goal amount we would like to raise. The other 20 % goes for final touches and more cosmetic adjustments. Of course, if we raise more, we want to invest into better machinery and materials, to make our cases in an even higher quality.
column7:
>

In the case of a successful campaign, we plan to start manufacturing the cases in premium materials (wood, metal or leather) and expand our collection with unique designer pieces that would better suit your personal style. A special collection “only you” wil allow you to design your own personalized case.

If we reach:

17 000 $ – we will manufacture a special edition of a transparent cases

19 000 $ – special WIST case with an earbuds protection

20 000 $ – wooden case

22 000 $ – metal case

","WIST is a revolutionary earphone case – never waste your time untangling your earphones again.Benefits :

column1: WIST not only saves your time, it also protects your earphones from damaging. With WIST case, you will no longer need to find complicated ways of winding up your earphones to keep them from tangling chaotically. You will also avoid damaging the cable while trying to untangle it.While designing the case, we didn’t think only about the practical use. We were striving to make our product not only a basic earphone case, but also a stylish accessory.The case is suitable for all types of earphones with cable length up to 120 cm. Of course, we didn’t forget about the volume control – it can easily fit too. You can use our case even with headphones – they just need to have a thin cable typical for earphones. Short infomation :The first draft was made back in 2015. We had the idea, but also a lot of other responsibilities in work and school – so we didn’t have enough time for the required development. We got back to the idea last year and started making prototypes. Of course, we were encountering some hitches, like everybody designing a new product does. There was a couple of trials and errors, but at the beginning of 2017, we made our first functional case. However, we weren’t really satisfied and kept on improving the design. The goal was to unite the functionality and stylish look as neatly as possible. In May 2017, we were finally happy with the result. At that moment, we had to start worrying about the “mass” production and the best way to offer our product to public. We sorted both of these problems with croudfunding campaign that would help us with the initial costs. It seemed like the best way to introduce a new product to the market.The first batch, manufactured specially for you – our supporters, will come in a number of colours: matte black, blue, green, violet, yellow and also a special “Indiegogo color” available only for the first 50 of you. Cases in this style will be manufactured just this time.We plan to ship first cases in the first quarter of 2018, all supporters should receive their cases by the end of the first half of 2018. These plans may vary depending on the length of the campaign and our production abilities. What We Need & What You Get :Currently, we have all the necessary 3D models and a functional prototype. These prototypes were created with 3D printing technology. This technique is however not suitable for a larger production, so we decided the best choice is to use technology of injection moulding – hot plastic material is injected into a mould and cooled down to harden. With this technology, we can achieve higher quality and durability. What we need now are the moulds for injecting, so we can start production on a larger scale and thus reduce the costs per case and cheaper prices.Raised money will cover the costs of moulds used for the mass production of our cases. That’s the main point of this campaign and makes 80 % of the goal amount we would like to raise. The other 20 % goes for final touches and more cosmetic adjustments. Of course, if we raise more, we want to invest into better machinery and materials, to make our cases in an even higher quality.In the case of a successful campaign, we plan to start manufacturing the cases in premium materials (wood, metal or leather) and expand our collection with unique designer pieces that would better suit your personal style. A special collection “only you” wil allow you to design your own personalized case.If we reach:17 000 $ – we will manufacture a special edition of a transparent cases19 000 $ – special WIST case with an earbuds protection20 000 $ – wooden case22 000 $ – metal caseWe thank you for sharing our campaign on social networks and welcome any press contacting us. Have you ever felt like time is moving to fast?
Do you have trouble being in the moment for more then a few seconds?
Just take a time and go slow with Word Clock.
Just recently, I've been working on new concept of Word Clock with unusual approach for it.
Instead of showing the time like in classical type of clock with the hands or numbers, it shows you a time by displaying the text on the transparent surface.
It is a extraordinary clock with clean and ascetic, spartan design making a stylish addition to any desk, shelf or bedside table.
What is also unique about this timepiece is that time is displayed about each 5 minutes periods. In today rush environment we can slow down and contemplate little bit our life.
Beautiful engrave text give to a Word Clock unique style and timeless appearance.
Word Clock enriches the place where you work, live and rest.
It was created to be modern, minimal and timeless.  Its sole purpose is to tell time, while subtly reminding you of the importance of the passing minutes.
Basic geometric layout was chosen to create the body for the clock, making it extremely simple, and clean with realization of concept of ascetic (spartan) design.
Accelerate time shows how time is passed over the segments of display
If you would like to get more dynamics on the display you can just change with one button click to seconds display mode.
Seconds are shown by sum of displayed segments.
Depend on reward what you will choose, Word Clock come to you with different type of easy exchangable displays. There are 8 types of displays available.
If you will choose reward with 8 type of displays you will get elegant base for them out of charge, to have all of them in one place.
There is a also normal type of numbers like in classical digital type of clock which you can use with Word Clock
Depend on your mood and the place where you are you can play around with changing the 22 available colours on display any time you want.
You can adjust brightness of Word Clock any time you want from 12 desired levels.
Adjust brightness level of the Word Clock to fit the best the brightness of the the place where it is.
Word Clock come to you with 7 types of display mode.
Regardless of the fact that the time is displayed in five minutes period of time, in the background working real time clock system which keeps time like in normal clock.
Basically you can seted once and just enjoy how the time is changing on the display.

Thanks to the power back up, you can basicaly forget about setting it up. Internal clock can run for a days without external power source. Without any worry you can disconnect it and move it to another place where you will enjoy it.
Interaction with Word Clock is very simple and intuitive.
To go through all of the functions there is a one button.
Button interact for three type of click
• short click (up to 0,5 second) - step forward in the current function
• long click (from 1 second up 2 seconds) - step in or out in to/from current function
• reset (from 10 second) - reset Word Clock to default settings
The main loop include following functions and sub functions
On the back of the Word Clock you will find algorithm and all functions to improve interaction and avoid any additional paper instruction.
Word Clock is supplied with standard popular Micro USB connector.
You can basically use any type of phone charger with Micro USB connector and current around 1.2A when you would like to run clock with full brightness with all LEDs.
You can even use Power Bank to run your Word Clock.
For how long it last battery depend on the colour, brightness and mode chosen.
For example with Power bank supply around 3500mA Word Clock can go around 2 days with brightness on the level 4 and constant display of time with orange color.
Brightness on the level 4 is fine even in even sunny day on your desk.
Please share this campaign with your friends and family to help unlock following rewards.
• Unlock Binary Clock - 20k$ - each person who pledge for  Word Clock will receive out of chage display for Binary Clock + software implementation of displaying it.
Standard version of all Word Clock come to you with white engrave laminate, but after reaching specific Stretch Goals Silver and Black edition will be unlocked.
When following targets will be reached, please contact with us by email to get color version you want to have it, otherwise you will get white color version.
There are 5 types of rewards that you can chouse it from.
2 x Word Clock with 3 exchangeble displays each set.
This set fit to you and for your family and friends.
Word Clock with 8 exchangeble displays and stand for them.
You can also make a gift for you friends and family.
You can just pledge for Word Clock you want to get for them and let us know where we have to shipped.

2018 Week 18 - Indiegogo campaign start
2018 Week 23 - Indiegogo campaign end
2018 Week 26 - Funds come to account
2018 Week 27 - Order Word Clock production
2018 Week 32 - Word Clock arrived
2018 Week 34 - first batch 30 Word Clock ready to be shipped
2018 Week 35 - second batch 30 Word Clock ready to be shipped
2018 Week 36 - third batch Word Clock ready to be shipped
2018 Week 38 - start shipping In demands Founders
There is a little risk involved in backing this project, because design has been already tested. Over the year we went through 4 iteration of Word Clock.
First type of risk is to keep the timeline regarding delivery - mainly it depends on how many rewards has to be delivered. Estimated timeline was done base on demand around 60-70 Word Clocks.

This is my fourth campaign and two more I supported concerning organization and technical details.
Base on experience from previous campaigns, I see that this should take around 2-3 months from the end of the campaign until delivery of all rewards to your hands. I'm trying to be realistic with this estimations.
Nonetheless I am determinate to fit in the given time frame.

column2: >Media Kit - high photo quality

column1: Thanks for staying to the very end, just take a look on bonus video with thank you for your support :)

My name is Aaron Rasor, CEO and Founder of Rasor Thin Wireless LLC. I would like to introduce you to the QiPet wireless charger. I founded this company to bring my innovative ideas to the world. I am a service connected disabled veteran and a ""tech nerd"". Through my research I saw a need for a different kind of wireless charging station. Currently you can buy hundreds of different wireless chargers, but they all have one thing in common. They are meant for the upscale, suit and tie, business executive type. Though our company has nothing against them we knew there was an opening in the market for everyone else. Currently wireless chargers are flat, some round, some oval, some plastic, some wood, and in a word, they are ""boring"".  We believe it is time to bring wireless charging to the rest of the world with a new design. A cute, soft, and fully compatible wireless charger that anyone can set on their nightstand, desk, living room table, or anywhere you need to charge your mobile devices.  With multi-positional charging you can now charge your phone while watching a video, listening to music, or any other task at a comfortable angle and without worrying about scratching your expensive mobile device.
Please help us to bring QiPet to the world. The prototype is complete and now we are looking for help to get the product to market.

• We are looking to raise money to have QiPet mass produced. The funding will go towards perfecting our design, designing packaging, certifications, creating several more animal designs, and of course, spreading the word of this radical design twist for wireless charging.
• Our Perks include a discounted price for our first contributors and will include email updates and early access to future products.
• We are fully dedicated to this project and will continue forward with the company and new designs as quickly as possible.
• Your contributions will ensure we can grow rapidly and expand our product line in a timely manner.
We understand that some people just can't contribute at this time, but that doesn't mean you can't help:

• Please help us to spread the word about QiPet and our company. Make sure to click the Indiegogo share links and of course share our links TheQiPet.com  and our Facebook Page on all of your favorite social media sites.

• Does the QiPet include a battery?
    • No, you can use any existing USB compatible charger or USB powered cable with a micro USB connector to power QiPet. Future models will include an internal battery to power if this campaign is successful.

• Are there other animals, I want a ******* not a panda?
    • If this campaign is successful we have many other design and product ideas. Extended goals will be available as the campaign goes on!!!

• My phone has wireless charging but is a differnt size than the phones shown, will it work? 
    • Yes, our innovative triple coil design on the charging board allows you to place the phone in a number of positions for charging.

• This sounds like a great idea, I would like to look at options for investing, how can I invest in your company? 
    • Please email us at QiPets@gmail.com to discuss further.

column3: '>​Want to earn a free QiPet from our future line of animal designs? Simply help us be successful by referring friends to our campaign. If you can get 15 people to purchase a Perk through the referral program on Indiegogo you will earn a FREE QiPet from our future released animal designs (or a full refund of your original Perk purchase).

column1:
• How to Track Your Results:
    Log into your Indiegogo account.
    ​Click on your user name beside the search box at the top right of the page.
    Select the “My Profile” option.
    Click on the tab that says “Referrals” for the latest totals of referrals and contributions.
    See the number of referrals and your total referred contribution amount.
• Log in to Indiegogo. Then, visit our campaign page on Indiegogo and look to the right of the main video to share using Indiegogo’s  social media share tools.
• You must be a backer on Indiegogo to qualify. Each backer has a unique Indiegogo ID and unique referral URL.

Sincerely:  

CEO / Founder: Aaron Rasor
Sergeant First Class, Retired, United States Army

My name is Moe and I’m an entrepreneur and pet stylist!

I currently own my own family run dog grooming store and mobile grooming van.

Over the past five years I have been taking pictures of the most exotic and good looking dogs that I've groomed. These photos inspired me to begin a line of hand drawn pet portrait based on my four legged customers.

Join the Revolution!

Are you a Windows Phone Fan?  This is your Moment!

We are WhartonBrooks, a company that uses emerging technologies to create high growth opportunities.  Join our revolution to redefine smartphones with our Cerulean Moment that features Windows 10 Mobile.
column3:
showinfo=0"">

We are a company found by Windows Phone fans to bring smartphones to market for fans of Windows 10 Mobile.

 

We are proud to announce the Cerulean Moment. Our new modern personal computer that is in a category all its own. It is the one device that is all devices - your smartphone, desktop PC, media streamer, and so much more.  All powered by Windows 10 mobile.

We aim to simplify the computing you do at work, home, and while on the go. Our vision is helping you be productive, creative, and have fun everywhere you go.  The Cerulean Moment is the one device that takes care of all your computing needs in every Moment.

We are fans of the most innovative platform - Windows 10 mobile!  The only mobile OS capable of ushering in a whole new level of disruptive personal computing that breaks the mold of current thinking to create a new path.  Modern personal computing allows your device to seamlessly transform based on your computing needs. WhartonBrooks is leveraging this modern personal computing platform to bring our own brand of innovation targeted toward the fans of Windows phone.

Our founder, Greg Murphy, created WhartonBrooks to bring exciting technologies to the fans of Window phone to help them create, have fun, and to be adventurer - to be ready for moments Everywhere you go.

 

 

Time for Fans to Step Up!

To jump start our company we need 3,900 Windows Phone fans to join the revolution. WhartonBrooks is poised to bring new experiences and products to market to grow our platform to new heights.  It is up to us, the fans, to make it happen.

The Cerulean Moment is our smartphone powered by Windows 10 Mobile, which features the disruptive Continuum technology! This dual screen technology is unique to Windows 10 Mobile that is the next level of personal computing.

Reaching our funding goal allows us to continuing innovating and bringing Windows smartphones to the fans. We are the only company 100% dedicated to promoting and growing our Windows Phone market.

***Cerulean Knights – Signed up for preorder?  You will get a secret link for additional discounts!***

Specs and Features

column1: 1.5 GHz Qualcomm® Snapdragon™ 617 octa-core processor with 550 MHz Adreno 405 GPU

Front Camera: 5.0MP with Auto-Focus with Dual LED Flash
Main Camera: 13MP BSI with Auto-Focus

The Real Challenge

Creating a new smartphone company is only for the committed entrepreneur.  Getting this far has been an amazing journey.  Though the smartphone market is a competitive nightmare, the Windows phone market is wide-open and rich with MILLIONS for of the most dedicated fans and enthusiasts.  We are here for you and we are here to stay.  We made it this far and we will bring it home together!

Other Ways You Can Help

You have ordered your Cerulean Moment, what else can I do?  Share our story! Join us on

Reach Us On Twitter:  @WhartonBrooks   |   @Ceruleanmobile | @WhartonBrooksBR

Reach Us On Facebook: WhartonBrooks  |   Cerulean Mobile |

","Join the Revolution!Are you a Windows Phone Fan?  This is your Moment!We are WhartonBrooks, a company that uses emerging technologies to create high growth opportunities.  Join our revolution to redefine smartphones with our Cerulean Moment that features Windows 10 Mobile.We are a company found by Windows Phone fans to bring smartphones to market for fans of Windows 10 Mobile. We are proud to announce the Cerulean Moment. Our new modern personal computer that is in a category all its own. It is the one device that is all devices - your smartphone, desktop PC, media streamer, and so much more.  All powered by Windows 10 mobile.We aim to simplify the computing you do at work, home, and while on the go. Our vision is helping you be productive, creative, and have fun everywhere you go.  The Cerulean Moment is the one device that takes care of all your computing needs in every Moment.We are fans of the most innovative platform - Windows 10 mobile!  The only mobile OS capable of ushering in a whole new level of disruptive personal computing that breaks the mold of current thinking to create a new path.  Modern personal computing allows your device to seamlessly transform based on your computing needs. WhartonBrooks is leveraging this modern personal computing platform to bring our own brand of innovation targeted toward the fans of Windows phone.Our founder, Greg Murphy, created WhartonBrooks to bring exciting technologies to the fans of Window phone to help them create, have fun, and to be adventurer - to be ready for moments Everywhere you go.  Time for Fans to Step Up!To jump start our company we need 3,900 Windows Phone fans to join the revolution. WhartonBrooks is poised to bring new experiences and products to market to grow our platform to new heights.  It is up to us, the fans, to make it happen.The Cerulean Moment is our smartphone powered by Windows 10 Mobile, which features the disruptive Continuum technology! This dual screen technology is unique to Windows 10 Mobile that is the next level of personal computing.Reaching our funding goal allows us to continuing innovating and bringing Windows smartphones to the fans. We are the only company 100% dedicated to promoting and growing our Windows Phone market.***Cerulean Knights – Signed up for preorder?  You will get a secret link for additional discounts!***Specs and Features

I am Akshay PL, a 21 year old Electrical and Electronics Engineering student from Bengaluru, India. I have been tinkering around with electronics for a long time now and found my interest  in Virtual Reality a couple of years back. With Current generations of Desktop grade VR headsets being expensive it has left no choice to many who are interested in VR to choose Mobile VR solutions. Smartphone VR is getting a huge boost in the recent times. However, the computational power isn't still upto the mark to get PC level graphics on a smartphone.
The Monitor Mod Features and Use cases

This led to my Idea of a smartphone that could take in the video feed from a computer and transform the smartphone into a desktop grade VR headset. While no smartphone company had any such intentions as this to be embedded onto their product till date, the Moto Mods came as a much needed short cut. And thus, The Monitor Mod concept was born. This Moto Mod will feature an HDMI input and an app on the software side which provides a wide range of use cases-
• As a low latency PC VR headset with a Quad HD display.
• Portable Monitor for Photographers to view shots in real time.
• As a monitor for tiny computers such as the Raspberry Pi.

There is also a 3.5 mm jack beside the HDMI input port which is actually an RCA composite Video input port which supports both NTSC and PAL formats. The use cases of port is primarily for FPV flying since a majority of the current drone FPV rigs use analog video signals generally moduated in the 5.8GHz band to minimize the latencyto as less a possible

This campaign will help me bring my concept into reality and also help me improve the product by adding wireless capabilities such as 60GHz Wireless HD receiver and also a 40 channel 5.8 GHz FPV receiver module.

The funds from this campaign will mainly go into the development and designing of the Monitor Mod which includes component sourcing, PCB designing, 3D modeling, 3D printing, prototyping and a whole lot more before I can start mass production.

A minimum funding of $15,000 would be needed to even think about mass production as the product is still in concept stage (although we have the complete idea and skill set of turning it into an actual product). If the fund doesn't reach the expected goal, I'll only be able to make prototypes of the product and share the details to help others build the product on their own with the help of the Moto Development Kit (MDK).

If the campaign exceeds the goals, we will include perks such as giving away the first finished product with custom engraving of the highest fund contributor.

There's this satisfaction in getting these notes. Satisfaction in writing it, folding it, unfolding it, and finally reading it. This doesn't happen anymore. I wanted to put an app out there that puts a new spin on passing notes. So that today's generation can have this experience on their phone and my generation can have a nostalgic experience. We've done the design and built the prototype -- a total bootstrap effort with help from family and friends. We're in the final push to make this app happen and with your contribution, we can pay for the development cost to turn the prototype to a production-ready app free for everyone to enjoy.

Cost Breakdown: (This is where your contribution will go)
Schedule: Available to our backers for early beta use in September. We'll be ready to build the app as soon as we're funded.

Since I’ve launched my crazy crowdfunding campaign on Monday, my Dad has called me a few times. Trying to find the right words to ask me why I’m doing what I’m doing. ‘I’m crowdfunding Dad’. My 75 year old dad doesn’t understand what ‘crowdfunding’ is – actually not a lot do. ‘I’m literally asking each and everyone for a donation to help me build this app’. Silence. He still doesn’t get it, nor does he understand what an ‘app’ even is. Even over the phone, I can feel his sadness. ‘Because I’m chasing my dream Dad. Because I don’t want to regret not putting myself out there and not knowing the full potential of this idea.’ Now I know what it means to crowdfund. Putting yourself out there and just really going for it … it’s so scary … but at the same time … I feel alive.

I’m asking you friends, family, colleagues, people who are liking this page to support me in building this app because I know I can bring this to life. This is what I do, I manage software projects. It’s so close, you can see in the prototype videos where all my free time has been spent. Learning photoshop and all kinds of tools to bootstrap this campaign. I believe that passing notes, writing it, reading it, brings feel good feelings. I believe that. I don’t want the art of passing notes to die. I want to make it even more fun. I want people to feel what I felt when I got these folded notes.

You’ve liked this page, looked at our content and liked it. I now need your support to reach our goal by June 30. You’ll be part of making this app. You can give us feedback – be part of this process. You’ll be part of something that could be something special. You’ll get to download the app for free in September, use it daily, enjoy it, feel good, make others feel good. We are hustling like never before. So I’m asking, for an exchange, between you and I.

If we reach our goal, we can move forward and build the app. We only have until June 30. We’ve already talked to awesome developers who are ready to build it. But if we don’t make our goal, we can’t bring this new and at the same time nostalgic experience to life. Back us. It’s a labor of love.

PRESS RELEASE: http://www.einpresswire.com/article/269410381/back-to-high-school-future-with-lockr-app by best-crowdfunding-websites.com

SolarX is beautifully and unapologetically designed. Its carefully sculpted shape and seductive contours truly reveals the work of art that went into the design.
column5:
>

Made with high-impact resistant acrylonitrile butadiene styrene (ABS) and durable polycarbonate (PC), its curved and smooth body naturally conforms to the palm of your hand.
column9:
>

At Solocharg, we hand-pick the finest parts for our devices. That's why SolarX has a 1.5W thin, high-efficiency epoxy resin-encapsulated solar panel.
column13:
>

SolarX has an exceptionally powerful and remarkably safe rechargeable battery. With its 10,000mAh battery capacity, you will expect SolarX to be heavy, it’s actually not. It's surprisingly light.
column17:
>

With the built-in USB-C ports, you will be thrilled to see your devices charge faster than usual. Plus, you can be confident to charge your most power-hungry devices at their maximum charge rates. 

We engineered SolarX to charge any device from any manufacturer. Not only that, we also rigorously tested it with smartphones, tablets, MP3s, cameras, e-readers, earpieces and more.
column21:
>

SolarX automatically detects your devices and allows them to use the maximum power needed and maximum charge rate for super-fast charging. 

During our initial tests, we watched an Apple iPhone 5S charge from 0% to 60% in just 30 minutes
column22: and a Samsung Galaxy S4 from 0% to 60% in just 40 minutes. The full charge times were 1.25 hours for the iPhone, and 1.50 hours for the Galaxy.
column27:
>

Why wait for one device to charge before charging the next? Your life is empowered by many great gadgets. That’s why SolarX allows you to charge up to two devices simultaneously.
column31:
>

We know you own and cherish various fun gadgets. Unfortunately, they sometimes have different charging ports. With that in mind, your SolarX ships with two fast-charge cables (Micro USB and Apple Lightning) and an optional USB-C to USB-A adapter.

column6:
>

SolarX has a crystal-clear, cool-white, super-bright LED flashlight. Its 32 lumens combined with a wide 120-degree viewing angle, ensure that a large area is well illuminated.

>

The built-in micro USB port lets you recharge SolarX whenever you get a low battery indication.

column1: With the Solocharg SolarBoost technology, the solar panel will quietly and quickly recharge the internal battery
column2: so you don’t have to. That way, SolarX will always be ready for when you need it.

column1: By boosting the energy of the solar panel, the internal battery almost always has an energy reservoir for the next device charging cycle.
Protect and personalize your SolarX with a multi-color, multi-function protective case that allows you to kickstand, hang, or hook your SolarX for maximum sunlight capture.

We are a team of dedicated and experienced engineers, designers, and product developers. We have been working hard to bring you SolarX and we are certain that you will love it. However, without an initial capital, SolarX will not be able to make it into the hands of people, like you, who need power on the go.
column2:
>

The fund raised on Indiegogo will go toward manufacturing, parts procurement, assembly line setting, and production of SolarX.

column1: With your help, SolarX will become a part of many people's lives and those in urgent need of such an innovative device will be ever so grateful for your contribution.

Lightors is a young company that contributes to the development and distribution of advanced eco-friendly products adding innovative new products to your daily life tomake a difference in the world. The origin of our brand name means “people that make light”.

Light makes for a better society, meaning brightening and making positive changes, and it’s important to focus on creating valuable work that brings light to this world.
As a recognized Hi-Seoul Brand company, Lightors has received recognition for being a promising and representative small-medium enterprise by the city of Seoul.
Only those companies that offer globally competitive innovative technological products are able  to receive this special recognition in hopes of expanding Korea's domestic export enterprise.

LIGHTORS HandGrip Battery Pack is a portable charger with multiple functions. The device has additional functions including hand-gripper for exercise, flashlight, insect repeller, and emergency alarm. We have completed performance tests and developed a prototype. There are a few improvements to be made including scratch-resistant and insect-repeller ultrasound effects.

When squeezing a hand gripper repeatedly, it can cause scratches on the surface of the bottom. Based on years of experience, we have the know-how of designing product and metal mold to overcome the challenge.

The second challenge is to increase the effects of the insect repeller. The kind of mosquitoes that bite human/animal for blood tends to flee from male mosquitoes or unfamiliar sounds. It's also suggested that the sound of dragonfly's, the mosquitoes natural predator, repels mosquitoes and other insects. The device is designed to reproduce such sounds.

Our team has successfully developed a system that reproduces changing frequencies to prevent the female mosquitoes from becoming immune to the same frequency. We are about to apply the upgraded technology to the device.
Approx. 3 hours from a standard AC Adaptor
Devices, Tablets, E-dictionary, MP3, Game Consoles.
We can provide the result of tests that we conducted.
Standards and methods are not yet available at any public offices to conduct a
test to prove effects of the device. The device produces changing frequencies that
repel insects. (The technology is already approved by the EPA, UL and CSA in
How far does the insect repeller reach?
Would you be interested in distributing internationally?
Yes, definitely. If you are interested, please contact lightorstube@gmail.com with any
Do you have patents for your device?
Yes. We have both domestic and international patents on the

Ever since it first hit the market, the Pop Socket has been a useful tool for our phones, giving us the freedom to kickstand it anywhere, the security of not having to worry about dropping our phone, and also a fun little toy to fidget with. But we all have experienced the frustrating part of being limited by the Pop Socket's inability to be able to mount to our car while driving. With Flingo, this problem becomes a thing of the past.
Flingo is the 4-in-1 solution to turning your phone into a kickstand, a finger loop, a car mount, and best of all a toy on the back of your phone to fidget with.

Remember those slap-on bracelets you used to play with in grade school? Flingo uses the same technology to be able to mount on most car vents, yet at the same time stay hidden on the back of your phone and able to bring you that nostalgic feeling of playing with the slap-on bracelet.

The Flingo Team needs the $250 to be able to complete and pay for the custom mold fee and to be able to start the initial batch of production. If funded we will be able to place a large order so we can pass on the savings to the consumer. That's where Kickstarter comes in. Our Kickstarter campaign doesn't follow traditional ""business models"" of making 100% profit. As fellow Pop Socket enthusiasts, we wanted a way to bring the best product forward, for the most reasonable price.
With your help, we can make this goal a reality.
