OUR PATENT PENDING TENSION HINGE

Our unique hinge allows you to easily go from shooting a large group with the rear camera to capturing the perfect selfie with your best friend, all while setting the scene with the right amount of soft, warm light.
Blackout™ Panda eye reduces lens glare from incoming light during the day
Rechargeable battery provides up to 2 full hours of continuous light on its highest setting
Rugged injection molded polycarbonate protects your phone like a mother panda protecting her cub.
18 dimmable LEDs give you the right amount of light when you need it.

KEY BENEFITS

With Panda, well lit selfies and videos with the front camera are now possible. And while the flash is an option for the rear camera when taking pictures, it's impossible to shoot video in low light conditions, until now.
Front lighting so that you can take the perfect selfie under any condition.
Rear lighting so that you can now shoot video day or night.
Panda is so convenient that you'll find yourself reaching for it whenever you need a little extra light in your life!
• Fun colors: ""Great Panda"" white, ""Panda Shadow"" black, ""Panda Candy"" pink, and ""Panda Pacific"" blue.
We created Panda because we're visual storytellers and moment sharers and our tool of choice is the smartphone. We snap, shoot, like,

follow, and influence throughout the day, but our day doesn't end when the sun goes down, and neither should our photos or videos. We love our phones, but we wanted something better, something simple, and something that's always within reach.

Why it works

Panda is based on the traditional lighting tools found on today's film and
television sets. From small eye lights to great big light sources that mimic the
moon, warm, white LED panels provide lighting professionals the light they need
to ensure the perfect shot, every time. And cameras on a complex
film set work just like the ones we carry in our pockets. They use the same type of sensor that's used in your
phone, and that sensor craves light.
Your phone's sensor is made up of millions of light-sensitive units
called photosites, but these individual photosites can’t see color – only
luminance (a fancy word for ""light""). To produce a full-color image, each photosite has a

miniature colored filter (red, green or blue) and it's guessing what color to assign to the information the lens is receiving.

The more information the sensor has, the higher the resolution—so the longer the sensor is
exposed to luminance, the better the picture. <b>A steady light source will always out shine a built
But steady light isn't the only trick, quality also matters. Soft diffuse light is always better than harsh, direct light. A light source such as
a spotlight or flash will either wash out your subject’s features or
create unflattering and harsh shadows. Diffused light, on the other hand, balances your image and produces smooth, even tones.

Design Inspiration

We took inspiration from working on film sets, vlogging on YouTube, traveling abroad, beauty and fashion to create a simple, stylish design that  can easily travel with you day and night.

column3:
/>

And what started as a cardboard mock-up in a garage

column1: became four prototypes, countless hours of refined concepts, dozens of
revised PCB board schematics, and constant product demos with strangers
to get Panda to where it is today.

column3:
/>


Your support will allow us to begin tooling and manufacturing Panda for the iPhone 6 and iPhone 6 Plus. We're just getting started, and we have big plans in the works. Join us on this adventure by supporting us today!

column2:
/>



What started as a concept by one person in a garage soon blossomed into a small group of makers, storytellers, strategists, and social entrepreneurs. We are a Breakfast Club of ingenuity.

column1: It's important to remember that Indiegogo is not a store but a pledge of your support for entrepreneurs who are independently bringing a product to life. The interesting side of this risk, and the reason we are turning to Indiegogo, is that you are getting a radically transparent look into the process of how products come to life, and we have the unique opportunity to connect directly with who we value the most...you.

We have strong relationships with manufacturing partners for the production of PANDA, and so we are confident that we can fulfill our commitment on time. However, when manufacturing any physical goods there are sure to be unforeseen challenges, both big and small. We promise to be open and transparent in our communications in timing and potential delays.

In addition to pre-ordering Panda, you can help us by sharing this campaign with at least 10 friends and family to help us spread the word. We need to let everyone know about Panda and you are our best hope in doing so. Thank you so much for the support and we hope you will join us for the ride!
When can I select the color case I want?
We'll be sending out a backer survey to everyone asking for color choices at the end of the campaign.
Will there be other colors available besides black and white?
We’ve already been busy testing a number of fun colors and will gauge interest during the campaign.
We would love to include color options in our stretch goal—it’s all up
Which phone models will initially be available?

We are beginning with the iPhone 6 and iPhone 6 plus. We have created stretch goal that include manufacturing the Samsung Galaxy S6 and Samsung Galaxy S6 Edge immediately if met, otherwise there will be a minor delay. You can help other device compatible products become available sooner by spreading the word!
Will Pandas be available for other phone models?
Again, it's all up to you! We're going to monitor demand for other devices to determine which
additional models we can support. We'll make sure to keep everyone updated through
Panda draw energy from my cell phone battery?
No, Panda is a self-contained lighting system with all the benefits of a
ruggedized case.<span>  It comes with its own
recharging cord and never draws any energy from your phone—we know how precious
Can you tell us about your manufacturing?

Responsible supply chain and production is very important to us. Charles is our manufacturing guru and has relationships with the best consumer electronics manufacturers in the business. He will be on the ground floor for every production milestone and will be working with manufacturers here in the US and abroad to ensure the highest quality.
Yep, upgrading is super simple. If you’d
like to upgrade your perk to a higher-priced perk, you can do so on

the contributions tab of your Indiegogo profile. Just select ""Upgrade to Higher Priced Perk” and you will be good to go.

column3: >CLEAN ENERGY FOR EVERYONE

column4: >We set out to design a watch, but realized that we were trying to change the world.

column1: STEP ONE: Introducing the QBAND, a solar-powered smartphone charger that you wear on your wrist. It's a watch too!
STEP TWO: For every watch you buy, we will provide a solar powered lamp to Project C.U.R.E.'s #ShineThroughEbola recovery effort in West Africa.
STEP THREE: Bring everyone a little closer to a cleaner future!
It's not just a watch, it's a symbol for change! It does happens to be a pretty nifty gadget though. Here are some of the details:
600 mAh Li-ion Battery    -    about 2 hours of extra phone time
420mW solar array             -    in 3-4 normal days of wear it's fully charged!
LED Watch Face                   -   looks sweet and can tell more than time
4 LED charge indicators    -   let's you know when you're juiced up
Clasp enclosed connectors (micro USB or Lightning) - no extra cables
We’ve built our prototypes and the QBAND is almost ready for manufacture, but we need your help financing molds and more importantly deciding the finishing touches!

Every backer of this project gets to vote on 3 additional colors for the QBAND. After the campaign is successfully funded we'll send you a survey to confirm your shipping information and make your color selection.
Colors to vote on:

We’ve partnered with Nokero Solar, an awesome fellow Denver company that makes a convenient, affordable solar light bulb so people living in energy poverty can replace their dangerous kerosene lanterns with clean solar power!
So for every QBAND you pledge for we’ll send a Nokero lamp to Project C.U.R.E. for their Ebola relief efforts in West Africa.
We’re a young team and we’ve learned a ton from months of development, but we realize that we’ll probably still make some mistakes and learn some lessons before it’s all said and done.
To help us through some of the challenges we’ve partnered with some great teams:
• Boulder Engineering Studio - kick-ass engineers and designers
• Nokero Solar - experts in the world of solar and innovative energy solutions
• Clean Energy Collective - community solar arrays and clean energy promoters
We set out to design a watch, but realized that we were trying to change the world.
STEP ONE: Introducing the QBAND, a solar-powered smartphone charger that you wear on your wrist. It's a watch too!
STEP TWO: For every watch you buy, we will provide a solar powered lamp to Project C.U.R.E.'s #ShineThroughEbola recovery effort in West Africa.
STEP THREE: Bring everyone a little closer to a cleaner future!
It's not just a watch, it's a symbol for change! It does happens to be a pretty nifty gadget though. Here are some of the details:
600 mAh Li-ion Battery    -    about 2 hours of extra phone time
420mW solar array             -    in 3-4 normal days of wear it's fully charged!
LED Watch Face                   -   looks sweet and can tell more than time
4 LED charge indicators    -   let's you know when you're juiced up
Clasp enclosed connectors (micro USB or Lightning) - no extra cables
We’ve built our prototypes and the QBAND is almost ready for manufacture, but we need your help financing molds and more importantly deciding the finishing touches!

Every backer of this project gets to vote on 3 additional colors for the QBAND. After the campaign is successfully funded we'll send you a survey to confirm your shipping information and make your color selection.

>Use your tablet or old phone as a SECURITY CAMERA
We have as the first in the world developed a motion detector out of a phone camera

column1: • Cheap - The cheapest way to have a security camera at home!
• Fast - Only takes you 5 minutes to install

• Greentech - Save the world! No more production!

    *Only works with Android and IOS

column2: >We need funding for the FINAL international version and fixing the small bugs that always appear after first release. We have some more function we want to develop that really can change the game for the industry. But before that function can be a success, we need a lot of active users and funding for the development. Our coal is 10.000eu.

>We now have 2500 TEST users in Denmark on the first Danish version. They will get notifications from they neighbours if there is a burglary at their property or if they need urgent help by using the SOS Funktion. We are the first one in the world to make a motion detector function in the camera of the phone!
>It works as an alarmsystem so you get notifications on your phone as you would do with a security system.

column1: 3 - Use your old phone or tablet

column2: >Use your tablet you have at home, when you are out of the house.  Just charge it and leave it in the corner of the room.

>It all started 4 years ago when Phillip and Henrik founded a small alarm company with an idea... an idea to change the alarm industry. We know that having an alarm can be expensive and the quality and service are not always the best.
>Instead, why not using your old tablet or phone? It costs you nothing and yet you have the flexibility to hide a camera wherever you want in your apartment or a house.
>We are happy and proud to be the first ones in the world to develop a motion detector in a mobilphone camera! We were told that it was not possible, but it IS!
>We are putting a lot of efford in the app and are really close to be done! Please help us to change the concept of alarm systems for good.
>Download now to test on Appstore and google play

column1: The biggest challange is the old phones, we used alot of time on developing and testing on as many phones we could. Its been a long journey but we made it a long way.

column2: >What do you get when its funded?

>You get over 50% discount on the alarm feature and you will get allowed to get more than 1 camara at home. You get it very cheap as a thank you for your support!
If you fund you get a very big discount on the full subscription
>When its fully funded we will sent a personal discount code for you. with your personal 50% discount code for life!

Cheap - The cheapest way to have a security camera at home!
Fast - Only takes you 5 minutes to install

We have some more function we want to develop that really can change the game for the industry. But before that function can be a success, we need a lot of active users and funding for the development. Our coal is 10.000eu.

We now have 2500 TEST users in Denmark on the first Danish version. They will get notifications from they neighbours if there is a burglary at their property or if they need urgent help by using the SOS Funktion. We are the first one in the world to make a motion detector function in the camera of the phone!
It works as an alarmsystem so you get notifications on your phone as you would do with a security system.
3 - Use your old phone or tablet
Use your tablet you have at home, when you are out of the house.  Just charge it and leave it in the corner of the room.

It all started 4 years ago when Phillip and Henrik founded a small alarm company with an idea... an idea to change the alarm industry. We know that having an alarm can be expensive and the quality and service are not always the best.
Instead, why not using your old tablet or phone? It costs you nothing and yet you have the flexibility to hide a camera wherever you want in your apartment or a house.
We are happy and proud to be the first ones in the world to develop a motion detector in a mobilphone camera! We were told that it was not possible, but it IS!
We are putting a lot of efford in the app and are really close to be done! Please help us to change the concept of alarm systems for good.

We all love taking pictures and recording our life. We all fancy downloading videos and music. But just one minute of high quality footage can be up to 400 MB. When you get the storage alert, which part of your life has to be erased? That's tough.
200GB iCloud storage will cost you $36 per year. With PhotoCube, no needs to pay cloud service monthly.

column2: >Safe Protection! No Worries of Being Hacked

column1: With PhotoCube, you can keep away from the difficult positions where cloud may be hacked, or can not be reached without the Internet.

column2: >Review Video by Philli Mayne on YouTube

column1: PhotoCube connects the PD charger and your smartphone. Calendar, Contacts, Photos, and Videos. All of your memory and data can be backed up automatically while you are charging.
PhotoCube allows you to unplug your devices anytime, and data backup will resume after plugging in again.

PhotoCube offers a fresh approach to data transfer between smartphones. After PhotoCube automatically backs up the old model, you can simply plug the new model and select ""Restore"" to complete data transfer for all photos, contacts and calendars.
No learning required! Easy use to everyone, even to your grandparents.
To get access to your data, you can use a regular password, or choose the Face ID. With PhotoCube, no worries anymore about your cloud data being hacked, or your devices/PhotoCube being stolen.
PhotoCube itself can be locked with a regular password. This way, no one can access your data, even if your PhotoCube is stolen.

This little buddy brings big savings. To get another 256GB of storage on an iPhone 11 Pro would cost around 200$. But with PhotoCube, it can help you save much more. 

With PhotoCube, no needs to pay cloud service monthly. And you can keep away from the difficult positions where cloud may be hacked, or can not be reached without the Internet.
column2:
>A Deep Look into Features

Photocube can be perfectly formed with the PD charger, and Unite As One with it.

PhotoCube is palm-size, and smaller than Airpods. So you can take it and use it anywhere and anytime: by your bedside, in your bag, or even in your pocket.
column3:
>Serve As USB Drive

For Android tablets, PCs and Macs, PhotoCube works as an external drive. With its USB Type-C 3.1 Gen 1 interface, cross-platform data transfer can be realized very easily.
column4:
>Perfect Match with iPhone/iPad

When using PhotoCube, your smartphone, cable and charger must support PD charging (Power Delivery). Based on that, PhotoCube can perfectly work with iPhone/iPad.
column6:

column3:
Face ID Protection

Through PhotoFast ONE, you can lock the App with a password and Face ID. Moreover, the Cube is also can be locked with regular passwords.

column1:
Backup for Off-line Checking Social Media Contents 

PhotoCube is more than the above. It also supports Facebook, Instagram, YouTube, Flickr, Vimeo, Tumblr, etc.. You can back up and check all the contents with no ads when you are off-line.

Finally  a solution to the problem of water damaged cell phones. Have you ever dropped you phone in the bath , the toilet , sink , lake , jumped into the pool with your phone in your pocket .Well if it happens again make sure you have one of our phone CPR devices at hand . A device to rapidly extract both water and all remaining moisture from your phone in as little as 5 minutes ensuring no short term or long term damage to your phone .

Think about the numbers

There are 6.4 Billion users worldwide.

There are 327.5 million Smartphones in the U.S.A.

82.5 Million Smartphones suffer water damage,

That equals 1 in every 4 Smartphones succumbing to water damage.

100,000 Smartphones get wet everyday.

4.3% are water damaged every year.

There is $30 billion lost to the consumers every year between Smartphones getting lost or water damaged,

60% of claims are due to water damage.

5 out of 10 accidents that happen to Smartphones occur in the home.

39% of people bring their Smartphones into the bathroom and 19% drop their Smartphones into the toilet.

We have a real and proper  solution to this problem,

Usually when people have had  their Smartphone water damaged they in turn submerge it in a bag of rice hoping that after 3 to 4 days  that their phone will return to normal again .We all know that it is rarely as simple as this . Between long term damage due to corrosion and long lasting damage to the home screen rarely is the old rice trick a meaningful solution. Smartphones are a life line to almost all users and the thoughts of been without one for 3 to 4 days is nearly as bad as the thought of having to replace it with a new one .

Speaking of repair .

We have created a cost effective devise to be used in conjunction with a house hold vacuum cleaner and we are envisaging the device costing the consumer no more than $30.00 for the generic version that fits almost all phones or $25.00 for the phone customised version .In trialing the prototype we have successfully recovered all phones tested where by the phones have not been submerged in water for more than 24 hours .

Alternative costs of repair can vary from $80 dollars upwards to $400 depending on the damage and there is no guarantee that the smartphone can be repaired. There is no warranty available for water damage repairs because of the unpredictable nature of the fixes.

Audience

Given the amount of Smartphone users across the globe, the target audience will be all phone users, however just because they have a smartphone does not necessarily mean everyone will purchase it. We envisage our products on the shelves with other smartphone accessories, some will buy our product because they have experienced water damage in the past, others will purchase for preventative reasons and others will purchase because they have just been victim of  water damaged smartphone and need our solution to the problem, It is likely the third reason will be the most obvious reason to purchase our product. 


Our competition in this market is as follows: 
Waterproof cases to protect phones from getting water damage ( preventative method)

Drybox - this is a box that is available at selected locations throughout the U.S. located in some shopping malls and are apparently built  at a price of between $4,600 and $7,000. Drybox promises to dry up every last water molecule threatening the inside of your phone. It claims to have your phone functioning within 1- 2 hours ( after drying out) inside the Drybox. There are currently 19 locations throughout the states and the Dryboxes are serviced by a person, so when you have a water damaged phone, you check to see if there is a Drybox near you and drive there and a Drybox attendant will put your phone into the Drybox to dry. Locations are sporadic and operate around opening times of the malls in which they are situated. Cost of drying the phone if you happen to be ‘lucky’ to live near one of the statewide 19 locations and within their opening times, is approximately $80.00. Success rates depending on the damage to the phone, or if the owner has tried to switch on the phone, the inside of the phone may be irreparably damaged etc.

Our product will be on the shelves of phone stores, large retail stores such as Walmart, in gas stations, we envisage our product to be easily accessible, affordable and effective .

Necessity is the mother of all inventions .

Everyone in my house has dropped a phone in the water  at some stage ,I have even dropped mine in the coffee pot one morning while reaching across the table .And after either spending expensive amounts of money  on both useless repair and replacement i sat down one night to try and figure out a way of extracting both water and remaining moisture  from damaged cell phones . Pen and pencil to the ready but try as i might i just could not come up with anything , That was until my wife moved briskly across the floor with vacuum cleaner in hand . That's when i knew i had it figured out , I would create a device attachable to a vacuum cleaner which could be sealed around the phone to enable maximum water and moisture extraction.After many prototypes and change in design i finally came upon the one that worked best . Utilizing adjustable air vents on the side of the phone vac system i was able to increase and decrease the air flow moving through the device which ultimately plays a big role in moving and breaking up the water particles .I have since completed the design and with your  help in raising funds i will be able to take a  patent pending working prototype to the next stage which is manufacturing .

Mivox X1 is an innovative PTT outdoor voice chat communicator that works with WhatsApp, WeChat and Mivox app. With a simple press of a button, you can record your voice via the mic in your phone or your earphone and send it in-app to your group. Also, incoming voice messages are automatically played so that you can remain fully engaged in your activities for next-level, hassle-free communication.

These days, everyone enjoys using technology to stay connected in work and life. However, when you’re out on a trekking tour, doing extreme sports, or simply driving, pulling your phone out of your pocket or grabbing a bulky walkie-talkie is inconvenient and a distraction that increases the risk of accidents.

 

That’s why we created Mivox X1, portable &
column2:
convenient hassle-free communicator for sports and outdoor activities.

Created for better communications, Mivox X1 is a powerful voice communicator that works across any distance and connects with an unlimited number of group members. After connecting with your phone, you can record voice messages by simply pressing the button and then releasing it to send it out to your group.

Mivox X1 features an easy-to-use group chat mode. Simply set up the group in the Mivox app and all your team members can start the press-to-talk experience with Mivox X1. If you prefer using other apps like WhatsApp and WeChat, Mivox X1 is also compatible with them for an instant connection anywhere in any way you like!

 

here is no need to pause and check your messages in-app, Mivox can automatically play the With Mivox X1, tincoming voice messages so that you can stay connected while keeping your hands on the wheel and eyes on the road, good for all hands-occupied activities.

 

If you are involved in a group activity, try group chat and the unique broadcasting feature*! You have the option to mute other members and broadcast important messages in the group chat, an efficient way to teach skills and share important announcements with all!

*This feature is only available in Mivox app.

Download Address

 

As a superior outdoor communicator, Mivox knows exactly what features active users find essential. Using the Mivox app, X1 supports text messaging, sending images, and location sharing - but there’s more here than just the chatting app. With its Discover feature, Mivox allows you to join a group with specific topics – everything from cycling to self-driving travel. Meet the people who share the same interests as you and make new friends on Mivox!

 

 

We know that great adventures require the best gear. Mivox X1 has been thoroughly tested. Its PTT button is tough enough to withstand pressing and releasing over 1,000,000 times and with an IP67 waterproof rating, it easily handles splashing water or rain. Its long-lasting battery provides up to 120-days standby time and it’s built super-lightweight &
column3:
compact at only 8.7g. It’s as tough as they come and a reliable companion ready to join you for all your adventures.

 

Available with straps of 3 different lengths, Mivox X1 can be attached to any place that is most convenient for you, such as handlebars, backpack straps, steering wheels, etc. There are also 3 different strap color options so you can choose your favorite that best compliments your personal style!

 

 

Founded in 2017, Mivo is a company that strives to produce thoughtfully designed, practical products that use technology to enhance active lifestyles. Our team has dozens of years’ of experience in the hardware industry and owns numerous patents. We believe that in today’s crowded marketplace, insisting on original designs and infusing personality into products is the key to success. Mivo has previously launched a successful campaign on Kickstarter and gained worldwide support, and we will continue to innovate with useful new products for all our loyal users.

HYPER by Sanho Corporation created HyperMac, which was the world's first external battery pack for MacBook back in 2009. Since then, we survived a lawsuit from Apple and upgraded the product (now known as HyperJuice) a couple of times. We have also grown and gone on to make many more

Today, HYPER by Sanho Corporation continue to be the overwhelming leader in portable MacBook charging. HyperJuice has went on win countless industry awards and rave reviews. In fact, there is a HyperJuice in almost every commercial aircraft today as it is the only battery pack certified by the FAA for use for all stages of flight and we are the official battery pack supplier for various airlines like American Airlines, British Airways, Singapore Airlines, Qantas for their

We are also no strangers to crowdfunding, this being our 9th crowdfunding project. Our previous crowdfunding projects, HyperLink, CloudFTP, iStick, Pearl Kickstarter, Pearl Indiegogo, iPin for iPhone/Android, iPin for iPhone, HyperDrive for MacBook have altogether raised close to US$2 million.

HyperJuice is the World's ONLY battery pack that can power and charge ALL models of MacBook at the same speed of the original Apple power adapter. Encased in a MacBook matching aluminum enclosure, it also comes with 2 high power USB ports that can charge 2 iPads, iPhones or any USB device at the same time as the MacBook. HyperJuice is the ultimate battery pack for any Apple user.
Works with both USB-C and MagSafe MacBooks!

HyperJuice in the PressMacRumors ""New USB-C Batteries to Charge Retina MacBooks at Full Speed""Engadget ""We're pretty big fans of the HyperJuice external batteries at Engadget""Gizmodo ""Our favorite brand of precious-extra-juice-giving external batteries""Techcrunch ""Battery banks on steroids"" Afrojack ""30hr macbook pro backup power ready for the summer!!!!!!""Lifehacker ""HyperJuice batteries are the only portable power for your MacBook""9to5mac ""Extremely happy with this device""Notebooks.com Best of Macworld ExpoThe Mac Observer Editors' Choice AwardsMacworld Awards Best Hardware NomineeAppletell 5 out of 5 Stars!

We have been making MacBook battery packs since 2009. We start with only the best components (grade A battery cells, industry leading ICs, aerospace grade aluminum), stuff that Apple themselves would use to create HyperJuice, a high power battery pack that can output the same power as the original Apple Power Adapter. Then we use adapters (which we call Magic Boxes) to connect our HyperJuice battery packs to the MacBooks. Magic Boxes for the new 12"" USB-C MacBook are plug & play while Magic Box for the MagSafe MacBooks require a simple 5 minute modification. The end result is a powerful portable power solution that allows you to extend the off-grid usage time of your MacBook.
Fast, powerful, efficient & safe charging. Like power from the wall outlet.
Works with ALL MacBook, MacBook Air, MacBook Pro Retina models
MacBook matching aerospace grade silver color aluminum enclosure
2 x  12W USB ports to charge 2 x iPads or any USB devices simultaneously
Use Original Magic Box MagSafe adapter to charge MagSafe-based MacBooks
Use Magic Box 29W adapter to charge USB-C MacBooks at full 29W speed
Use Magic Box 12W (with any USB battery) to charge USB-C MacBook at 12W
4 different HyperJuice capacities to choose from

Our HyperJuice battery packs for MacBook come in 4 capacities of 60Wh, 100Wh, 150Wh and 222Wh, compared to the internal battery capacities of the current MacBook models:  12"" MacBook (29Wh), 11"" MacBook Air (38Wh), 13"" MacBook Air (54Wh), 13"" MacBook Pro (74.9Wh) and 15"" MacBook Pro (99.5Wh). Higher HyperJuice capacities enable the MacBooks to last longer.
Original Magic Box (to charge MagSafe MacBook)

As the magnetic MagSafe connector is patented by Apple and they do not license it out, we created the Magic Box (US Patent US 9,088,090 B2) as a workaround. Magic Box modifies your existing Apple MagSafe Power Adapter to do ALL below:
Charge MacBook with HyperJuice battery packs
Retain original usage of Apple MagSafe Power Adapter (to charge  MacBook)
Even use Apple MagSafe Power Adapter to charge HyperJuice battery packs
It only takes 5 mins to DIY (Do-It-Yourself) the Apple MagSafe Adapter (photos/video). OR you can buy an already Modified Apple MagSafe Adapter
Now there's a new 12"" MacBook with USB Type-C

The latest Apple MacBook now uses a new connector called USB Type-C. USB-C is the latest USB connector that can not only handle data (twice the bandwidth of USB 3.0) but also deliver power up to 100W with advanced features like controlling the direction of power flow (e.g. is the MacBook charging the USB battery or USB battery charging the MacBook?) and intelligent, flexible & optimal power management which are solely lacking in regular USB batteries today.
Ordinary USB batteries may damage new MacBook

Many ""so called USB-C"" battery packs and portable charging solutions today consist of simple wiring that connects the regular old USB port to the new USB-C connector. These solutions are not USB Power Delivery 2.0 compliant, do not interface with the MacBook properly and may damage the MacBook in the long run.
We've not 1 but 2 ways to charge the new MacBook SAFELY, QUICKLY & EFFICIENTLY
HyperJuice has not 1 but 2 USB Power Delivery 2.0 compliant adapters (Magic Boxes) that uses the same USB-C smart microprocessor controller solution as the Apple USB-C Power Adapter.
1) Magic Box 12W (for any USB battery packs)2) Magic Box 29W (for HyperJuice battery packs)
1) Magic Box 12W (for any USB battery packs)World's 1st Smart IC USB to USB Type-C Adapter

Using the same USB-C microprocessor controller solution as the Apple USB-C Power Adapter, Magic Box 12W easily turns any regular USB port to a USB-PD 2.0 compliant USB-C port that can safely charge the new MacBook up to 12W speed.
Magic Box 12W allows ordinary USB batteries to safely charge the new MacBook at up to 12W
2) Magic Box 29W (for HyperJuice battery packs)World's Fastest USB Type-C Portable Charging

If you need faster charging at the same 29W speed as the original Apple USB-C Power Adapter, use Magic Box 29W adapter together with HyperJuice batteries. Only HyperJuice can safely and efficiently provide up to 29W (or even 100W) power via USB-C. This is something that regular USB battery packs cannot do.
Only HyperJuice can charge ALL models of MacBooks (USB-C & MagSafe)
Comes with 2 x 12W high power USB ports so you can charge 2 x iPads & MacBook at the same time!
Perks (Early Bird Specials with Limited Quantity!)

Easy secure file transfer between iOS & PCs""Digital Trends - ""World's Fastest Flash Drive for iOS Devices""++Now Available! iShowFast 256GB in 3 diff colors (Space Grey, Gold, Rose Gold)FAQ: How to upgrade my perk?++What is iShowFast?

iShowFast is the World's Fastest Apple Lightning USB 3.0 Flash Drive, allowing you to transfer data (photos, music, video) between computers and iOS devices (iPhone, iPad & iPod touch) in no time, without the need for iTunes or the Cloud. iShowFast is up to 14X faster than last year's iStick and the SanDisk iXpand:
The most productive iOS device requires the fastest flash driveGet iShowFast by November 2015, in time for the launch of iPad Pro
Last year, we brought you the iStick - World's 1st USB flash drive with an Apple Lightning connector which raised $1.1 million on Kickstarter
Introducing the followup to the popular iStick & another world's first. iShowFast - World's Fastest Apple Lightning USB 3.0 Flash Drive
iShowFast can perform all the features/functions of iStick and more!
iShowFast is one of the fastest USB 3.0 flash drive in the market
Up to 140MB/s. 14X faster than USB 2.0 on iStick & SanDisk iXpand
The Fastest Apple Lightning transfer speed. Up to 30MB/s.10X faster than the iStick & 3X faster than the SanDisk iXpand
Beautiful iShowFast matches the iPhone, iPad & MacBook perfectly
Transfer files between computers and iOS devices in no timeEasily expand your iPod, iPhone and iPad storage by up to 128GB
Expand iPod, iPhone, iPad storage for music, photos, movies & more!
You can transfer music from computer to an iPod touch or playback directly from the iShowFast. No need for lengthy synchronization or pay for streaming services.
Free up space on your iPhone by backing up all your photos, videos and files to the high capacity iShowFast. No need to pay for recurring online storage subscription.
Stream tons of movies directly from the iStick onto your iPad, anytime and anywhere you want, even on planes. No Internet or wireless network required.
iShowFast is Safe & Secure with Password Protection
PLUS your data doesn't need to be sent through Internet or the Cloud where hackers and others (like server operators) may gain access
World's fastest USB 3.0 flash drive with integrated Apple Lightning connector
Easily & quickly share music, photos, videos between computers & iOS devices
Fastest Apple Lightning connector speed of 30MB/s (read), 20MB/s (write)
Safe & Secure. Password protection. Data doesn't need to pass thru Internet.
Low power consumption. Battery-less design. Doesn't require charging to use.
Apple certified Made for iPod, iPhone and iPad

1080p HD movie streaming, direct playback from iShowFast

column56: >

column3:
>

We started with the most basic and minimalistic design with space just sufficient enough to accommodate a male USB connector (to connect to power/computer), a micro SD slot (the smallest removable memory card for storage) and two female USB ports (one for the iOS/Android device and one for USB storage drive).

The basic design is expanded to accommodate the actual final PCB printed circuit board and IC integrated circuit chip. All these while ensuring that one of the surface is a perfect square, a call out to our logo which is made up of 7 perfect squares.

The final aesthetic design was to round the corners and add design line elements to the side with female USB ports to give the final look of the HyperCube product. 

 

Proof of working prototype

The following single shot, unedited video shows a fully functional prototype of the HyperCube. In this video, HyperCube is able to charge the smartphone and automatically start photo/video backup, With HyperCube, the user can browse contents on the attached micro SD memory card as well as the attached USB storage drive, viewing photos/documents, streaming video and audio (including the ability to playback in the background).

column1: • 9to5mac - ""Great choice for MacBooks (16"" MacBook Pro), iPad Pro, iPhone &
Press Release | Earn 10% cashback for every referral, by helping us spread the word

++

World's First (and smallest) 100W GaN Charger

Credit card size HyperJuice is the world's first 100W Gallium Nitride charger and also the world's smallest 100W charger that is 50% smaller than current traditional chargers

With not one but 4 high power charging ports

With 100W, there is plenty of power to share around with 2 x USB-C (supporting Power Delivery 3.0) and 2 x USB-A (supporting Quick Charge 3.0) ports.

Quick charge 4 devices at the same time
column3: >Only one charger required for all your Apple charging needs
column5:
>100W power provides the ability to quick charge a laptop (MacBook Pro), a tablet (iPad Pro), smartphone (iPhone), and mobile device (AirPods, Watch) all at the same time.

Power 2 laptops (15"" MacBook Pro) simultaneously
column7:
>With 100W Dual USB-C Power Delivery, a single HyperJuice charger can power 2 laptops (two 15"" MacBook Pro) simultaneously.

Pocket-friendly. Takes up the same space as a pack of poker cards.
column9:
>So you can easily fit HyperJuice in any pocket and bring it wherever you go.

Built-in foldable wall plugs (no messy bulky power cables)
column10: >
column12:
>No need to mess with bulky power cables which can be bigger than the charge itself.

Travel-friendly pin converters that work in any country
column15:
>UK, EU, AU pin converters will be provided

HyperJuice supports worldwide universal 100-240V voltage and comes with UK/EU/AU pin converters so that it can be used in virtually any country.

Powered by the latest Gallium Nitride (GaN) Technology 

HyperJuice utilizes the industry-leading Navitas GaNFast NV6117 Power IC to miniaturize components normally found in traditional chargers. The new Gallium Nitride semiconductor material allows for power devices that can operate at higher voltages and switching frequency which results in smaller and more efficient chargers. 

See the following video to learn more about GaN:
column17:
showinfo=0"">
 

Sophisticated Design

HYPER has spent almost a year perfecting the circuit design and firmware to fully utilize the Navitas GaNFast NV6117 Power IC to bring the HyperJuice charger to fruition.

We want to make the smallest 100W charger ever so the circuit board and components are laid out in the most compact and space-efficient manner. Only the industry's most efficient components that can deliver the best performance in the smallest of space are used. The dense circuit board is then surrounded by high-density thin heat sinks to aid in heat dissipation. The entire package is then wrapped in a minimalist fire-resistant polycarbonate enclosure to complete the efficient design.
column19:
>

Industry-Beating Low-Temperature Operation

With so many electronics densely packed in a tiny space, there is a valid concern about heat generation and dissipation in such a small space.

So we measured the temperature across 30 points of the HyperJuice charger while it is charging the 15"" MacBook Pro from 0% to 100% battery level. The internal components temperature did not exceed 90ºC while the exterior housing temperature did not exceed 60ºC, beating industry-standards of 130ºC and 65ºC respectively.
column22: ><a href=""https://www.dropbox.com/s/w9qig2g5wjnf4bv/MBPChargingTemperatureChat.xlsx?dl=0"" rel=""noopener nofollow"" style=""font-family: benton-sans, Helvetica, sans-serif
column23:
target=""_blank"">Click for detailed temperature chart

Unparalleled 95% AC/DC Efficiency (vs 91% for Apple/Anker)
column24: >
column26:
>HyperJuice generates lesser heat than other chargers because it is extremely efficient, around 95% (compared to Apple/Anker chargers with 91% efficiency). As shown in the photo above, with an input power of 106.4W, HyperJuice is able to output 100.72W (20.149*4.999). 100.72W/106.4W = 95%.

See video below:
column28:
showinfo=0"">

 

Proof of Concept Video

The following single shot unedited video shows a full working prototype of the HyperJuice 100W GaN Charger able to output 100W power to a 15"" MacBook Pro. In addition, it is able to charge another 15"" MacBook Pro, iPhone 11 Pro Max, and Apple Watch ( a total of 4 devices) all at the same time.
column31: >
column33:
>Power meter showing that HyperJuice 100W GaN Charger is providing 19.72V x 5.07A = 99.98W of power to HyperJuice USB-C Battery Pack. 

See video below:

Hong Kong - fulfilling rewards to the rest of the world
January 2020 - Shipping of Kickstarter Early Bird rewards

From the team that brought you the World's First 100W USB-C battery pack and Kickstarter Most Funded power bank projectAbout Us HYPER by Sanho Corporation has been making award-winning portable power products since 2009. We also have a long proven track record of delivering Kickstarter and Indiegogo projects. Our previous portable power project, HyperJuice, the World's First 130W USB-C Battery Pack is currently the most crowdfunded power bank project on Kickstarter ($1.4M). Our most successful Kickstarter and Indiegogo project, HyperDrive USB-C Hub for MacBook Pro, is currently the most crowdfunded MacBook and USB-C accessory ($3.1M). Our HyperDrive USB-C Hub for iPad Pro is the most crowdfunded iPad accessory ($1.2M). We also have the most crowdfunded wireless charging project ($717K). So we do have a lot of experience with high power charging, USB-C, and Apple products. This is our 22nd crowdfunding project. Our previous crowdfunding projects have altogether raised over $9.22 million and we have delivered to over 94000 backers.Thank you for supporting HyperJuice! The only charger you need for all your laptop, tablet, mobile, USB charging needs.",28.0,6,"18 Campaigns

column5: >9to5mac: Hands-on HyperDrive GEN2 USB-C Hub [Video]
column10: >Cult of Mac: HYPER's speedy USB-C Hub is a port-lover's dream
column11: >Press Release | Earn 10% cashback for every referral, by helping us spread the word
column13:
> 

Ever since we popularized the usage of USB-C Hubs in 2015 

 

 

We released our first USB-C hub back in 2015 for the 12"" MacBook. In 2016, we introduced the HyperDrive USB-C Hub for MacBook Pro which went on to become the World's most crowdfunded USB-C accessory and probably the most popular USB-C Hub to date.

 

Little had changed over the last 5 years 

 

 

Since then, there was hardly any advancement from standard 1st generation features like:

column1:
Until now...

 

Introducing the next-gen of USB-C Hubs with 2X Speed &
column2:
Power

 

 

Introducing the next generation of USB-C hubs with 2X the speed and 2X the power of 1st generation USB-C hubs

 

We call this HyperDrive GEN2

 

 

With HyperDrive GEN2, you get

column1: • 4K60Hz HDMI HDR (vs 4K30Hz HDMI on 1st generation USB-C hubs)
• 100W USB-C Power Delivery (vs 60W USB-C Power Delivery)

Get 2X video refresh speed, 2X USB transfer speed, 3X memory card transfer speed, and 2X power delivery

 

 

No dangling dongles. HyperDrive GEN2 works perfectly with iPad Pro, mobile devices as well as computers.
column2:
>HyperDrive GEN2 comes with a long enough cable to work well with iPad Pro and any USB-C device

 

Available in 6 ports

DisplayPort video output

 

 

Everything in the above 6-port model plus:

column1:
There is also an 18-port version with optical/digital audio

 

 

Everything in the above 6-port and 12-port models plus:

In summary:

 

 

There is a HyperDrive GEN2 USB-C Hub for every need 

 

From mobile devices and tablets...
column2: >iPad Pro, tablets and mobile devices with 6-port HyperDrive GEN2
column3:
> 

To laptops and computers...
column4: >MacBook Pro and laptops with 12-port HyperDrive GEN2
column5:
> 

To even desktops for high-end audio and video editing
column6:
>Desktops with 18-port HyperDrive GEN2

 

Design

HyperDrive GEN2 is designed to have a minimalistic industrial look that is both elegant and functional. The all-metallic exterior gives a solid rugged feel while the ridges at the top 2/3 of the product aid in heat dissipation and makes it cool to the touch. All 3 models are designed to either stand vertically upright for better heat dissipation or lie horizontally flat. Commonly accessed ports (like memory card slots, USB ports, and 3.5mm audio jacks) are placed on the front of the hub while other more permanent connections are placed at the back for better cable management.
column7: >Front of HyperDrive GEN2 USB-C Hubs with iPhone 11 Pro Max for size reference
column9:
>Back of HyperDrive GEN2 USB-C Hubs with iPhone 11 Pro Max for size reference

 

HyperDrive GEN2 USB-C Hub on demo at CES 2020

We recently demoed working prototypes of the HyperDrive GEN2 USB-C Hubs in front of thousands of trade visitors at the Las Vegas Consumer Electronics Show (CES) from January 7-10, 2020.

 

Proof of Concept

The following single-shot unedited video shows a fully functional HyperDrive GEN2 USB-C Hub supporting 4K60Hz video, 100W Power Delivery (85W to a computer, 15W to hub), 10Gb/s USB 3.1 Gen 2 (~1000MB/s), and UHS-II MicroSD/SD (~300MB/s).
column13:
> 

For comparison, we used a competitor 1st generation USB-C hub which was only capable of 4K30Hz video, 60W Power Delivery, 5Gb/s USB 3.1 Gen 1 (~500MB/s) and UHS-I MicroSD/SD (~100MB/s).

 

HyperDrive GEN2 vs Competitor (1st Generation) USB-C Hub

 

Power Delivery
column14: >click for larger image
column15:
> 

HyperDrive GEN2 (left) is capable of 100W Power Delivery (85W to a computer, 15W to hub) while the competitor's current 1st generation USB-C hub (right) is only capable of 60W Power Delivery.
column16:
>click for larger image

 

Display Output
column17:
>click for larger image

 

HyperDrive GEN2 (left) is capable of 4K 60 Hertz video output while the competitor's current 1st generation USB-C hub (right) is only capable of 4K 30 Hertz.
column18: >click for larger image
column20:
>click for larger image

 

HyperDrive GEN2 (left) is capable of 10Gbps (~1000MB/s) transfer speed while the competitor's current 1st generation USB-C hub (right) is only capable of 5Gbps (~500MB/s) transfer speed.
column21:
>click for larger image

 

MicroSD/SD Memory Card Transfer Speed
column22:
>click for larger image

 

HyperDrive GEN2 (left) MicroSD/SD memory card slot is capable of ~300MB/s UHS-II transfer speed while the competitor's current 1st generation USB-C hub (right) is only capable of ~100MB/s UHS-I transfer speed

Specifications

column1:
Ports

 

Chipsets

 

Perks

 

Indiegogo Special (40% Off)

Reward Fulfilment

 

The product will be manufactured in Vietnam to ensure that fulfillment will not be affected by the current coronavirus situation in China or US trade tariffs.

Rewards will be expressly airfreighted into the destination country with the last leg of delivery performed by the local postal service. We have to charge shipping (airfreight shipping is weight-based) as this method of shipping is not inexpensive. It is a very fast shipping method, fastest after express courier and how we can ensure that backers get their rewards as soon as possible.

 

Project Timeline

About Us

 

 

HYPER by Sanho Corporation has been making award-winning USB-C products since 2015. We also have a long proven track record of delivering Kickstarter and Indiegogo projects. Our most successful Kickstarter and Indiegogo project, HyperDrive USB-C Hub for MacBook Pro, raised over $3.1 million and is currently the most crowdfunded MacBook and USB-C accessory. Our latest Kickstarter and Indiegogo, HyperJuice 100W GaN Charger, which raised over $2.6 million is the most crowdfunded USB-C charger. The HyperJuice 130W USB-C Battery Pack is the most crowdfunded power bank project on Kickstarter ($1.4M). Our HyperDrive USB-C Hub for iPad Pro is the most crowdfunded iPad accessory ($1.2M) and many more. So we do have a lot of experience with USB-C and Apple products. This is our 24th crowdfunding project. Our previous crowdfunding projects have altogether raised over $11.86 million and we have delivered to over 127,000 backers.

0,"

Most successful businessman own a Macbook or Surface.Because they have fashionable appearance and also light and thin, but the drawback is not easily moved.We believe that the future notebook will be thin,but also small.
GDP Pocket is such a product, it's not only has luxuriant appearance like Macbook, but also super light and very small, It can be taken away at any time like a mobile phone in your pocket.

Pocket’s exquisite and small appearance can be comparable to the MacBook Air. With the same configuration (4GB/128GB), Pocket uses active cooling design which means that the performance will be far beyond the Microsoft Surface 3 while the weight is much lighter than the latter. Through the HDMI HD cable, it can connect to any display to become a PC computer so as to exploit the performance to the maximum. The new Type C interface can be infinitely expanded with peripherals. At the same time, it is the world's first pocket laptop with 7-inch screen to support 64-bit Ubuntu 16.04 LTS. Of course we will also provide Windows 10 firmware which meets the needs of Windows users.

If you want, you can access mobile network anytime and anywhere through an external 4G network interface card with a USB port without opening the phone hot spots. Even if you forget to bring a mobile phone, you can communicate with any corner of the world through the Skype Internet phone, which is so cool!

Our obsession with smart portable devices is no less than that of any geek. That's why we're developing this ultra-compact laptop. With your laptop in your pocket, you can do things that must be done with your desktop and connect the monitor to the laptop as a host.

Pocket is the leader and practitioner for the next generation of laptop. Our ultimate goal is to put the laptop in the pocket.

column4: >1920×1200,7 inch, 323.45PPI, IPS technology, The screen level:Retina Display
>CNC precise all-in-one body made of magnesium and alloy
>CNC precise all-in-one body made of magnesium and alloy
>CNC precise all-in-one body made of magnesium and alloy
>12 hour battery life, Polymer lithium battery
>12 hour battery life, Polymer lithium battery
>10 hour battery life, Polymer lithium battery

column1:
Note: Specifications may change.

This pocket laptop adopts pure silver CNC precise all-in-one body made of magnesium and alloy, which means that its craftsmanship can be comparable to the MacBook Air. Because of its portability, we believe it will become the first choice for fashion women.

Imagine a scene where a fashionable woman takes a 7-inch laptop from her shoulder bag with a cup of coffee placing next to her. She drinks coffee while gracefully typing the text on her keyboard to chat with the girlfriends. I believe a lot of fashionable women will be crazy to have such a pocket laptop. Otherwise, she needs to carry a bulky MacBook Air.

A Linux engineer drinks coffee while opening Vim to program scripts with Pocket. Isn’t it all fashionable people’s dream?

As we all know, higher resolution will bring richer colors and fineness. Pocket with more than 300PPI pixel density has been beyond the ""retina"" level screen proposed by Apple.

For portability, performance and heat dissipation, we choose the currently most top-class Intel x7-Z8750 with 4-core 4-thread design and 8GB LPDDR 3 RAM, 128GB eMMC and 7000mAh polymer lithium battery. It has 12-hour battery life, built-in copper radiator pipe and large-diameter heat output pipeline. It increases the fan’s driving-power so that the body is always maintained blow 38℃ acceptable for the human body. Due to the active cooling, its performance is much better than that of Surface 3.

Pocket has a Type C interface which provides the body with power supply. In fact, Type C interface’s expandable peripherals are very rich. The peripherals can not only transmit data in high speed but also output audio and video. To achieve that, only a Type C to HDMI or Type C to DisplayPort data cable or a headset based on the Type C interface is needed. Theoretically, the transmission speed of Type C is up to 5.0Gbps (500MB/s). At the same time, Pocket also provides a USB Type A interface. You can connect to any USB-based peripherals such as printer, USB flash disk, USB Hub, scanner, speaker, and wireless keyboard. Of course, you can also output high-definition videos in the Pocket to the TV through the HDMI D Type interface.

Don't worry about the limited ports, you can use the Type C Hub to connect many external devices such as network cable,TF card,mouse,keyboard,projector and U disk,etc. What is more, you can also use them when charging this device.

As for input, Combined with ergonomics. Our design adopts the chocolate keyboard (plane island keyboard) that has won the highest award of the 2009 German Red Dot Award. Increase the contact area of finger and keycap. This leads to more accurate keystroke and more comfortable keyboard input than that of Surface 3. So it is very suitable for woman’s delicate fingers. At the same time, non-adhesive design also Reduce the rate of wrong input. Compared with a traditional keyboard, both the key process and key spacing of Pocket are significantly improved, increasing the comfort of operations.

In order to meet the needs of Linux and Windows users, in the system selection, Pocket will provide Ubuntu 16.04 LTS and Windows 10 Home.

As the ""kindest"" and most popular Linux system, Ubuntu can shoulder a responsibility. Ubuntu can achieve all the features on Windows. The open-source LibreOffice office suite provides the most popular software similar to Word, Excel and Power Print on Microsoft Office. And you do not have to pay a penny for it. Not only that, Steam platform has a client for Ubuntu. That is to say you can download and play Steam games on Ubuntu. You can even use Chrome for Ubuntu to play Android games. As long as you like, there is no function Ubuntu cannot achieve. Pocket's portability makes work anytime and anywhere possible.

As a software developer, I believe no one will deny that the Shell of Linux is N times better than that of Windows. The shell of Linux and text editor Vim are universal development tools. No matter what is to be developed, it will be used to avoid the cost of learning a variety of IDEs. And many tools can only run on Unix-like systems (Linux and OS X), for example, Spark, Hadoop and Web framework Meteor that are used for distributed data analysis and cannot be installed on Windows, let alone be developed. This is also the main reason why many programmers develop on Linux. Pocket supporting Ubuntu is to make it easier for programmers anytime and anywhere to program.

BackTrack 5r3, Nodezero, BackBox Linux, Blackbuntu, Knoppix STD and other systems, as Linuxes used by white hat hackers for penetration testing, are the most popular and well-known hacker release versions based on Ubuntu. This means that Pocket supports Ubuntu. And at the same time, it may also support these hacker systems. After all, these systems are based on Ubuntu. And the drive of Ubuntu can also be applied to these systems.

We successfully launched GPD WIN handheld device. At the same time, we were confident to run Windows 10 system on Pocket. In fact, we believe that user groups of Windows prefer such a pocket-type laptop. In the field of light office such as securities trading, table editing, text composition, PPT design and presentation as well as sending e-mail, high performance isn’t needed. Just with an external TV or monitor, Pocket can bring an excellent user experience.

In order to achieve such a product with appearance more beautiful than that of MacBook, performance better than Surface 3 and portability as a mobile phone, we have gone through nearly a year of creation and design. Only we ourselves can understand the painstaking. From the earliest concept and creative sketch design to the 3D printer model and structural design, until today, the prototype has been basically completed. We have paid a huge cost.

The reason why we raise funds in the Indiegogo is that the Pocket’s mould, research and development as well as components procurement costs are expensive. All the funds we raise will be directly used for this product’s mass production. We believe that such a product will touch all geeks who like portable devices. We really hope that you will support this project. For Pocket, let us work together!

We are a company focusing on the development of game hardware in Shenzhen, China. GPD is our brand. Its full name is GamePad Digital. We once tried to build a piece of hardware perfectly compatible with major game platforms. Then we introduced GPD XD, which was very successful and received positive evaluation of game players who like PSP, NDS and arcade games.

Later, we found that the handheld game console market based on Windows turned out to be blank and the global annual production of PC games was large. If players can play PC games on a Windows-based handheld game console, they will get a whole new experience. Based on this, we launched the GPD WIN at the end of last year. This handheld game console is successful. Though it is not perfect, the success of WIN gives us confidence to launch its upgrades.

But WIN is not suitable for light office users who are not interested in games. This part of the users covers fashionable women, geeks and successful people. On the contrary, they have a broad appeal for a product similar to the MacBook Air. And we focus on providing personalized products for different user groups. We believe that as Pocket is smaller than MacBook Air and convenient to carry, it will give users who like personalized products a new experience!

Thank you for being a member of this massive crowdfunding. Most users participating in GPD WIN crowdfunding aren’t satisfied with the WIN's keyboard. Fortunately most players operate with the handle but not keyboard. However, WIN is not suitable for light office users who are not interested in games. This part of users covers fashionable women, geeks and successful people who appeal for light and small devices. So they usually use MacBook Air or iPad. We focus on providing personalized products for different user groups. We believe that Pocket can be a substitution of MacBook Air or iPad, giving users who like personalized products a new experience!

1. Do Pocket's raised funds include the destination tariff?

Pocket's raised funds include only international logistics freight but not the import tariff caused when it enters the country of destination.

2. What after-sales services can Pocket's users of crowdfunding enjoy?

Pocket's users of crowdfunding enjoy the equal warranty when the product appears on the market. If you are not satisfied with the product, you can return the product within 1 week to receive a full refund. But please note that the postage and packaging expense of return will be borne by you. GPD won’t bear this part of cost.

3. If the raised funds do not meet the target amount, what will you do?

If the raised funds do not meet our target amount, all donations will be fully refunded and this project will fail. We will seek other ways to finance to ensure the completion of this project. I hope you guys who like this product will concern about the latest progress of this project at any time.

4. If my question doesn’t get a reply, what can I do?

Thank you for your support. If we omit your question, please send an email to sales01@gpd.hk. Then relevant people will answer your question asap.

Supporters on Indiegogo will be rewarded first.

The specifications may change during the process of raising funds to ensure the best performance of the machine.

About the operating system, we will provide Ubuntu 16.04 LTS and Windows 10 Home for the users to choose rather than the built-in dual system.

Raised funds include the freight of international express and the surcharge of remote areas.

Some of the international certifications required for this product may be provided when the product officially appears on the market such as the certifications of Japanese Radio Law and Telecommunications Act.

We will try to release the rewards in the agreed time. But it may be delayed for quality assurance, please understand!

In addition,The matching accessories Type C Hub of the third perk and the fourth perk support a USB 2.0 port, a Micro USB port, a Micro SD port, an SD port! Just check the attached picture:

Compared with a traditional keyboard, both the key process and key spacing of Pocket are significantly improved, increasing the comfort of operations.In order to meet the needs of Linux and Windows users, in the system selection, Pocket will provide Ubuntu 16.04 LTS and Windows 10 Home.As the ""kindest"" and most popular Linux system, Ubuntu can shoulder a responsibility. Ubuntu can achieve all the features on Windows. The open-source LibreOffice office suite provides the most popular software similar to Word, Excel and Power Print on Microsoft Office. And you do not have to pay a penny for it. Not only that, Steam platform has a client for Ubuntu. That is to say you can download and play Steam games on Ubuntu. You can even use Chrome for Ubuntu to play Android games. As long as you like, there is no function Ubuntu cannot achieve. Pocket's portability makes work anytime and anywhere possible.As a software developer, I believe no one will deny that the Shell of Linux is N times better than that of Windows. The shell of Linux and text editor Vim are universal development tools. No matter what is to be developed, it will be used to avoid the cost of learning a variety of IDEs. And many tools can only run on Unix-like systems (Linux and OS X), for example, Spark, Hadoop and Web framework Meteor that are used for distributed data analysis and cannot be installed on Windows, let alone be developed. This is also the main reason why many programmers develop on Linux. Pocket supporting Ubuntu is to make it easier for programmers anytime and anywhere to program.BackTrack 5r3, Nodezero, BackBox Linux, Blackbuntu, Knoppix STD and other systems, as Linuxes used by white hat hackers for penetration testing, are the most popular and well-known hacker release versions based on Ubuntu. This means that Pocket supports Ubuntu. And at the same time, it may also support these hacker systems. After all, these systems are based on Ubuntu. And the drive of Ubuntu can also be applied to these systems.We successfully launched GPD WIN handheld device. At the same time, we were confident to run Windows 10 system on Pocket. In fact, we believe that user groups of Windows prefer such a pocket-type laptop. In the field of light office such as securities trading, table editing, text composition, PPT design and presentation as well as sending e-mail, high performance isn’t needed. Just with an external TV or monitor, Pocket can bring an excellent user experience.In order to achieve such a product with appearance more beautiful than that of MacBook, performance better than Surface 3 and portability as a mobile phone, we have gone through nearly a year of creation and design. Only we ourselves can understand the painstaking. From the earliest concept and creative sketch design to the 3D printer model and structural design, until today, the prototype has been basically completed. We have paid a huge cost.The reason why we raise funds in the Indiegogo is that the Pocket’s mould, research and development as well as components procurement costs are expensive. All the funds we raise will be directly used for this product’s mass production. We believe that such a product will touch all geeks who like portable devices. We really hope that you will support this project. For Pocket, let us work together!We are a company focusing on the development of game hardware in Shenzhen, China. GPD is our brand. Its full name is GamePad Digital. We once tried to build a piece of hardware perfectly compatible with major game platforms. Then we introduced GPD XD, which was very successful and received positive evaluation of game players who like PSP, NDS and arcade games.Later, we found that the handheld game console market based on Windows turned out to be blank and the global annual production of PC games was large. If players can play PC games on a Windows-based handheld game console, they will get a whole new experience. Based on this, we launched the GPD WIN at the end of last year. This handheld game console is successful. Though it is not perfect, the success of WIN gives us confidence to launch its upgrades.But WIN is not suitable for light office users who are not interested in games. This part of the users covers fashionable women, geeks and successful people. On the contrary, they have a broad appeal for a product similar to the MacBook Air. And we focus on providing personalized products for different user groups. We believe that as Pocket is smaller than MacBook Air and convenient to carry, it will give users who like personalized products a new experience!Thank you for being a member of this massive crowdfunding. Most users participating in GPD WIN crowdfunding aren’t satisfied with the WIN's keyboard. Fortunately most players operate with the handle but not keyboard. However, WIN is not suitable for light office users who are not interested in games. This part of users covers fashionable women, geeks and successful people who appeal for light and small devices. So they usually use MacBook Air or iPad. We focus on providing personalized products for different user groups. We believe that Pocket can be a substitution of MacBook Air or iPad, giving users who like personalized products a new experience!1. Do Pocket's raised funds include the destination tariff?Pocket's raised funds include only international logistics freight but not the import tariff caused when it enters the country of destination.2. What after-sales services can Pocket's users of crowdfunding enjoy?Pocket's users of crowdfunding enjoy the equal warranty when the product appears on the market. If you are not satisfied with the product, you can return the product within 1 week to receive a full refund. But please note that the postage and packaging expense of return will be borne by you. GPD won’t bear this part of cost.3. If the raised funds do not meet the target amount, what will you do?If the raised funds do not meet our target amount, all donations will be fully refunded and this project will fail. We will seek other ways to finance to ensure the completion of this project. I hope you guys who like this product will concern about the latest progress of this project at any time.4. If my question doesn’t get a reply, what can I do?Thank you for your support. If we omit your question, please send an email to sales01@gpd.hk. Then relevant people will answer your question asap.Supporters on Indiegogo will be rewarded first.The specifications may change during the process of raising funds to ensure the best performance of the machine.About the operating system, we will provide Ubuntu 16.04 LTS and Windows 10 Home for the users to choose rather than the built-in dual system.Raised funds include the freight of international express and the surcharge of remote areas.Some of the international certifications required for this product may be provided when the product officially appears on the market such as the certifications of Japanese Radio Law and Telecommunications Act.We will try to release the rewards in the agreed time. But it may be delayed for quality assurance, please understand!In addition,The matching accessories Type C Hub of the third perk and the fourth perk support a USB 2.0 port, a Micro USB port, a Micro SD port, an SD port! Replace all other dongles with HyperDrive
column6:
>

Compared to other dongles in the market and from the Apple Store, HyperDrive is more portable, has more features and is made of better materials. You would need multiple dongles to achieve what HyperDrive does, at a total cost much higher than HyperDrive.

Stop figuring out how to store and carry your dongles
column7:
>

Having multiple dongles means that you now have more items to manage on top of your iPad Pro, which increases the risk of misplacing them as you move around.

With HyperDrive, just pack and go
column8:
>

HyperDrive is designed to be compact enough to stay with your iPad Pro wherever you go.

Don't look silly with dongles. Just go with HyperDrive!
column9:
>

Stop hanging and juggling with multiple dongles. A single compact HyperDrive does the job of multiple dongles. Dongles never look sleeker than this.

Precision milled aluminum enclosure color matched to Silver and Space Gray iPad Pro
column10: >
column11: >
column12: >Perfectly color matched to Space Gray and Silver iPad Pro
column13: >The same HyperDrive works with both 11"" and 12.9"" iPad Pro
column14:
>

Design

We wanted HyperDrive to feel like a natural extension of the 2018 iPad Pro with similar product lines, thickness, right angled edges and rounded corners.
column15:
>

As the 2018 iPad Pro only has a single USB-C port for the HyperDrive to latch on, we had to come up with an innovative solution to secure HyperDrive onto the iPad Pro.
column16:
>

The end result is a sleek, minimalist design that perfectly matches the 2018 iPad Pro with almost the same thickness, with removable soft grips that secures the HyperDrive onto the iPad Pro without interfering with its or the Apple Smart (Keyboard) Folio functionality. The Worldwide Patent Pending removable grip design also allows HyperDrive to be used with other iPad Pro cases or other USB-C devices and allows for future accessories like an extension USB-C cable to the HyperDrive.
column17:
>

We decided to go with popular output ports (HDMI, microSD, SD, USB-A) most requested by users. Although HyperDrive takes up a USB-C port on the iPad Pro, it also returns a USB-C port as well, which supports USB-C 5Gbps data and up to 60W power delivery pass through charging through HyperDrive.
column18: >
column19:
>

Proof of working prototype that is ready for production

The following unedited single-shot video demonstrates a fully functional pre-production HyperDrive with all (HDMI, USB-C, microSD, SD, USB-A, 3.5 audio jack) ports working. Using HyperDrive, the iPad Pro is able to connect to a HDMI display, connect to an external speaker via 3.5mm audio jack, import photos/videos from USB-C/USB-A flash drives and microSD/SD memory cards, all while being powered by a USB-C power source. HyperDrive for iPad Pro is plug-n-play and interfaces directly with iOS, with no additional apps required. Connecting devices to HyperDrive is like connecting devices directly to iPad Pro via original Apple USB-C adapters.

                  - SD (UHS-I 104MB/s)
                  - USB-A data (USB 3.1 Gen 1, 5Gb/s)

•  Enclosure: CNC aluminum available in Silver and Space Gray

>

See our Press Release

 

9to5mac checks out the HyperJuice!
column3:
wmode=transparent"" width=""612"">

Always running out of battery when you need it?
column4:
>

Used to having your life interrupted when your devices run out of battery with no power outlet in sight? Not anymore...

Introducing HyperJuice - The Most Powerful USB-C Battery Pack
column5:
>

USB-C is a new high power (max 100W) connector that can charge virtually any modern device with new laptops, tablets, smartphones switching to USB-C charging everyday and HyperJuice is the most powerful USB-C battery pack because...

HyperJuice has not 1 but 2 USB-C plus a 18W QC 3.0 USB-A port
column6:
>

HyperJuice delivers the 2 most powerful USB-C Power Delivery 3.0 profiles (100W and 60W) in a single battery pack while the competition struggles to even reach 45W. We also throw in a powerful 18W USB-A Qualcomm Quick Charge 3.0 port for mobile devices. With these 3 powerful fast charging ports, HyperJuice can...

Quick charge MacBook Pro, iPad &
column7: iPhone all at the same time!
column8:
>

Quick charge a large laptop (e.g. 15"" MacBook Pro), a midsize laptop/tablet (13"" MacBook Pro, 12"" MacBook, 12.9"" iPad Pro) and a mobile device (iPad, iPhone) all at the same time!

But that's not all, HyperJuice works with any USB-C and USB-A devices and can...

Also charge Cameras, GoPros, Headphones, Speakers, VR Headsets, Nintendo Switches and even Drones
column9:
>

 

The only battery that can power the Wacom MobileStudio Pro 16""
column10:
>

The HyperJuice is also the only external battery pack in the world that can power the Wacom MobileStudio Pro 16"" as it requires 100W of power which only the HyperJuice can provide.

So how does HyperJuice trash the competition? Check this out, HyperJuice has...

More battery capacity and power output in a smaller form factor
column11:
>

Almost all USB-C battery packs in the market are underpowered with puny battery capacity or low USB-C power (18/30/45/60W). HyperJuice packs up to 100W USB-C Power Delivery in a single port (up to 130W combined power in all ports) and has the maximum 27000mAh battery capacity allowed on airplanes, yet it is still 28% smaller than the closest competitor.

Better Features, Better Specifications and Better Value For Money
column12:
>

 

Charge HyperJuice and your devices at the same time!
column13:
>

 

Recharge HyperJuice from empty to full charge in about 1 hour

A huge battery capacity means nothing if it takes forever to charge. You don't want your backup battery to spend more time recharging itself than charging your devices that matter.

With its 100W USB-C Power Delivery 3.0 input, it will only take about 1 hour to fully recharge the 100Wh/27000mAh HyperJuice from empty to full.

To save your even more time, HyperJuice supports pass through charging so you can charge your devices and HyperJuice at the same time through a single power outlet.

Maximum airline safe battery capacity of 27000mAh / 100Wh
column14:
>

Rule the skies with maximum battery capacity approved by TSA/EASA for air travel.  

Double the battery life of 15"" MacBook Pro
column15:
>

With 100Wh/27000mAh HyperJuice, you can double the battery life of your 15"" MacBook Pro

Ultra portable - only weighs 550g
column16:
>

For all the power, HyperJuice only weighs 550g so you can carry the ONLY battery that matters, that can power ALL your devices, wherever you go, away from the grid, without fear of losing power, without life interrupted.

The HyperJuice Design
column17:
>

To achieve the maximum battery capacity of 27000mAh, we used 8 x LG Chemical 18650 Rechargeable Lithium Ion Battery Cells. We narrowed down to 2 possible battery cell configuration and ultimately went with configuration/prototype #2 as it is slimmer, enough to fit in bags/pockets and easier to grab/hold with a single hand.
column18: >
column19: >
column20: final prototype with 2 x USB-C, 1 x USB-A and updated 5 stage circular LED battery gauge"" data-id=""22672872""><figure style=""margin: 0px
column22: final prototype with 2 x USB-C, 1 x USB-A and updated 5 stage circular LED battery gauge"" class=""lazy"" data-src=""https://indiegogo-media-prod-cld-res.cloudinary.com/image/upload/v1539117372/hdfztiggyrthizdxgrpj.jpg"" src=""""/><figcaption>3rd &amp
column23: final prototype with 2 x USB-C, 1 x USB-A and updated 5 stage circular LED battery gauge
column24: >
column25: >
column26:
>

Slim enough to fit in pockets and easily grab with one hand
column27:
>

 

Minimalist Aircraft Grade Aluminum Design
column28:
>

While designing a high capacity battery, we still wanted a highly compact and portable solution. Aircraft grade aluminum was chosen as the enclosure material as it is strong yet thin and malleable enough to follow the lines of the battery cells, wrapping and protecting it with minimal space wastage. Aluminum is also a very good heat dissipator to keep the battery cool at all times. The minimalist aluminum design is efficient, functional and matches the MacBook perfectly.

Compliments the MacBook perfectly
column29:
>

 

HyperJuice Ports jam packed with Power!
column30:
>

We wanted to be make the most powerful USB-C battery pack so we put in not 1 but 2 high power USB-C ports. We also added a USB-A port so that HyperJuice will be backward compatible with older devices. We ultimately went with more USB-C ports than USB-A ports as USB-C is the future as it is more powerful and more versatile with more devices switching to USB-C everyday. We also designed a unique circular space saving 5 stage LED battery level indicator that lies symmetrically with the power button, just like the ports.

Power to charge a MacBook Pro, iPad &
column31: iPhone at the same time!
column32:
>

HyperJuice - Designed to be the Most Powerful USB-C Battery
column33:
>

Demonstration of Working Prototype 

We recently demonstrated a working prototype of the HyperJuice at the recent IFA Berlin 2018 trade show where the following  video was shot.

The following one shot unedited video demonstrates a fully functional pre-production HyperJuice with all charging ports working. The 100W USB-C port is shown to charge a 2018 MacBook Pro 15"" at 100W. The 60W USB-C port is shown to charge a 2018 MacBook Pro 13"" at 60W while the 18W USB-A port is shown to simultaneously charge a iPhone X at the same time. Pass through charging is also demonstrated. While HyperJuice is being recharged via its 100W USB-C input port, the HyperJuice is able to charge the 2018 MacBook Pro 13"" and iPhone X at the same time via the 60W USB-C output port and 18W USB-A port respectively.

column1:
Reward Fulfilment

For US fulfilment, rewards will first be sea freight from our Asia manufacturing facility to our Fremont, California warehouse and thereafter be shipped to US addresses via insured USPS Priority Mail or FedEx Ground. US based backers are expected to receive rewards within a week from shipping from our Fremont, California warehouse. For Rest of the World fulfilment, rewards will be air freight directly from our distribution center in Shenzhen, China. Backers are also expected to receive rewards between 4-20 days from shipping.

Project Timeline

•  Interface:
                        - Max 100W USB-C Power Delivery 3.0 Input/Output
                        - Max 60W USB-C Power Delivery 3.0 Output
                        - Max 18W USB-A Qualcomm Quick Charge 3.0 Output
