Resources for Press and Media 

 ""...the most capable world travel adapter yet."" - AppleInsider 

""This is the ultimate travel accessory for charging all of your gadgets and devices."" - GeekyGadgets
column2:
> 

Travel should be exciting. And it shouldn’t involve compromise. To get all your devices charged, you need at least three products: a USB charger for multiple devices, a travel adapter for power outlets, and a power adapter for your laptop.
column3:
>

If that sounds like overkill, we agree. Introducing Passport 30W, the ultimate worry-free powerhouse that packs a 4-port USB charger with 30W Power Delivery (PD), a travel adapter with auto-resetting fuse, and a power adapter into one sleek unit. This all-in-one adapter allows you to charge up to 5 devices together in over 200 countries and regions.
column6: >Two years ago, we set a new standard for convenience and style with our trailblazing travel adapter, Passport. It was the first travel adapter to feature an auto-resetting fuse. With four USB ports, a convenient all-in-one design, and standout aesthetics, Passport became an instant favorite, even earning a Good Design Award in 2017 from the Chicago Athenaeum Museum of Architecture and Design.
column7:
>

Now, we’re raising the bar again with the next generation in travel technology: Passport 30W. We kept everything people loved about the original Passport and made significant upgrades for superior compatibility and performance, based on feedback from real users. 

In short, we’ve made it faster, more powerful, and compatible with the latest devices.

column6:
> 

Note: Full 30W Power Delivery output available one USB-C port output only.
column7:
>

USB-C PD (Power Delivery) is rapidly becoming the new standard for powering and charging phones, laptops, and a host of other devices. Passport 30W features a 30W USB-C PD port, allowing fast charging for your USB-C devices, including MacBook, iPad, iPhone, portable chargers, Nintendo Switch, cameras and more.
column12:
>

Traveling comes with a unique set of demands, including the need to power and charge several devices in a limited amount of space. Smaller travel adapters can only accommodate two or three devices at a time. Passport 30W has a USB-C port, three USB-A ports, and a multi-region AC output, charging up to five devices all at once.
column15:
>

Passport was the first travel adapter to acknowledge a simple fact: People don’t like searching through an electronics store to find a replacement fuse while traveling. Or ever, frankly. While a traditional travel adapter features a single-use fuse that will need to be replaced in the event that too much current is drawn, Passport eschewed the rustic charm of having to fix your own electronics in favor of an auto-resetting fuse. User feedback suggests we were really onto something. Passport 30W takes after its predecessor in this regard. If too much current is drawn, the circuit will temporarily stop the flow of electricity, resuming again after a few seconds. It’s one less thing to worry about when you’re far from home.
column17:
>

Our research indicated that people find multi-part travel adapters frustrating. They can be difficult to use, and pieces can often be lost. Passport 30W has no removable parts. Easy to pack, easy to unpack, and easy to use. Simply press and slide the buttons to select the appropriate connector with just one hand.
column19:
>

Our priority is innovative functionality, but we will never compromise on design. Passport is co-designed with Y Studios, an award-winning design firm based in San Francisco that has won numerous Red Dot, iF, and Good Design awards in the past. We worked closely for nearly two years on this project. Thanks to its revolutionary innovation and beautiful industrial design, Passport won a Good Design Award in 2017 from the Chicago Athenaeum Museum of Architecture and Design. It also earned many accolades from our customers.
column20:
>

For Passport 30W, we adopted this beautiful design and upgraded one USB-A port to USB-C for 30W Power Delivery. Also, this USB-C port is highlighted in blue to differentiate it from USB-A ports and compliment Passport’s “Press and Slide” buttons.
column24:
>

A traditional travel adapter with wide-open slots can be easily explored by a curious toddler using any small object, and this poses a risk of shock. Passport 30W's universal AC output has a child-proof shield to make sure that the outlet is only used for plugs. We designed this proprietary baby-proof shield to reduce potential safety hazards.
column29:
>

Zendure is well known for our durable products, and Passport 30W comes with a 2-Year Warranty with exceptional customer service. If you have a problem or a question, contact us at zendure.com/support. We are always there to help. Plus, we also offer worldwide shipping to simplify everything.
column32:
> 

Passport 30W can plug into type A, B, C, D, E, F, G, I, J, K, L, N and O outlets. This is related to where you want to travel to with Passport 30W.
column35:
> 

Passport 30W can accept type A, B, C, E, F, G, I, J, K, L and N plugs. This is related to the devices you want to use, or in other words, where you are from.
column36:
>

Here’s a complete list of countries Passport 30W in compatible with (more than 200 countries and regions).
column40:
>

 Zendure was founded in 2013 by Tom Haflinger and Bryan Liu. Zendure has a portfolio of innovative premium quality products, including A-Series, the world's first crush-proof external batteries
column41:
and Passport, the first travel adapter with an auto-resetting fuse. Their newest travel adapter, Passport 30W delivers up to 30W via USB-C PD and features all-in-one design and a self-resetting fuse.

 Zendure has abundant experience in travel adapter products. Zendure Passport - The World's First Fail-Safe Global Travel Adapter, drew over $300,000 USD in crowdfunding and earned a Chicago Athenaeum Museum of Architecture and Design “Good Design” Award in recognition of its unique features and attractive design. Passport 30W is based on this design.

What is the product?

We have already successfully built a smartphone microscope product line including a series of products such as microRuler, iMICROSCOPE R and iADAPTER, thanks to the great support from our backers and customers.

iMICROSCOPE is another smartphone microscope product we are pleased to bring to you. In addition to useful features such as dedicated App, embedded scale-bar, it has its own illumination system, which is programmed to provide 3 different modes for observation. Moreover, its innovative nano-pad connection method enable it to be able to work with most smartphones.

Here are some micrographs took with it:

It is programmed to control the illumination by clicking one button, therefore you can select the illumination among white illumination of high angle, white illumination of low angle (a mode between bright field and dark field) and 375nm UV illumination to achieve best observation of a certain sample.

The features of iMICROSCOPE

  • Aluminum alloy body with solid quality

It is made of air-craft grade aluminum alloy with CNC machining, anodized finishing and a unique serial No. engraved by mechanical process.   

  • Coated aspherical glass lens  

An aspheric lens is a lens whose surfaces profile neither a portion of a sphere nor of a circular cylinder. An aspherical lens is designed for aberration correction. With the help of aspherical lens, distortion is reduced.

In addition, a pure glass lens with surface coating will further increase the optical performance.

  • Programmed illumination control  

Illumination is very important for photography as well as for microscopy. Three illumination components are integrated around the microscopic lens, provide different illumination modes, which is available at click of one button. As shown below a banknote of 20USD observed under different illumination modes. The florescence paints with miniature prints is clearly shown under UV illumination.

Battery level indicator  

4 stage battery level indicator with blue LED is designed to show the status of battery level and charging status.

  • Dedicated APP and μRuler

Due to the lack of sense on size in microscopic world, it is important to keep a scale-bar and ensure its accuracy on micrograph. The dedicated APP i-SEEING was designed to take micrographs to meet professional demand. Scale-bar on the micrograph could be tangled on/off to let you be able to embed a scale-bar on the image. 

In addition, a high quality μRuler (stage micrometer) will be also provided with iMICROSCOPE to calibrate and assure accuracy of the scale-bar. Please see our previous campaign μRuler - A micro-Ruler to measure the micro objects for more information.

  • Nano-pad - durable and easy cleaning

iMICROSCOPE is designed for different Phone models, this is achieved with nano-pad to connect with different phones. 

Different from conventional adhesive, the nano suction pad mimics gecko's foot-pads, it has thousands of micro air pockets functioning like micro suction cups to hold the device to the phone. Every on and off application will leave nothing on the phone. This newly developed ""nano suction pad"" is residue-free, non-tacky and repeatable.

This nano suction pad is also easily to be cleaned by touching it with a PSA tape. So it could be used again and again. Here is a demo that it was contaminated by some dust (wheat flour), after cleaning with a PSA tape, it resumed its function as fresh.
column3:
showinfo=0"">
  • Easy to use and work with most smartphones

In addition to all these features, it is very easy to use, no complex tuning and adjusting necessary. Just put it on your iPhone, turn it on and point it against what you are interested to look, that's it. 

 

Thanks to the nano-pad connection method, it is able to accomodate most of the current smartphones, either for those with a flat camera or extruded camera. For those with double-lens, only one lens need to be slected to use.

 

Highlight and Specification

 Rewards

 

 

Time line

 Let others know iMICROSCOPE!

iMicroscope is a perfect gift for everyone who needs microscope, likes shooting extreme macros and exploring the micro-objects... Let your friends and family know about iMicroscope!

What is iMicroscope R?

iMicroscope R is one of the smartphone microscopes we developed. It is solid, slim and coming with dedicated professional App to meet either educational purpose or profession application.

Here are some micrographs took with it:

From the embedded scale-bar, it is easily to know the size of the micro-objects, for example, the size of the pixel was estimated at about 0.08mm from the scale-bar, agree well with the theoretical value calculated from its 326 PPI of the retinal display.

The features of iMicroscope R

Slim and ultra-portable

it is of low profile, only 4.5mm thick (less than 0.2 inch), adding not much on the phone and so that it is smoothly put in a pocket:

Aspherical lens

An aspheric lens is a lens whose surfaces profile neither a portion of a sphere nor of a circular cylinder.An aspheric lens is designed for aberration correction. With the help of aspheric lens, distortion is reduced.   

Instant lens switching

When do the observation, it is often the case that we need to switch between normal camera mode for a overview and microscope mode local detail. So with the lens switching mechanism of iMicroscope, it is instant and very easy:
column3:
showinfo=0"">

Solid and durable

It is made of air-craft grade aluminum alloy with CNC machining, anodized finishing, diamond cutting and laser engraving process.

Nano suction pad - durable and easy cleaning

Different from conventional adhesive, the nano suction pad mimics gecko's foot-pads, it has thousands of micro air pockets functioning like micro suction cups to hold the device to the phone. Every on and off application will leave nothing on the phone. This newly developed ""nano suction pad"" is residue-free, non-tacky and repeatable. 

This nano suction pad is also easily to be cleaned by touching it with a PSA tape. So it could be used again and again. Here is a demo that it was contaminated by some dust (wheat flour), after cleaning with a PSA tape, it resumed its function as fresh.

column1:
Accurate and professional

Due to the lack of sense on size in microscopic world, it is important to keep a scale-bar and ensure its accuracy on micrograph. For iMicroscope, this is not only done by the scale-bar calibration function in the dedicated APP, but also a high quality microRuler (stage micrometer) which is made by photomask technology, to assure accuracy. Please see our previous campaign μRuler - A micro-Ruler to measure the micro objects for more information and it is available for pre-order at Indiegogo for InDemand.

The dedicated APP was designed to take micrographs to meet professional demand. Scale bar on the micrograph could be tangled on/off and it could be calibrated and validated with the microRuler.

Campatibilty

  • for Phones with a flat camera, or a small extruded camera

iMicrosocpe attaches to the phones with nano-pad,  can be stay on phone as long as you need it, or remove it after microscope observation. It could apply again and again as the nano-suction is durable and easily be cleaned by a PSA tape.

  • for Phones with big extruded camera

It is good to work with a phone case, iMicroscope could be fixed to the phone case and then attached to the phone. if you prefer, for phones with flat camera, you also can do this to make iMicroscope a dedicated one for your phone with case. An adhesive pad will be provided.

Highlight and Specification

Rewards

We (Shanghai Qingying  E&

Garden– plants, insects  

R&
column3:
D– failure analysis, material observation, defects observation  

Hobby– banknote, postage, vintage  

Education - School experiment, explore micro-world  

Daily life– office application,reading

Forensic – field observation and records

We plan to start this project to build this small and powerful tool, with solid quality, to help more and more people. We highly appreciate your support.

Risks and challenges

Manufacturing aspect 
We have established manufacturing capability through accumulated experience in the development and manufacture of our other products. We carefully select suppliers and OEM of key parts, keep the cost, process and quality under control, and develop good relationships with our partners.

Time line 
We put lot of effort and also a reasonable buffer to our project plan to meet the time line, there may be difficulties and problems need to overcome on the road. We will be engaged in the project to solve the problem and stick on the time line. You will be updated in timely manner for the progress of the project.

","What is iMicroscope R?iMicroscope R is one of the smartphone microscopes we developed. It is solid, slim and coming with dedicated professional App to meet either educational purpose or profession application.Here are some micrographs took with it:From the embedded scale-bar, it is easily to know the size of the micro-objects, for example, the size of the pixel was estimated at about 0.08mm from the scale-bar, agree well with the theoretical value calculated from its 326 PPI of the retinal display.The features of iMicroscope RSlim and ultra-portableit is of low profile, only 4.5mm thick (less than 0.2 inch), adding not much on the phone and so that it is smoothly put in a pocket:

column1: Aspherical lensAn aspheric lens is a lens whose surfaces profile neither a portion of a sphere nor of a circular cylinder.An aspheric lens is designed for aberration correction. With the help of aspheric lens, distortion is reduced.   Instant lens switchingWhen do the observation, it is often the case that we need to switch between normal camera mode for a overview and microscope mode local detail. So with the lens switching mechanism of iMicroscope, it is instant and very easy:Solid and durableIt is made of air-craft grade aluminum alloy with CNC machining, anodized finishing, diamond cutting and laser engraving process.Nano suction pad - durable and easy cleaningDifferent from conventional adhesive, the nano suction pad mimics gecko's foot-pads, it has thousands of micro air pockets functioning like micro suction cups to hold the device to the phone. Every on and off application will leave nothing on the phone. This newly developed ""nano suction pad"" is residue-free, non-tacky and repeatable. This nano suction pad is also easily to be cleaned by touching it with a PSA tape. So it could be used again and again. Here is a demo that it was contaminated by some dust (wheat flour), after cleaning with a PSA tape, it resumed its function as fresh.

Accurate and professionalDue to the lack of sense on size in microscopic world, it is important to keep a scale-bar and ensure its accuracy on micrograph. For iMicroscope, this is not only done by the scale-bar calibration function in the dedicated APP, but also a high quality microRuler (stage micrometer) which is made by photomask technology, to assure accuracy. Please see our previous campaign μRuler - A micro-Ruler to measure the micro objects for more information and it is available for pre-order at Indiegogo for InDemand.The dedicated APP was designed to take micrographs to meet professional demand. Scale bar on the micrograph could be tangled on/off and it could be calibrated and validated with the microRuler.Campatibiltyfor Phones with a flat camera, or a small extruded cameraiMicrosocpe attaches to the phones with nano-pad,  can be stay on phone as long as you need it, or remove it after microscope observation. It could apply again and again as the nano-suction is durable and easily be cleaned by a PSA tape.for Phones with big extruded cameraIt is good to work with a phone case, iMicroscope could be fixed to the phone case and then attached to the phone. if you prefer, for phones with flat camera, you also can do this to make iMicroscope a dedicated one for your phone with case. An adhesive pad will be provided.Highlight and SpecificationRewards Time lineKnow anyone who may like iMicrosocpe R?iMicroscope R is a perfect gift for everyone who needs microscope, likes shooting extreme macros and exploring the micro-objects... Let your friends and family know about iMicroscope R.  About usWe (Shanghai Qingying  E&T LLC, www.mobile-scope.com) focus on the development and manufacture of mobile phone microscopic photography product. We started quite a few years ago and get several patents authorized in this field since April of 2012. An additional patent  is pending on lens switching microscope, direct related to this project.We built several products line to help our customer with the best smartphone based tools and instruments in different application:Industry– PCB, printing, fabrics, fine mechanics abrasives  Medical– in hospital dermography, parasite  Garden– plants, insects  R&D– failure analysis, material observation, defects observation  Hobby– banknote, postage, vintage  Education - School experiment, explore micro-world  Daily life– office application,readingForensic – field observation and recordsWe plan to start this project to build this small and powerful tool, with solid quality, to help more and more people. We highly appreciate your support.Risks and challengesManufacturing aspect We have established manufacturing capability through accumulated experience in the development and manufacture of our other products. We carefully select suppliers and OEM of key parts, keep the cost, process and quality under control, and develop good relationships with our partners.Time line We put lot of effort and also a reasonable buffer to our project plan to meet the time line, there may be difficulties and problems need to overcome on the road. We will be engaged in the project to solve the problem and stick on the time line. You will be updated in timely manner for the progress of the project.",18.0,3,"6 Campaigns

column3:
>For the latest Jolla Tablet news, please check out the official Jolla Blog.

What the press says about the Jolla Tablet, chosen as the tablet in Mobile World Congress 2015:

column4: '>Engadget: Jolla Tablet shows us what Sailfish OS is capable of
'>Pocketnow: Jolla Tablet and Sailfish OS 2.0: hands-on at MWC 2015 (Video)
'>CNET: Jolla Tablet makes multitasking easy with gesture control (Video)
'>TechCrunch: Jolla’s Sailfish Slate, The Tablet Without A U.S. OS (Video)
'>PhoneDog: Best Small Tablet at MWC 2015? Jolla Tablet hands-on (Video)

'>Jolla Tablet’s operating system Sailfish OS 2.0 will be unlike anything you’ve tried before. Once you try it, you’ll never want to go back. With its second generation, Sailfish OS is more intuitive and beautiful than ever.

column1: Multitasking on Sailfish OS 2.0 conveniently shows all your running apps in one single view. At a glance, you’ll see everything that’s going on, and you can easily switch between apps. You can also  control Sailfish OS apps directly from the multitasking view, for  example, you can change to a different song without fully opening the app in full.

column4:
'>

Sailfish OS 2.0 works with your natural hand movements via simple gestures, which makes using the tablet super-fast. You don’t have to push tiny buttons or search your way back home – everything is always under your thumb.

column1: Besides running its own native apps, Sailfish OS 2.0 has the capability to run Android apps. You can continue using your favourite apps like Facebook, Twitter and Instagram, and downloading all  the latest ones via the Jolla Store and different Android app  marketplaces.
Jolla’s  core value is freedom of choice for our customers. That’s why we’ve  picked Intel’s innovation platform, backed by open source, to power the  Jolla Tablet.
At  32/64GB, the Jolla tablet will have the space and hardware potential to  be customised, and if you happen run out, there’s always the option to  expand with a microSD memory card.
Sailfish OS 2.0 deserves to be accompanied by a great display – and the Jolla Tablet delivers. At 330 ppi, the display will out-perform the iPad's and Androids of the world.

Jolla design is all about functionality, minimalism and style. The  front of your tablet will be dedicated to viewing what’s on screen,  without any distractions. Sailfish OS 2.0 is all about logic,  consistency and understanding intuitive movement.
With your Jolla  Tablet, you’ll experience a completely different way of interacting with  your device.
Jolla is all about the power of people coming together to help build
something meaningful. We want to challenge the mobile industry big guns
and show  them that independence, community and innovation can play a
lead role in  the mobile industry.
It doesn’t matter who you are, you’ll get your voice heard  in our community forum together.jolla.com.
It’s here that users can suggest new features for Sailfish OS, as well
as discuss ideas with the Jolla Sailors (our development team). Our
community votes on whether they would like to see proposed ideas
developed  further, and rest assured anything that has been voted on by
the community will receive due attention by the Jolla Sailors. Our
community is a vital part of the process and  plays a huge role in

column4: '>Sailfish OS is mobile-optimized with the flexibility, ubiquity and stability of the Linux core and a cutting edge user experience built with the renowned Qt™ platform.

column16:
'>

If  you haven’t heard of Jolla before, we’re an independent company that  believes in innovation through collaboration. We’ve already launched a  successful smartphone and  have created our own mobile operating system called Sailfish OS, grown  from few to 100+ sailors (Jolla means small boat in Finnish), and built  an amazing community 150,000 Jolla fans strong and counting.

We  are completely different to any other company you’ll ever support. All  of our customers can have their say on the direction of our products  through Jolla and other open source communities that we work closely  with.

So, are you with us?

column1: Are shipping costs and VAT included in the Perk price in Indiegogo?

The prices $239.00 and $269.00, respectively, do not include shipping and applicable VAT.

How do I contribute to a Perk so that I get a Jolla Tablet, including shipping?
There are two (2) perks to choose from - 32 GB Jolla Tablet and 64 GB Jolla Tablet – shipping cost (and VAT) will be added automatically to the final contribution amount.

I contributed using two Indiegogo accounts/email addresses - what should I do?
If you have made several contributions using different accounts, please make sure to tell us about this by submitting a support request here.

In the request, please indicate all the email addresses you used.

I did not choose a Perk when contributing, but I paid the whole sum for the Tablet - do I get a Jolla Tablet?
If you made a contribution for the Jolla Tablet without adding a perk, there is no need to worry as long as the contribution equals the price of one of the two available perks.

I made a contribution, but now I've changed my mind. How do I get my contribution back?
Indiegogo is changing their refund policy for contributions starting on 1st September 2015.

Contributors may request a refund from Indiegogo before the end of a campaign they have contributed to. For Campaigns that have entered the InDemand program - of which the Jolla Tablet is now a part of - Contributors may request a refund from Indiegogo within 10 days of the contribution. Read more here.

In addition, for campaigns in the InDemand program, contributors must request a refund within 10 days of the contribution. Contributions are eligible for a refund by Indiegogo unless (a) funds have already been transferred to the campaign owner, (b) the perk associated with the contribution has been fulfilled or (c) Indiegogo determines that there has been an abuse of the refund policy.
(Please see also the question immediately below.)

I am not happy with the Tablet, can I return it?
You may return the tablet delivered to you within 14 days of receiving it. Please note that return shipping, including any customs or other charges - as applicable - will be borne by the sender. Keep in mind that we only accept returns from ship-to countries supported by the Jolla tablet campaign.

To request a return please submit a ticket here. Please indicate clearly in the subject and body of the request “RETURN”, provide your 1) contribution email address(es), 2) specifics on which perk(s) you contributed towards, and 3) the payment method utilized. Once we receive your request, we will then provide you with further instructions.

How do I know if my contribution was successful?
You should have received a confirmation email from Indiegogo if your contribution was successful. The confirmation email you received from Indiegogo serves as the receipt for your contribution. Please follow these instructions to access your individual Indiegogo account.
When are you going to ship the Tablets?
We will keep you updated on the schedule in our update emails and in the Jolla Blog.

How do I pay for several Tablets? I can add only one Perk at a time?
If you wish to contribute for several Tablets, we kindly ask that you contribute for one perk and shipping at a time, using the same email address for all contributions.

If I pay for more than one Tablet, what should I pay for shipping?
Each of the two (2) perks - 32 GB and 64 GB Tablet, respectively - has shipping included. There is no need to contribute separately to cover shipping cost.

After contributing to the campaign, what happens next?
We will keep you updated on the schedule by email and through the Jolla Blog.
Disclaimer: Delivery of rewards/perks are subject to best efforts and not guaranteed.

What are the technical specifications for the Jolla Tablet, are they subject to change?
The technical specifications are as follows. Please note that we reserve the right to make changes in described features, specifications, and delivery date estimations and to introduce software features and functionality at a later date.

Dimensions &
column2:
weight: 203 mm x 137 mm x 8.3 mm, 384 g
Display: 7.85"" 2048x1536 (IPS, 330ppi), 5 points multi-touch, fully laminated
Processor: 64Bit Intel Quad Core 1.8Ghz, Intel® HD Graphics GPU
Camera: 5MP rear camera with Full HD 1080p video + 2Mp front camera
Battery: 3.8V / 4450mAh
Memory: 32GB &
column3:
64GB variants available, 2 GB memory (DDR3L-RS) + MicroSD up to 128GB (Note: card must be in EXT4 format to work)

Connectivity:
WIFI (only): 802.11 a/b/g/n dual-band
USB: Micro USB-OTG
Bluetooth: class 3.0
Positioning: A-GPS &
column4:
GLONASS
Headphones: 3.5 mm, AHJ standard

For more details, please see here.

The Jolla Tablet supports memory cards up to 128GB in size. Will these cards work with Windows computers?
Support for 128GB memory cards on the Jolla Tablet relies on an open-source solution. This enables you to use memory cards up to 128GB for back-ups and additional storage, but due to Microsoft’s licensing limitations, cards over 32GB will not be directly compatible with Windows computers. We apologize if you were expecting full Microsoft support here, but we feel that this best suits to our community's wishes and Jolla's values.

Can the tablet features or specifications change before delivery?
As in any product development, changes are possible. We reserve the right to make changes in described features, specifications, and delivery date estimations and to introduce software features and functionality at a later date.

column1: Didn't find answer to your question? Please submit a request if needed. We're happy to help!

A BIG thank you for all 21,632 contributors for making Jolla Tablet the most funded Indiegogo campaign ever in Asia and Europe! For the latest Jolla Tablet news, please check out the official Jolla Blog.What the press says about the Jolla Tablet, chosen as the tablet in Mobile World Congress 2015:
Engadget: Jolla Tablet shows us what Sailfish OS is capable of

Jolla Tablet’s operating system Sailfish OS 2.0 will be unlike anything you’ve tried before. Once you try it, you’ll never want to go back. With its second generation, Sailfish OS is more intuitive and beautiful than ever.

Multitasking on Sailfish OS 2.0 conveniently shows all your running apps in one single view. At a glance, you’ll see everything that’s going on, and you can easily switch between apps. You can also  control Sailfish OS apps directly from the multitasking view, for  example, you can change to a different song without fully opening the app in full.

Sailfish OS 2.0 works with your natural hand movements via simple gestures, which makes using the tablet super-fast. You don’t have to push tiny buttons or search your way back home – everything is always under your thumb.

Besides running its own native apps, Sailfish OS 2.0 has the capability to run Android apps. You can continue using your favourite apps like Facebook, Twitter and Instagram, and downloading all  the latest ones via the Jolla Store and different Android app  marketplaces.
Jolla’s  core value is freedom of choice for our customers. That’s why we’ve  picked Intel’s innovation platform, backed by open source, to power the  Jolla Tablet.
At  32/64GB, the Jolla tablet will have the space and hardware potential to  be customised, and if you happen run out, there’s always the option to  expand with a microSD memory card.
Sailfish OS 2.0 deserves to be accompanied by a great display – and the Jolla Tablet delivers. At 330 ppi, the display will out-perform the iPad's and Androids of the world.

Hey Backers - Over our previous 4 campaigns on Indiegogo, thousands of people trusted and backed us, and we really appreciate it and want to say ""thank you!"" to all of you. Now we can’t wait to share the new 5G rugged phone with you, Blackview BL6000 Pro - fastest, best camera outdoor phone for a truly fun, and portable adventurer experience!

✔Global Free Shipping, One Year Warranty
✔Can Work in -30℃ Freezing Temperature
✔IP68 &
column3:
MIL-STD-810G
✔Waterproof, Dropproof and Dustproof
✔Global 5G/4G/3G/2G Bands(If the Blackview BL6000 Pro is dropped to 4G network when it’s out of 5G coverage, it can still offer higher speed than 4G-powered phones sharing the same network.)

✔Adopts Superdynamic Loudspeaker
✔Sony IMX582 48MP Triple Rear Camera
✔HDR(photo&
column4:
video)+Night Mode+Underwater+125° Ultra-Wide+4K+HD Shot
✔8GB RAM 256GB ROM, NFC, Android 10(update Android 11 next year early)
✔GPS &
column8:
QZSS

BL6000 Pro rugged phone is protected by a one year warranty. Your contribution with us is a guaranteed purchase. If you need any support, feel free to reach our support team (support02@blackview.hk) by email. 

Tons of positive reviews on Blackview phones on Amazon
Check out what these satisfied buyers say about Blackview phones on social media

column1: Through our engineering team's rigorous testing, the BL6000 Pro has reached our standards for mass production! Our production timeline is all on schedule now. As promised, we’ll start the shipping process in December. Stay tuned for more updates.

column3: showinfo=0"">In order to ensure fast delivery, we make the shipment via DHL by default, which may be subject to additional customs duties and taxes. For backers from the U.S., UK and EU, you are free of customs duties and taxes with our partnership with your local delivery carriers. For those of you based in other regions, to waive the customs duties and taxes, please contact us to change it.

column2:
>Español|Pycckий|Italiano|Deutsch|日本語|Le français

Blackview BL6000 Pro 5G is one of a kind. It’s the first 5G rugged phone with industry-leading IP68 &
column4:
MIL-STD-810G rated waterproof, dropproof and dustproof performance. It inherits the TOUGH DNA from Blackview rugged phone legacy to withstand any possible damage that a regular phone hardly bear. And it’s equipped with cutting-edge 5G strength to give you the blazing fast 5G connectivity to match every need. On top of that, it can work in -30℃ freezing temperature that no other phones can do in the market. The top-notch camera system can’t let the photography lovers down either. And it has large storage, long-lasting battery, crystal clear display to get everything done perfectly.

Blackview has always striven to offer an ultimate phone solution aimed at combatting the possible damage of water, drops, weather elements, and any other hazardous elements.

The BL6000 Pro is designed to act on those issues directly by reforming the phone design and the internal structure so it can be taken anywhere to do anything worry free, like swimming, surfing, rock climbing, etc.

column1:
Stereotype is meant to be broken. A phone actually doesn’t need to be carefully protected from water, drops, bumps, shocks, and extreme weathers.

Blackview rugged phones have been well-known for superior waterproofness. To dramatically enhance the waterproof performance, this time we introduce an all-new technology - Nano molding, to upgrade the BL6000 Pro’s waterproof performance to a next level.

Great resistance to daily drops or violence. Tough enough to withstand the unexpected.

Featuring the IceMode technology, the BL6000 Pro can perform Phone, Message, Contacts, Camera normally even in a freezing temperature as low as -30℃ when other phones shiver to shut down automatically.
column3: showinfo=0"">
column5:
showinfo=0"">

Instead of costing you 7 minutes or more to download a 2-hour movie, you can download one in fewer than 10 seconds now with 5G. Technically, it saves you 6 minutes and 50 seconds.

The same goes for any other phone use. Everything is silk smooth and efficient. Isn’t it wonderful for people who are always ready for a mission, like the police, fireworkers, first aid workers, as well as when you are rushing the last-minute airplane boarding.

And there are much more amazing things about the BL6000 Pro 5G to change your mobile experience in ways you can't imagine.

Basically, the BL6000 Pro 5G benefits every aspect in your life, including audio and video entertainment, video creation, gaming, socializing, travelling, business or studying. In other words, the BL6000 Pro 5G saves you time, multiplies the joy, and lets you connect to people more closely. 

What if the phone is out of 5G coverage? 

Well, as a 5G-capable phone, it always has more advantage over a 4G phone. If the BL6000 Pro is dropped to 4G network when it’s out of 5G coverage, it can still offer higher speed than 4G-powered phones sharing the same network.

Taking photos is essential in everyday life. The BL6000 Pro lets you shoot effortlessly like a pro. It’s equipped with Sony® IMX582 48MP triple rear camera and Samsung® S5K3P9-SP 16MP front camera, coupled with superior processing software and rich features. It’s easy to take amazing photos in almost every situation, day or night, in the water or on the land.

Introduce the new Portrait mode - let it artfully grey the background for a studio-style portrait.

Even against light, smart HDR is amazing at capturing texture, skin tone, color saturation, and individual details that make photos clear.

With Night mode that lets in 30 percent more light, it can capture incredible low-light shots, with greater details in poorly-lit environment. Photos that used to be hard to capture -- like a dark night -- now come out sharper than ever.

Tap Underwater, you can press side buttons to control shooting in the pool even if the screen touch shall be disabled under water pressure. (Waterproof up to 1.5m for 30 Mins)

Can’t squeeze everything into the frame? Tap Ultra-Wide to take it all in.

The 4K shooting now have HDR - producing true-to-life video quality, with greater detail and smooth motion.

When it comes to rainy, stormy, sand storm weather, the BL6000 Pro outperforms any other camera phone out there thanks to its excellently waterproof, dropproof, and dustproof performance. Nothing can stop it working.

With all those beautiful photos you’ve taken, 5G speed ensures you instantaneous stream anywhere, anytime.

With 2300 x 1080 FHD+ resolution and incell technology for superior clarity and vivid colors, everything is responsive and looks stunning. And the advanced 6.36-inch punch hole display offers more of the screen which is less invasive especially when watching a fullscreen video, or gaming.

Protected by Corning® Gorilla® Glass, it greatly enhances daily drops and scratches resistance.

Performing stressful tasks like gaming on the phone can lead to overheating, which not only ruins your gaming experience but also damages your phone. The BL6000 Pro adopts liquid cooling technology and improves the internal process including infusing cooling gel, triple graphite layering and copper pipes to manage the device's temperature effectively.

If you know 5G enough or already have a 5G phone, you may have noticed that the phone's battery drains faster than usual while it’s connected to a 5G network. This is a limitation of the current 5G networks, and will be improved as the networks expand. We’ve known the fact well, and this is why we incorporate a 5280mAh big battery comprising the world-class electrical coring into the BL6000 Pro, and have painstakingly made an optimization on the software to enhance the battery life performance as much as possible. From our laboratory test statistics, the battery power saving performance is improved by 30%.

Each phone produced has undergone more than 100+ inspection processes, including shock, vibration, humidity, prolonged high temperature, altitude, immersion etc.

The BL6000 Pro is clearly not as elegant as a normal phone, why should I choose it?

Well, the BL6000 Pro is absolutely better for you when you:

* Crazy about outdoor sports that need your phone to withstand raining, water immersion, and accidentally hard drops onto rough ground.

* Work in harsh environments like construction sites, boats, aerial lifts, mining area.

* Ever experienced costing a fortune for phone repair after dropping into water, or rough ground.

When it comes to 5G, the BL6000 Pro 5G rugged phone is a late comer. Why should I choose it?

As a late comer in the 5G-powered phone market, the BL6000 Pro is still unique as it’s the first one that embraces both the 5G edge and the rugged phone strength. So it can do so much crazy things while other 5G phones can’t.

Isn’t it wonderful when the device that you use to record your surfing moments is reliably waterproof, and can share them on Instagram right there in a wink? The BL6000 Pro is right up for the task with IP68 &

With the BL6000 Pro 5G, truly real-time positioning is guaranteed when riding along the city. And it hardly breaks even falling from a speedy vehicle thanks to its military-grade build quality. It’s also amazing when you can vlog and upload instantaneously along the road.

Tap the video call, your family show up like right in front of you, and tell them everything is fine. Back to work, the BL6000 Pro is as tough as it should be, withstanding drops or bumps onto the rough ground.

column1:
Blackview is a trailblazer in developing the state-of-the-art rugged phones. Our aim is to bring the toughest and most reliable rugged phone with the world, hand-in-hand with you.

As a rugged phone manufactured based company, we have 4,700 square meter factory, based in China, covering 10 production lines, each of which can produce 800-1500 mobile phones per day.

Since founded in 2013, Blackview has been growing and expanding quickly over the years, with total 1.98 million sales volume in 2019. Blackview phones sell on leading e-commerce platforms like Amazon, Ebay, AliExpress, Cdiscount, as well as Blackview official website. We have set up 40 agents with business range covering 60 countries and regions.

We are a young and diverse team who loves travelling and adventures. It is our passion to bring out featured rugged outdoor phones that you can rely on and can help make the most of your time outdoors.

Español|Pycckий|Italiano|Deutsch|日本語|Le françaisBlackview BL6000 Pro 5G is one of a kind. It’s the first 5G rugged phone with industry-leading IP68 & IP69K & MIL-STD-810G rated waterproof, dropproof and dustproof performance. It inherits the TOUGH DNA from Blackview rugged phone legacy to withstand any possible damage that a regular phone hardly bear. And it’s equipped with cutting-edge 5G strength to give you the blazing fast 5G connectivity to match every need. On top of that, it can work in -30℃ freezing temperature that no other phones can do in the market. The top-notch camera system can’t let the photography lovers down either. And it has large storage, long-lasting battery, crystal clear display to get everything done perfectly.Blackview has always striven to offer an ultimate phone solution aimed at combatting the possible damage of water, drops, weather elements, and any other hazardous elements.The BL6000 Pro is designed to act on those issues directly by reforming the phone design and the internal structure so it can be taken anywhere to do anything worry free, like swimming, surfing, rock climbing, etc.

Stereotype is meant to be broken. A phone actually doesn’t need to be carefully protected from water, drops, bumps, shocks, and extreme weathers.Blackview rugged phones have been well-known for superior waterproofness. To dramatically enhance the waterproof performance, this time we introduce an all-new technology - Nano molding, to upgrade the BL6000 Pro’s waterproof performance to a next level.Great resistance to daily drops or violence. Tough enough to withstand the unexpected.Featuring the IceMode technology, the BL6000 Pro can perform Phone, Message, Contacts, Camera normally even in a freezing temperature as low as -30℃ when other phones shiver to shut down automatically.Instead of costing you 7 minutes or more to download a 2-hour movie, you can download one in fewer than 10 seconds now with 5G. Technically, it saves you 6 minutes and 50 seconds.The same goes for any other phone use. Everything is silk smooth and efficient. Isn’t it wonderful for people who are always ready for a mission, like the police, fireworkers, first aid workers, as well as when you are rushing the last-minute airplane boarding.And there are much more amazing things about the BL6000 Pro 5G to change your mobile experience in ways you can't imagine.Basically, the BL6000 Pro 5G benefits every aspect in your life, including audio and video entertainment, video creation, gaming, socializing, travelling, business or studying. In other words, the BL6000 Pro 5G saves you time, multiplies the joy, and lets you connect to people more closely. What if the phone is out of 5G coverage? Well, as a 5G-capable phone, it always has more advantage over a 4G phone. (Waterproof up to 1.5m for 30 Mins)Can’t squeeze everything into the frame? Nothing can stop it working.With all those beautiful photos you’ve taken, 5G speed ensures you instantaneous stream anywhere, anytime.With 2300 x 1080 FHD+ resolution and incell technology for superior clarity and vivid colors, everything is responsive and looks stunning. And the advanced 6.36-inch punch hole display offers more of the screen which is less invasive especially when watching a fullscreen video, or gaming.Protected by Corning® Gorilla® Glass, it greatly enhances daily drops and scratches resistance.Performing stressful tasks like gaming on the phone can lead to overheating, which not only ruins your gaming experience but also damages your phone. We took them to heart. Now, we are excited to unveil the second generation ShutterGrip™ with a brand new finish and more flexible ways of controlling the smartphone camera in your pocket.

column1: ","This project is finished. Please order ShutterGrip2 from Just Mobile website.

We do this everyday – mobile photography. But whenever we want to take that one shot,  obstacles stand in our way. Ever since we released the original ShutterGrip™ a year ago, enthusiastic backers have been giving us valuable usage and product enhancement feedback. We took them to heart. Now, we are excited to unveil the second generation ShutterGrip™ with a brand new finish and more flexible ways of controlling the smartphone camera in your pocket.
No matter how difficult the shooting task, ShutterGrip™ 2 can easily transform your smartphone into a serious camera on-the-fly to take that momentous shot firmly and securely.

The design goal of ShutterGrip™ 2 is to re-create the comfort and control of a traditional DSLR camera. From the sculpted palm grip to the optimally positioned shutter release button, the final creation is a palm grip that is comfortable to operate with one hand, and a secure camera that is always at the ready by your side. The ShutterGrip™ 2 can be mounted on the left or right side. ShutterGrip™ 2 is compatible with iOS/Android smartphones without the need for any proprietary apps.  Bluetooth pairing is simple and only needs to be done once. Any subsequent re-pairing is automatic with the press of a button.ShutterGrip™ 2 is compatible with any smartphone (iOS/Android) equipped with Bluetooth 4.0 and uses the side button for shutter release.

ShutterGrip™ 2 supports two 2 popular video taking orientations – landscape and portrait.  When taking landscape videos, hold the camera steady like holding a torch. Place the ShutterGrip™ 2 in the middle of the phone and rotate the palm grip down.
Note how ShutterGrip™ 2 folds down to transform into a vertical hand grip.
For instagram or portrait live-streaming, turn the grip 90 degrees, hold it with one hand, and adjust the pitch of the camera with the other.
Note how the ShutterGrip™ 2 hand grip transforms from bottom position (for landscape cinematic video taking) to side position (for portrait live-streaming).
Note how the pitch of the camera can also be adjusted. Both orientations allow you to grip the phone steadily, securely and for an extended period of time.
In the palm grip is a telescoping arm that extends by 15cm. When not in use, the arm tucks safely inside the palm grip for the next selfie opportunity.
Note how ShutterGrip™ 2 hand grip folds down and extends the telescoping arm. The shutter remote is also detachable.

ShutterGrip™ 2 standard cold shoe attaches to a host of accessories like fill light, monitors, microphones and more. When you are shooting at night or in low-light conditions, your smartphone coupled with ShutterGrip™ 2 rivals any professional setup.
Note how ShutterGrip™ 2 attaches to different accessories using the cold shoe.   A hidden hex wrench built into the ShutterGrip™ 2 for servicing the arm hinge.
Note how a hex wrench is removed from the cold shoe for tightening the hinge, as needed.
For large group photos or time-lapse videos, use a tripod with ShutterGrip 2. Control the exact timing of the shutter from a distance with the detachable remote.

Note how ShutterGrip™ 2 is mounted on a tripod and shutter timing is triggered precisely by the detached remote. One battery will last 6 months of continuous usage with 500 daily presses, or up to 18 months in standby.
Note how the battery can be easily removed from the remote.ShutterGrip™ 2 remote uses common CR2032 Lithium battery, and is user-changeable.

ShutterGrip™ 2 can transform into a phone stand, setting up vertically or horizontally with ease. Note how ShutterGrip™ 2 transforms into a desktop stand, for live streaming or movie watching. With the ShutterGrip™ 2, you can play your photo albums, advance slides with the remote. You can binge watch your favorite shows at the perfect angle, or video call your friends, or host a live-stream, all handsfree. The list goes on. Best of all, when you are all done, everything folds neatly into a single compact palm grip, fitting into any pocket.

Apple: iPhone 11 Pro Max, iPhone 11 Pro, iPhone 11, iPhone XS Max, iPhone XS, iPhone XR, iPhone X, iPhone 8/8 Plus, iPhone 7/7 Plus, iPhone 6s/6s Plus, iPhone 6/6 Plus, iPhone SE, iPhone 5/5s SAMSUNG: S10/S10 Plus, S10e, Note10, Note10+, A80, A70, A50, S9/S9 Plus, S8/S8 Plus, S7 edge,Note10/10 Plus, Note 9, Note 8, Note 5, J7 Prime, J7 Plus, J7 Pro, S8, S8 Plus, A8 Star, A7, A6+Above list is not a complete. Compatible models only require Bluetooth 4.0+ support and use side volume up key as the shutter button
*Note: Color option (Silver or Pink Sand) is selected after the campaign is over. We will send out a questionnaire to reaffirm everything, before we start shipping.",56.0,1,"1 Campaign

DreamGlass Air is a lightweight personal cinema that plays on its 100” AR screen anything from your smartphone/tablet (Android,iPhone,iPad), game consoles (PS4, Xbox, Nintendo Switch), PC&
column3: Mac, and other electronic devices. It frees up your hands and shows everything in private, delivering the most comfortable viewing experience. Unlike Virtual Reality headsets, DreamGlass Air packs up cutting-edge Augmented Reality technology that usually costs thousands of dollars, for mobility, daily life assistance and surrounding safety awareness.

column2: >Have you ever felt your phone screen is too small?  Tired of holding it?  Suffered from neck pain after using it?
column3: >
column4:
>DreamGlass Air sets you free by projecting anything from your phone into multiple 100’’ immersive screens wirelessly.  With 2.5K  resolution and unparalleled 90° FOV, every single detail comes to life to entertain you in any posture you like.

 

Incredibly Immersive Experience

The newest games and movies are better when viewed on a large screen. Powered by the most cutting-edge imaging technology today, DreamGlass Air delivers vivid, high definition, immersive viewing experience on a gigantic AR screen. Get ready to be amazed, your digital world will never feel the same!
column6:
/>

 

Your Own Private Theater

Everyone needs some private time. With DreamGlass Air, the content you are viewing is totally private and cannot be seen by others from any angle. Combined with the hands-free feature, you can relax and enjoy your personal world anywhere and anytime.
column7:
>

 

Immersive But Not Isolated

Worried about trip hazard from the isolation of VR headsets? DreamGlass Air is different! You can see and use your phone's touchscreen to control, and have awareness of the surroundings while enjoying your favorite contents. Never miss a phone call or text message. During travel, you can turn any seat into first class with VIP entertainment, and never miss the food service or notice of emergency.
column8:
>

 

90° Ultra-Wide FOV

With the unparalleled 90° FOV (Field of View) and stereo sound, the digital world has never been this real!
column9:
>

 

2.5K  Screen

With 2.5K resolution at 600 ppi (Pixel Per Inch), DreamGlass Air delivers a smooth, clear view even for the most sophisticated images. Every single detail comes into life with the most vivid color.

column2:
>

DreamGlass Air is compatible with any smartphone (iPhone and Android), games consoles, PC&
column3: Mac, local media in a Flash Drive,  as well as most other electronics devices. Old devices become new again when paired with the immersive world inside DreamGlass Air!

column2: >
>

>

With 3 degree of freedom head tracking, DreamGlass Air can display multiple 100” AR screens, providing hands free visual aid for your daily life tasks. Imagine you can watch instructional videos while repairing your car without holding your phone. Or read recipe and watch drama simultaneously in the kitchen. Multitasking has never been more convenient and entertaining.

>

 

DreamGlass Air is feather light, weighing at only 5 oz. With a unique foldable design, it is of the size of a pair of ski goggles, perfect for on-the-go use. You can easily put it in your backpack or handbag and bring your private Dreamworld with you wherever you go.
column3:
>

 

Eye Glasses Friendly 

A lot of us wear prescription glasses. No worries. DreamGlass Air has enough eye relief for any correction glasses you may have. Enjoy your private IMAX theater without uncomfortable interference.
column4:
>

 

5G Compatible for a Glimpse of the Future

5G is coming and Augmented Reality is its immediate application. Compatible with smartphones, DreamGlass Air can fly you to the future by delivering high bandwidth and low latency contents through the 5G network (DreamGlass Air relies on the modem in your phone for 5G network).
column5:
>

 

5-Hour Battery Life + Inverse Charging your phone

Despite the small size, DreamGlass Air has its own battery and can last for more than 5 hours. So you can binge watch 2-3 films without worrying about your phone’s power, as  we understand the battery of your phone is always not enough. DreamGlass Air can even back charge your phone when necessary.  Never get caught again by a dead battery dilemma.

column1: 1. Wireless Display (Prototype Demo included）

column2: Play via HDMI and USB (Prototype Demos included）

column1: Based on our extensive experience in optics, DreamGlass Air uses the most cutting edge imaging and coating technology with the widest field of view, delivering the most immersive and vivid visuals all the time!

Did you feel eye strain after watching movie on your phone? It is caused by the near distance (~0.3 meter) and the intensive blue light of the phone screen. DreamGlass Air uses advanced optical technology to project contents at meters away,  and employs over 10 layers of special optical coatings to reduces blue light and glare,  delivering much more comfortable viewing experience.

We really appreciate the help from our backer community, and we value your inputs. That’s why we seize very opportunity to meet our backer in person, showing live demos to him/her, and collecting feedbacks.

Our CEO, Kevin Zhong, met Eliah in Los Angeles on Aug 25th. Eliah is a retired professional gamer, and a super backer who has backed 233 projects on Kickstarter in the past. Eliah liked DreamGlass Air very much and provided a lot of constructive suggestions.
column3: 8th, we also met with 5 of our backers, Kevin, Glen, Mario, Ben and Krystyn in the Silicon Valley Innovation &amp
column4: Entrepreneurship Forum. They all tried our DreamGlass Air and Pro in person, and they all liked it. We'll inform you once we have more opportunities to meet with you in the future. Stay tuned!

column9:
>

DreamWorld was founded in Silicon Valley during 2016 by a group of AR enthusiasts who have had over 20 years of optics and computer vision experiences among us. Believing in the value of ""Tech for People"", DreamWorld strives to deliver the most cutting-edge yet affordable Augmented Reality technology to everyone. 

 

After 2 years of R&
column10: D and manufacturing planning, in June of 2018, we launched our Gen 1 product, DreamGlass. As a responsible team, we managed to ship the product to thousands of customers in the same month. Our hard work paid off. Customers love us and our AR headset was rated as the Top 5 innovative AR products in 2018 together with Apple and Magic leap products. And our CEO, Dr. Zhangyi Zhong, was selected as the Top 30 leaders in AR together with Apple CEO Tim Cook and Microsoft Executive Alex Kipman.
column11:
>

 

Dreamworld is a frequent exhibitor at CES, AWE, SID and many other conferences as well as trade shows. Our products were liked and appraised by Oculus founder Palmer Luckey, and many other happy customers.
column12:
>

 

Our current customers are mainly enterprises, studios, and universities. Out of the value of “Tech for People”, We were so eager to find out : what keeps consumers like you from using AR headsets? After a lot of surveys, we found that there are mainly two reasons: 

1. AR headsets are too expensive (Normally $2-3K) 

2. Very few AR contents are out there. 

 

In September of 2018, we started the project of a truly consumer-friendly AR headset: DreamGlass Air. To address the two problems above, We wanted to make DreamGlass Air with a price in the $200-$300 range , and compatible with most entertainment platforms you already have: Smartphones, Tablets, Consoles (PS4, Xbox, Switch), PC&
column13: Mac, Drones, etc. So you will never worry about available contents again.
column14:
>

 

We started our industrial design in Nov 2018, and prototyping in early 2019. There have been many iterations on PCB assemblies and also mechanical parts. It was not easy. But the harder part is on the software. To seamlessly play contents from so many different platforms in AR, we must do some digital manipulation on the contents received. For our Gen 1 product, we provided to our developer an SDK to do it. But this time, for regular consumers, we cannot use any SDK. We need to come up an invisible layer of coding underneath those contents. After many failures, we succeeded in developing  a large set of low-level coding in the GPU(Graphics Processing Unit), solving this problem in the fastest and most efficient way. All contents will directly play without any extra work from you.
column15:
>

 

In  the first half of 2019, we’ve been busy iterating and validating. To collect feedback, we have shown demos of DreamGlass Air to hundreds of people in AWE (Augmented World Expo) and SID Display week, . Now we are doing some final optimizations and will start the the trial production right after the campaign ends. The fund raised with your help will enable us to order all the materials for mass production happening in November. We have many years of manufacturing experience and we have shipped products in high volume before. We are confident that we will produce and ship DreamGlass Air quickly, just as what we did for our Gen 1 product. DreamWorld will live up to your trust!
column16:
>

Last but not the least, let’s talk about something bigger. Everyone knows 5G is just around the corner and as 5G’s most immediate application, AR’s potential is going to be fully revealed. As the future mobile platform, AR is going to completely change how we work, communicate, and entertain ourselves.  We believe AR should not be luxury and want to make AR accessible to everyone. That’s why we started this campaign with the price of 1/10 of other AR headsets. However, it is not enough, and we cannot do this alone. AR is still in its infancy, while a lot of people haven’t heard of it, or are still skeptical about it. We need help from pioneers like you, to spread the word and let more people know about Dreamworld, and Augmented Reality in general. 

 

Let’s work together to bring the future to life!

 

","DreamGlass Air is a lightweight personal cinema that plays on its 100” AR screen anything from your smartphone/tablet (Android,iPhone,iPad), game consoles (PS4, Xbox, Nintendo Switch), PC&Mac, and other electronic devices. It frees up your hands and shows everything in private, delivering the most comfortable viewing experience. Unlike Virtual Reality headsets, DreamGlass Air packs up cutting-edge Augmented Reality technology that usually costs thousands of dollars, for mobility, daily life assistance and surrounding safety awareness.

column1: Have you ever felt your phone screen is too small?  Tired of holding it?  Suffered from neck pain after using it? DreamGlass Air sets you free by projecting anything from your phone into multiple 100’’ immersive screens wirelessly.  With 2.5K  resolution and unparalleled 90° FOV, every single detail comes to life to entertain you in any posture you like. Incredibly Immersive ExperienceThe newest games and movies are better when viewed on a large screen. Powered by the most cutting-edge imaging technology today, DreamGlass Air delivers vivid, high definition, immersive viewing experience on a gigantic AR screen. Get ready to be amazed, your digital world will never feel the same! Your Own Private TheaterEveryone needs some private time. With DreamGlass Air, the content you are viewing is totally private and cannot be seen by others from any angle. Combined with the hands-free feature, you can relax and enjoy your personal world anywhere and anytime. Immersive But Not IsolatedWorried about trip hazard from the isolation of VR headsets? DreamGlass Air is different! You can see and use your phone's touchscreen to control, and have awareness of the surroundings while enjoying your favorite contents. Never miss a phone call or text message. During travel, you can turn any seat into first class with VIP entertainment, and never miss the food service or notice of emergency. 90° Ultra-Wide FOVWith the unparalleled 90° FOV (Field of View) and stereo sound, the digital world has never been this real!  2.5K  ScreenWith 2.5K resolution at 600 ppi (Pixel Per Inch), DreamGlass Air delivers a smooth, clear view even for the most sophisticated images. Every single detail comes into life with the most vivid color.

DreamGlass Air is compatible with any smartphone (iPhone and Android), games consoles, PC&Mac, local media in a Flash Drive,  as well as most other electronics devices. Old devices become new again when paired with the immersive world inside DreamGlass Air!

With 3 degree of freedom head tracking, DreamGlass Air can display multiple 100” AR screens, providing hands free visual aid for your daily life tasks. Imagine you can watch instructional videos while repairing your car without holding your phone. Or read recipe and watch drama simultaneously in the kitchen. Multitasking has never been more convenient and entertaining.

DreamGlass Air is feather light, weighing at only 5 oz. With a unique foldable design, it is of the size of a pair of ski goggles, perfect for on-the-go use. You can easily put it in your backpack or handbag and bring your private Dreamworld with you wherever you go.  Eye Glasses Friendly A lot of us wear prescription glasses. No worries. DreamGlass Air has enough eye relief for any correction glasses you may have. Enjoy your private IMAX theater without uncomfortable interference. 5G Compatible for a Glimpse of the Future5G is coming and Augmented Reality is its immediate application. Compatible with smartphones, DreamGlass Air can fly you to the future by delivering high bandwidth and low latency contents through the 5G network (DreamGlass Air relies on the modem in your phone for 5G network).    5-Hour Battery Life + Inverse Charging your phoneDespite the small size, DreamGlass Air has its own battery and can last for more than 5 hours. So you can binge watch 2-3 films without worrying about your phone’s power, as  we understand the battery of your phone is always not enough. DreamGlass Air can even back charge your phone when necessary.  Never get caught again by a dead battery dilemma.
2. Plug & Play via HDMI and USB (Prototype Demos included）

Based on our extensive experience in optics, DreamGlass Air uses the most cutting edge imaging and coating technology with the widest field of view, delivering the most immersive and vivid visuals all the time!

Did you feel eye strain after watching movie on your phone? It is caused by the near distance (~0.3 meter) and the intensive blue light of the phone screen. DreamGlass Air uses advanced optical technology to project contents at meters away,  and employs over 10 layers of special optical coatings to reduces blue light and glare,  delivering much more comfortable viewing experience.

We really appreciate the help from our backer community, and we value your inputs. That’s why we seize very opportunity to meet our backer in person, showing live demos to him/her, and collecting feedbacks.Our CEO, Kevin Zhong, met Eliah in Los Angeles on Aug 25th. Eliah is a retired professional gamer, and a super backer who has backed 233 projects on Kickstarter in the past. Eliah liked DreamGlass Air very much and provided a lot of constructive suggestions.On Sep 7th&8th, we also met with 5 of our backers, Kevin, Glen, Mario, Ben and Krystyn in the Silicon Valley Innovation & Entrepreneurship Forum. They all tried our DreamGlass Air and Pro in person, and they all liked it. We'll inform you once we have more opportunities to meet with you in the future. Stay tuned!

DreamWorld was founded in Silicon Valley during 2016 by a group of AR enthusiasts who have had over 20 years of optics and computer vision experiences among us. Believing in the value of ""Tech for People"", DreamWorld strives to deliver the most cutting-edge yet affordable Augmented Reality technology to everyone.  After 2 years of R&D and manufacturing planning, in June of 2018, we launched our Gen 1 product, DreamGlass. As a responsible team, we managed to ship the product to thousands of customers in the same month. Our hard work paid off. Customers love us and our AR headset was rated as the Top 5 innovative AR products in 2018 together with Apple and Magic leap products. And our CEO, Dr. Zhangyi Zhong, was selected as the Top 30 leaders in AR together with Apple CEO Tim Cook and Microsoft Executive Alex Kipman.   Dreamworld is a frequent exhibitor at CES, AWE, SID and many other conferences as well as trade shows. Our products were liked and appraised by Oculus founder Palmer Luckey, and many other happy customers. Our current customers are mainly enterprises, studios, and universities. Out of the value of “Tech for People”, We were so eager to find out : what keeps consumers like you from using AR headsets? After a lot of surveys, we found that there are mainly two reasons: 1. AR headsets are too expensive (Normally $2-3K) 2. Very few AR contents are out there.  In September of 2018, we started the project of a truly consumer-friendly AR headset: DreamGlass Air. To address the two problems above, We wanted to make DreamGlass Air with a price in the $200-$300 range , and compatible with most entertainment platforms you already have: Smartphones, Tablets, Consoles (PS4, Xbox, Switch), PC&Mac, Drones, etc. So you will never worry about available contents again. We started our industrial design in Nov 2018, and prototyping in early 2019. There have been many iterations on PCB assemblies and also mechanical parts. It was not easy. But the harder part is on the software. To seamlessly play contents from so many different platforms in AR, we must do some digital manipulation on the contents received. For our Gen 1 product, we provided to our developer an SDK to do it. But this time, for regular consumers, we cannot use any SDK. We need to come up an invisible layer of coding underneath those contents. After many failures, we succeeded in developing  a large set of low-level coding in the GPU(Graphics Processing Unit), solving this problem in the fastest and most efficient way. All contents will directly play without any extra work from you. In  the first half of 2019, we’ve been busy iterating and validating. To collect feedback, we have shown demos of DreamGlass Air to hundreds of people in AWE (Augmented World Expo) and SID Display week, . Now we are doing some final optimizations and will start the the trial production right after the campaign ends. The fund raised with your help will enable us to order all the materials for mass production happening in November. We have many years of manufacturing experience and we have shipped products in high volume before. We are confident that we will produce and ship DreamGlass Air quickly, just as what we did for our Gen 1 product. DreamWorld will live up to your trust! Last but not the least, let’s talk about something bigger. Everyone knows 5G is just around the corner and as 5G’s most immediate application, AR’s potential is going to be fully revealed. As the future mobile platform, AR is going to completely change how we work, communicate, and entertain ourselves.  We believe AR should not be luxury and want to make AR accessible to everyone. That’s why we started this campaign with the price of 1/10 of other AR headsets. However, it is not enough, and we cannot do this alone. AR is still in its infancy, while a lot of people haven’t heard of it, or are still skeptical about it. We need help from pioneers like you, to spread the word and let more people know about Dreamworld, and Augmented Reality in general.  Let’s work together to bring the future to life!",65.0,0,"3 Campaigns
• Powered by Gallium Nitride, a next generation technology, which enables it to be the smallest possible size
• With the high output of 65W, it can charge a Macbook Pro
•  Useful specs: equipped with 2 x USB-C ports (Power Delivery 3.0) and 1 x USB-A port (supports Quick Charge 4.0)

column5:
>

Devices with USB-C have become widespread, and it has been adopted for many devices such as the latest iPhone, Android devices, tablets, PC, games, electronic cigarettes, etc.

We are sure that CIO 2C1A Charger can become one of the most indispensable adapters since the USB-C port has become mainstream.

 

Our adapter uses GaN (Gallium Nitride), a next-generation semiconductor technology.

This adapter combines three important points, made possible by GaN technology: compact, powerful, and with multiple ports.

 

 

A Tiny &
column6:
Powerful Adapter at 1/2 the Size of a Credit Card 

High Output and Compatible with Multi-Port Charging

With CIO 2C1A, we are confident that you will save charging time, cut down on space used for chargers, and so free up space for carrying other things that are important to you. It will help reduce the clutter and help you have a more enjoyable and convenient daily life.

 

 

 CIO Co., Ltd. has been featured in:

 

AC Adapters: Recent Developments

The number of AC adapters that support quick charge technology, such as Qualcomm Quick Charge and Power Delivery, have increased along with smartphones and tablets that support this technology.

Furthermore, GaN enables a suppression of the surface temperature of the AC adapter, which has succeeded in making it compact. Since 2019, AC adapters with GaN have appeared one after another.

On the other hand, a lot of AC adapter manufacturers stick to the title “the world's smallest,” but they make GaN AC adapters with a single port.

Of course, being compact is one of the most important factors, but when we thought about what we really needed rather than pursuing compactness, we came up with an answer.

“A small charger which can supply optimal power to any device, and charge multiple devices simultaneously”

 

Feature

column1: •  Extremely high output: Single port 65W Output
•  Multiple ports: 2 x USB-C, 1 x USB-A ports
• 45W + 18W specifications that can charge smartphones and a Macbook at the same time

This provides incredibly high power and overall convenience with the same size as current AC adapters.

 

CIO 2C1A is able to output 65W, at maximum, with a single port. 

Not only Macbook Pro, but also other devices such as Laptop / PC, Nintendo Switch, iPhoneXS, Android (Galaxy) can be charged at the maximum speed.

 

 

Power can be supplied at 65W output, which is enough to supply power to 50% to a Macbook Pro in only 39 minutes.

 

Support Multiple Port

Multiple units can be charged since it has multiple ports, not just one.
column3:
>

While charging a Macbook with 45W output, it can also charge an iPhone11 at the maximum speed of 18W.

USB-A output supports up to 30W Quick Charge 3.0

Although the number of USB-C compatible devices is increasing, there are still many USB-A compatible cables and devices. This is compatible with Qualcomm Quick Charge 4.0 and supports up to 30W output.

Our wall charger is able to charge devices which do not support QC since it also supports 2.4A output. So it can charge each device at the maximum output.

 

3 Units - Simultaneous Charging

Since each device supports a different type of charging, it is ideal to have multiple ports on AC adapters.

CIO 2C1A is able to charge your iPhone and Airpods while charging your Macbook.

High quality and overwhelming compactness with GaN

 CIO 2C1A is equipped with GaN (Navitas NV6115 chip). It realized overwhelmingly compact, power-efficient and excellent heat resistance. 

 

The difference in size is obvious. Compared with Apple adapter with 61W output, our charger is under 1/2 the size. Also, it is 1/2 size of a credit card. 

The Apple adapter has only one USB-C port, of up to 61W, while CIO 2C1A has 2 x USB-C (up to 65W) + 1 x USB-A (QC4.0 30W compatible) 

 

CIO 2C1A fits in your pocket. It is the perfect size for carrying around.
column5:
>

Adopting a stylish, long design, it fits very well in the side pocket of a bag, and is not only ideal for travel, but also at home and at work. 

 

 

Specifications

 

Design Concept

We added a little dent on the side so that it will fit in your hand and be easy to remove it from the outlet plug.

The edges are chamfered to prevent other devices from being damaged even when it is in a bag. 

The built-in foldable plugs (Plug Type A) can be ready to use with only one hand.  

 

Designed not to interfere with other outlets 

 

Designed to keep the thickness within 33.8mm (30mm) so as not to get in the way of other outlets. This way, this wall charger and other electronic devices will not interfere with each other. 

 

Colors

Two stylish and simple colors are available.

They will suit any place and scene and cut down on outlet space used for chargers 

 

 

 Introduction of ToughLine, PD compatible cable (Charging Cable) 

Tough Line is a cable that can charge USB-C devices such as Apple devices, Android devices, Macbook, Laptop, Nintendo Switch etc at the maximum speed. This wall charger is able to supply power at the highest speed. (MFi-certified Model: CIO 0104, CIO 0105)

 SMARTCOBY10000: Credit card size, compact 10000mAh power bank  

This campaign was on Kickstarter until December 23, 2019.

Compatible with PD 18W so SMARTCOBY can be fully charged in just 3 hours.

While using Wall Charger's first USB-C port for another device at 45W, its second USB-C port can be used for SMARTCOBY at 18W, at the maximum speed, so it is very convenient

Proof of Concept

We recently demonstrated a working prototype of it and shot the following video.
column7:
showinfo=0"">

 

 Project Schedule

September 2019　Initial Product Conception

October 2019 　Product Design

November 2019 　Prototype Completed

December 2019 　 Final Testing

January 2020 　 Kickstarter Launched

March 2020    Indiegogo Launched

April 2020      Begin Manufacturing

May-June 2020 　Reward Shipped to all Backers

 

 

Thoughts on This Project

""I want a high output AC adapter."" ""I want a multi-port AC adapter."" ""It is okay as long as the AC adapter is compact."" CIO Co., Ltd., as a charger manufacturer, has been striving to reflect these thoughts on products every day.

Meanwhile, by using GaN, it can suppress heat even while the adapter becomes more compact, and it is now possible to manufacture high-spec, and safe, AC adapters

While overseas manufacturers are releasing AC adapters that make full use of GaN technology, Japanese manufacturers were reluctant to step into the latest technology.

We, CIO, want to manufacture and release the ideal AC adapter, based on the experience and opinions we learned from our Japanese customers, who we have been selling chargers to for many years. We want to deliver more convenient and safe products.

By using our charger, we want you to realize the differences in specifications of AC adapters and how useful light, fast and multi-functional AC adapters can be.

It will be a trigger to pursue your life in a more convenient way by space-saving and reducing charging time.

This project was started with that thought.

 

Our Team

CIO LLC was founded in 2017, operating mainly at EC malls such as Rakuten and Yahoo  Shopping in Japan. Based on the concept, ""delivering the latest and most exciting gadgets♪"", we do not just import the products,  but we are committed to developing new products for our customers.

We have experience in launching several projects, Super Mobile Charger and deskHack on a Japanese crowdfunding site and successfully raised over $ 81,000 on each project.

We have been striving to deliver Japanese high quality and cost-effective products to our customers. We are thrilled and really appreciate this opportunity to share our convenient and useful product to the world through Kickstarter.

 

Risk and Challenge

* Depending on the monitor, the color of products shown on this page may appear different from the actual product color. * Some design changes such as USB colors and logo color may occur. *Estimated shipping time may be delayed if the number of backers is higher than anticipated due to production delivery or manufacturing process delays. * Refunds for the backers will be made only in cases where there are initial functional failures. * If the number of backers is higher than anticipated, the regular sales price be lower than the planned cost according to lowered production costs. * Similar products may exist, so please support at your own discretion, but we won’t let you down!
